1.content:
A bright light blinds you as you slowly open your eyes. You find yourself in a ordinary-looking forest, nothing seems out of place. You wonder how you got where you are, unable to remember anything that happened to you. You are a High-School student, age 14. You feel horrible, covered in scrapes and bruises, your clothes torn up. You are down on the ground, belly down in the dirt. You hear a strange sound, a growl of some sort, and look up. In front of you, you spot what looks like a Timber Wolf. It has gray fur on the top, and white on the bottom. However, something is different about it. It is large, slightly larger than you yourself, with a mouth wide enough to eat swallow a human with ease. You try to move, but your body is too sore to do so. You look on in fear as the wolf slowly approaches you. It comes to your baskside, and nudges its nose agaunst your crotch. Even through your thick blue jeans, you feel the wet, cold nose. The wolf is trying to determine your gender.

You are...
1.title: Awaken to a Large Wolf

11.content:
The wolf nudges the area again and feels something there, determining that you are male. The wolf slowly moves away from the area and paces around your body, examining it carefully. It notices that your silver short-sleeved T-shirt is town as well in several places, and notices the wounds on your body. It comes to your face, causing you to stare directly into its golden yellow eyes. The wolf opens its mouth a tiny.

"Oh my god! I'm going to die!" you think.

The wolf just happened to be yawning and closes its mouth back up. You with relief, but not before realizing that you just got a face full of wolf breath. You can't quite recognize the smell. The warm breath messed your short, spiky brown hair up a bit. The wolf moves closer and licks your forehead and cheek. You feel the wet and slobbery tongue lick you across your face. The tongue is rough, but it feels nice as well. You snap back to reality from the pleasant feeling and start wondering what the wolf's intentions are.

The wolf is...
11.title: A Wolf's Intentions

choices: You relax and let the wolf take you.
111.content:
You close your eyes in horror, fearing that the wolf is going to eat you. The wolf continues licking your face, when you suddenly realize that your face doesn't hurt anymore. The wolf stops licking you for a moment. You manage to move your arm and feel your face with your right hand. You feel a bit of the wolf's saliva covering a scratch on your right cheek. You rub off some dry blood, and realize that it's not bleeding.

"Is this wolf, helping me?" you wonder.

You freeze as the wolf begins licking several others of your body. With each place the tongue touches, the pain seems to go away. Your body doesn't hurt as much anymore, and you find yourself able to stand up. You push yourself to your feet, but stumble a bit and quickly fall back over.

As you hit what you believe to be the ground, you feel what feels like soft rabbit fur underneath you. You open your eyes to find yourself lying on the wolf's back.

"You...broke my fall!" you gasp.

The wolf slowly sets you down on your stomach and proceeds to stand over your body. It licks the back of your neck.

"Stop, that tickles." you say.

The wolf grabs the skin on the back of your neck, and lifts you up like it would a wolf pup. The wolf's touch has caused your skin to stretch, but it doesn't hurt surprisingly. You guess that the wolf licked it to numb it like it did your wounds. The wolf begins trotting off in the forest.

You feel nervous being held like this...
111.title: Taken Away

choices: The room is empty, except for you two.
The room is crowded with a big pack of huge wolves.
1111.content:
You decide to relax and enjoy the trip. The wolf is very much bigger and stronger than you, trying to fight it would be useless. Besides, you could make it angry. Not to mention the fact that the wolf helped you out, and hasn't harmed you yet. You let the beast carry you, feeling extremely puny and defenseless while dangling from its jaws.

After a quite long walk, the wolf reaches the entrance of a huge cave, well hidden in the brushes, and soon you find yourself in nearly total darkness, while your captor goes further and further inside, until it stops in a big "room" and finally places you down.
1111.title: Wolf's Den

11111.content:
The wolf has placed you on a spot intensely smelling of wolf, it's clearly its "bed". You're upset, wondering if the beast is about to make you into pieces and eat you...but it just lies down beside you, and gently takes you between its enormous paws, licking you tenderly.

"Wow!" you think, "I've become a wolf puppy...and I have a Giant ..."
11111.title: Human Puppy

choices: You wake up inside a dream, or a nightmare...
You wake up before your new father, the Alpha male...
111111.content:
Your mind races with conflicting emotions. On one end, you are afraid that this sign of affection from the mothering wolf could be a ruse so you may later become food for her, or for the other members of her packs. On the other, you have the ridiculous idea that this wolfess was actually trying to keep you as its SON. Of course, none of these claims could be verified; how many people do you know that have survived a hand-to-hand encounter with a wolf, and one of this size no less? It did not matter so much now; you were certain that there was no way out of this mess soon.
As you lay on the ground, the wolfess still licking you with its rough tongue, you started to feel tired. And itchy. You assumed that it was just the change of environment, and the fatigue that came with trying to wrap your head around the situation. However, you looked at your hands as they itched your body and saw your nails were getting sharper than normal. They grew and pointed at an impossible rate, and you were extremely confused. The growth did not hurt; it just tingled, making your fingers itch too. As you scratched your left hand with your right, the annoying feeling continued no matter how much you attended to it. Finally, upon closer inspection, you felt a simultaneous jolt in your hands and feet, the itching feeling becoming a warm sensation that turned you numb. You groaned, not in pain, but in sheer confusion. Then, something happened that you would have never expected. The wolfess stopped licking you and hovered her slightly agape muzzle to your ear. She breathed into your ear and motioned her lips in a way that almost simulated speech. Human speech. She said, or rather breathed, "Do not worry. The transformation has begun."
My mouth hung open, a combination of complete disbelief and a raging toothache in the back of your mouth. You reached in with your warming hands, which were developing some sort of soft gray cover, you grimaced and retracted your hand, seeing blood on your finger. Your teeth were becoming sharp, so sharp that they could puncture skin. The wolfess turned her head and began licking you once again. "It's confusing at first, but don't fight." Her airy "voice" soothed you once again, but once again, you didn't know if it was sincere or just the temptation of a snake. Or wolf, rather.
As the transformation continued for what felt like about an hour, the effects began to show more vibrantly. The tingling, warm sensation and gray covering on your hands and feet turned snow white, and your palms and calluses developed pads, black as coal. Your mouth was filled with razor-sharp teeth, and many accidental bites led to you spitting blood. On top of that, your mouth elongated into a wolf-like muzzle. The wolfess spoke again, but her voice became clearer and less airy. "Wonderful. The transformation is continuing accordingly. You will become a member of the Lupusapiens in no time..." At that point, you were shocked. Confused. You were half-human, half-wolf and being treated by a giant talking wolfess who you recognized as your mother. Suddenly, you felt an unbearably terrible pain in your chest and the base of your spine. You fell to the ground in a fetal position, practically yelling in pain. The wolfess leaned down and nuzzled you; she seemed bigger than before. "Calm yourself, my child. It will all be over soon. Now rest; my husband, the Alpha male, will be pleased to see you in your Lupus form, Casine." You did not know what that last word was, but from how she said it, you assumed it was her name to you. You repeated it to yourself before blacking out from shock and pain. "Casine..."
111111.title: Becoming a Lupusapien

Well now what?

You didnt want to disturb them so you stayed silent. As you look down you see that your "hands" were now tiny paws. It was strange but almost felt natural for some reason. You could also feel your tail and your mouth felt the weirdest. Almost like someone had stretched it or something. He started to frown after he said this and with you realizing it you put your head on his paw. He looked down with is emerald green eyes and kind of blushed. 111112.title: Wolf Daddy.

1111121.content:
"So...what do I do?" you can't help but ask first. This was a little overwhelming after all. Your adopted wolf father smiles affectionately.
"Such a puppy..." You blush a little at that. "It's alright little one, don't worry about it right now, I'm going to help you through this. I told you I was going to protect you and I meant it. You're mine now, and I'm going to take care of you." You ponder over this for a moment in silence and feel hot tears of fear and exhaustion prick at your eyes your whole life has changed and now you really are helpless, you don't have any clue how to take care of yourself here. Then a big wet tongue starts licking all over you, and it tickles. You laugh despite yourself as you are pushed onto your back.
"Now lie still little one, it's time for your bath." The warm tongue cleans you all over, and you feel yourself relax. When he finishes, you realize how heavy your eyes feel. Trying to fight your exhaustion you shake the sleep away.
"Alright little one, time for sleep. Close your eyes, tomorrow we'll talk more." Despite the wolf's words you continue to fight sleep. He watches you struggle and finally give in to sleep. As you fade into sleep you hear him whisper affectionately,
"My silly little puppy."
You wake up the next morning alone on the bed. Stretching out you look around and wonder where your protector went. Hearing your stomach growl you realize how hungry you are. Should you wait for daddy wolf to return, or venture on your own for food?

11111212.title: Your hungry now!

111112122.content:
Looking up, you yelp at the sight of your protector, who doesn't look happy to see you.
"What are you doing?" His tone is even, but you can tell he isn't happy. "I was just..."
"I came back to the den fifteen minutes ago and you were gone! I had no idea why you left or where you'd gone! Luckily I caught your scent and was able to follow you or else who knows what could have...lets go home first, then we'll talk." You hang your head, and suddenly you feel his warm tongue on the back of your neck as he picks you up and carries you back to the den. You sulk a little, but realize he's probably right, you didn't even think of other animals living here. What if you had met a bear? The thought causes you to shiver. As you arrive back in the den, your put down on the bed.
"Now then pup..." his tone is still harsh you notice, but not without affection, "Why did you leave the den?"
"I was hungry and I didn't know where you were....so I..."
"Went to hunt on your own? Pup, you don't have sharp teeth, wolf senses, and you can't run very fast, what were you going to do if you ran into a bear or at your size, a fox?"
"...I....didn't think about it.." you admit quietly. He stares you down for a moment and you feel the tears come, ayou realize that you really are a helpless puppy.
You hear him sigh, and get up next to you on the bed. He starts licking your face in comfort and nuzzles you into laying next to him.
"I was so scared pup. When I came back and found you gone. I've already lost a son once, I don't want to lose you too."
You look at him questionably but decide now isn't the time. "I promised I would take care of you and I will, completely. For now, your just going to have to be completely dependent on me ok? I will feed you, protect you and even train you, but you have to let me little one."
"But you shouldn't have to do all that on your own its not fair.."
"I Want to do it puppy. I want to be your parent, but you have to let me, or you could get hurt." Your silent for awhile, his confession a little overwhelming for you. He WANTED you. He wanted to, essentially, baby you and take care of you. It sounded nice, and since you had never had a father, you couldn't help but jump all over the chance.
"I will...dad."
You see him smile as the words leave your lips and he nuzzles you for a few minutes. Then pulling away, he clears his throat.
"About punishment puppy..."
111112122.title: Papa wolf!

"Since you didn't really know better and I know you're still adjusting, consider this your ONLY warning. I should have made the rules clear yesterday, that was my mistake. One I intend to correct." You hear him clear his throat, "One and most important, you NEVER leave the den without me to protect you, not until you're a fully grown wolf, there are plenty of creatures in this wood that would kill a helpless puppy like you without thought. Ok pup?" You nod silently.
"Good. Then two. You're going to have to do as I say without question. If we are attacked or found I need to make sure you'll listen to me, alright?" again you nod quietly.
"Good. The final rule. You are a child, practically a baby now, you have to let me take care of you. I've gone through this before and I know what to expect. Is all this clear little one?" you nod mutely, your head down. So man changes, could you really live like a wolf? Suddenly you feel something warm wrap around you. Looking down you see your dad's tail, trying to keep you warm. Looking into the wolf's face you see concern echoing there for you. You can't stand it and you start to tear up.
"Shh...its alright baby, shhh little puppy, Daddy has you." you snuggle up to him and fall asleep. You have strange dreams and when you wake up you have ....

11111212211222.content:
You look at yourself as much as you can manage and actually start to feel kind of happy with the changes. So far you look like furry person and had the ears and tail of a wolf. As you think about how happy you are about all of this, you notice your tail wagging and then suddenly hear giggling. With you're new hearing senses, you caught the sound and looked quickly at the source, feeling your tail go between your legs in embarrassment. "What's so funny?" Your new father looks away playfully and grunts. You take it as if he said 'nothing' and continue to look around, until a sudden pain appeared around your mouth.It felt as if someone grabbed your mouth, including your nose, and started pulling it. You yell a little and for some reason, even whimper at times. You heard another set of whimpers and look in the corner of your eye to see that your dad looks a little uneasy watching you go through this stage. For his sake, you tried to hold in some outbursts.
