11112211111.content:
Suddenly, the Alpha Male changes expressions and, to your eye, it seems to be almost a smile! He moved towards you again as you draw in another deep breath to howl again. Only, he 'gently' pushed his paw against your gut as you were releasing the air. A strong, melodious howl echoed from your throat, almost in perfect tune with the other wolves as they then howled with you.

"He's teaching me how to howl!" you thought, frightened and awed at the same time. "What will he do if I fail?"

You drew in a deep breath, not wanting to suddenly insult them by stopping and the Alpha Male pushed against your gut, forcing your breath up quickly. Another strong, melodious howl came forth only, this time, it was perfect and the other wolves joined you. As you took in yet another deep breath, the Alpha Male took away his paw. You guessed that it was now time to prove you could do it on your own.

"Get it right, boy!" you thought to yourself. "Or you'll be on the menu!"

You then roughly forced your gut to pushed inward and let out a powerful howl that seemed to echo throughout the massive cave. For a brief moment, all of the wolves were silent and you began to wonder if you had failed. Then, the Alpha Male howled with you as if to say 'well done' with the other wolves quickly following.

"I did it!" you thought, excited, despite the real danger you were in. "I let out my very first true wolf howl!"

For the next several minutes, you sang with the wolves, your joint calls echoing into the night sky. You began to suspect that the wolves had accepted you, but feared that you were a long way from becoming one with the pack.

"I had better give it my all from now on if I want to stay alive." you thought, howling with the wolves. "My life, as I knew it is over, for now. I must learn the ways of the wolf!"

Later that night, the Alpha Female took you into her mouth as she had brought you in and carried you to another part of the cave where she gently placed you down. You immediately fell to all fours, not wanting to be killed as she then came around to the front of you and laid down, showing you her many swollen breasts. You looked at her, uncertain and she gave a low whimper as if to say 'trust me'.

"What does she want of me?" you wondered, not daring to speak.

Then, the alpha Male nudged you closer to her and you saw drops of milk on the nipple of each of her breasts! It then became clear to you... "Oh, God!" you thought, stunned. "She wants to breast feed me!"

You were very hungry but you were not sure about becoming the Alpha Female's 'baby'. Finally, you move in and accept the milk, as a wolf cub should, knowing that you had to adapt or perish. Surprisingly, it was not all that bad and you began to slowly drink your fill.
11112211111.title: You are taught how to howl!

111122111111.content:
With each swallow of the Alpha female's milk, you became more and more sleepy. This alarmed you in a way as you noticed the other wolves moving in closer to watch. For all you knew, they were planning to devour you in your sleep but you did not dare stop 'nursing'. You feared that, if you did stop, the Alpha female would take offense and strike you down.

"I have no choice." you thought, your eyes becoming heavy. "I can only pray that I wake up in the morning in one piece."

Soon after, you fell into a deep sleep and, unknown to you, the Alpha female stayed by your side as she would one of her own cubs while you slept. You woke up early the next morning, and moved to stand up, thinking the events of last night was only a dream. However, the Alpha female was quick to push you back down.

"You best stay on all fours, if you want to live, little one." she said.
At this point, you realized that it was not a dream and turned to the Alpha female, shocked and horrified. "You... you can speak my language!?!" you whispered.

"No, you hear your language, thanks to my milk." explained the Alpha female. "I hear your language, thanks to the blood I drank from your wounds when I first met you." she paused. "You did not say anything last night... wise choice."

"Why did you bring me here?" you asked, hoping not to offend her.

"I had lost a cub, not too long ago to a rival pack." replied the Alpha female, sadly. "He was about your size when he passed away. When I found you, I felt pity and decided to take you in Your wise choices thus far have amused the Alpha male which is the only reason why you are still alive."

"So, I have a chance." you said, hopeful.

"You have a chance." confirmed the Alpha female. "Just one chance. If you fail once, at any time, you risk being mauled, killed or eaten. If I had just left you where you were, you would be dead by now for certain."

You swallowed hard. "What do I have to do to stay alive?" you asked.

"You must learn to be a wolf and earn your way into the pack." replied the Alpha female. "You may call me mum but not openly as you are still an outcast. As you earn your rights, you will learn the names of the others."

"What is expected of me for now?" you asked.

Mum gave a short series of grunts, as if to laugh. "A curious one, you are." she said. "Expect to be pushed around a lot and offered little to no help from the others until you can learn to keep up." she paused. "Living in the wild is not easy and any mistake will cost you your life."

With that said, she fell silent and began to clean you as she would her own cub. You could feel her heavy rough tongue moving over your body as your clothing slowly began to fall apart. Before she was done cleaning you, all of your clothing had been removed and you stood there, naked, on all fours. Your new life had begun and you wondered how long you could last.
111122111111.title: The milk makes you sleepy.

1111221111112.content:
Not long after you were stripped of the connection you had to your old life, the Alpha male charged out of the cave with the subordinates following and a smaller, seemingly weaker female wolf following behind. You were surprised that she was close to your own size. "That is Karna, who you would call the Omega wolf." said mum, quietly. "You will have to compete with her for your food as both she and you will eat last."

"Then I had better get on the hunt!" you said, charging forward.

Again, mum gave a series of low grunts, laughing. "Good luck, little one." she said, running passed you.

You ran as fast as you could, using all fours. Not being used to it placed you at a high disadvantage and Karna passed you easily, though she did not laugh. She seemed to be saving all of her energy to win her daily meal. You took it as a bad sign and pushed yourself harder, determined to earn your own meal. Being a track champion, you knew the proper way to breath so to get more out of every breath and you were soon able to catch up, slowly adjusting to running on all fours.

"I hope there's something left for me when I get there." you thought, barely keeping up with Karna. "It's tricky, running like this, I'm going to be sore in the morning."

Finally, you and Karna reached the site of the kill, it was a pair of adult does they had caught off guard. There seemed to be plenty for all but, observing how they viciously pushed Karna away, you knew that it was going to take a fight to get even a scrap off the bone. Normally, you would not have dreamed of eating deer meat raw but it was either act as one of the pack or become part of their next meal. You waited patiently for your opportunity to grab a piece, watching the other wolves carefully as they were all eying you and Karna while they ate their fill.

"Be patient!" you thought, warning yourself. "If worse comes to worse, you can track down your own meal, I've seen enough Survivor Man shows to know what I can eat raw and survive."

Eventually, the wolves left the two carcasses and you and Karna cautiously stepped in, looking to see if anything was left from the feeding frenzy. To your dismay, there was not much there for one, let alone two individuals of your size. That was when you heard Karna growling angrily nearby. You quickly turned around and saw her bearing her fangs, she was challenging you for the leftovers!

"So this is where my life as a human ends and my life as a wolf begins." you thought. "If I fight her, I risk being an outcast for life, or worse. If I win, I get to eat but gain a biter rival..."

What do you do?
1111221111112.title: 'Sibling' rivalry.

11112211111121.content:
Deciding that you had to draw the line somewhere, you showed your own teeth and gave a loud growl of your own, answering Karna's challenge. You did not have any fangs or claws but you had your wits and your fists. You and Karna circled each other for a moment before she swiped her paw, trying yo slash your face. Only you were ready for that and dodged it before swinging a hard fist, narrowly missing her face.

"There's no turning back now." you thought. "I had answered her challenge, I have to fight to win!"

Although you dared not turn away to look, you knew that the rest of the pack was watching. You were fighting for more than your right to eat next, you were fighting for your very survival, Karna may decide to eat you if she defeats you. Karna lunged forward, catching you off guard as your mind was on the pack. You tried to dodge her but she managed to catch your left ear and bits off a good chunk of it. You howled in pain, cursing your momentary lack of focus then went on the offensive yourself, clipping her in the nose with a heavy swing of your right fist.

"I know that had to hurt." you thought, hearing Karna howl in pain herself. "I can't let up though, not while I have the momentum, I have to get her to yield!"

You noticed a recent wound on Karna's right shoulder, most likely from one of the subordinates, and drove your fist there next, forcing her let out a low whimper. Then, to your surprise, she came back with a strong swing of her paw and struck your head, nearly knocking you out as it hit the ground. You looked up at her, still bearing your teeth, as you felt the blood from the scratches she left on your head drip down your face. Fortunately, you had been in a few rough fights and you were able to take a lot of punishment.

"She's not bad of a fighter." you thought, trying to ignore your pain. "But so am I!"

You responded to Karna's blow you your head with a heavy blow of your own as she came in close to bite you. Your fist struck her hard in the left eye, forcing her to back away, whimpering. You then jumped up and grabbed her right ear with your teeth and pulled her head down before striking her again, in her wounded right shoulder before ripping off a piece of her ear with a heavy jerk of your head. Karna howled and whimpered before quickly retreating to a low spot in the ground, clear of you and the other wolves, you were victorious.

"Well done, little one." said mum, quietly, stepping up to you. "The rest of the kill is yours, leave what you wish to Karna when you are done." then you heard what sounded like a sigh and you began to get worried.

"How long has it been since she last ate?" you quietly asked.

"Karna has not fed for three kills." replied mum. "She must learn to fight more viscously or find her own food. If not, she will grow even weaker and either be killed during a hunt or be eaten by one of the subordinates."

You turned to Karna, concerned, and heard her whimpering as she held her head very low to the ground. "Oh, man!" you thought, kicking yourself. "She's crying!" a low sigh escaped your lips. "I just can't let her go hungry like that!"

Not certain what your actions would bring, you looked over the carcasses and spotted an entire leg that the other wolves had missed! It was certainly enough meat to fill your belly so you knew that it would feed hers. The only question was so you offer her the meat and eat the scraps ot take the meat and leave the scraps for her?

Thinking it over, you decided that you needed an ally and Karna sure seemed to need a friend as well. You took the bone of the leg in tour mouth and dragged it away from the carcass , as if you feast upon it in private. Only, as you passed Karna, you suddenly gave it a heavy push, sending it rolling into her. Karna let out a low yelp of surprise then looked at you as if she was uncertain.

"Eat." you said. then walked back to the carcasses, still on all fours, and began to work what little meat was left off the bones, knowing that you could adapt and find a lizard or grub to eat sometime later.

Karna, as you noticed, had accepted your offering and was eating hungrily while you worked on the scraps, hoping that you had made an ally.

Was this a wise decision?
11112211111121.title: Fight Karna

111122111111211.content:
The alpha female said "what are you doing?" but before she could say anything else the alpha male had walked up and interupted her. "I see you are looking out for the pack, even if not fully one of us." you saw karna stairing at the alpha incase he told her to back down. The alpha smiled "well done, looking out for allys is a good choice and will bring rewards even if you suffer because of it." you nodded "thank you"

Later that day you were walking around the packs land with karna who had been told to give you a tour. She said "thank you for earlyer, no wolf would have done that." you noticed you could understand the wolves better and vice verser. "no problem, I saw you were hungry and just couldn't leave you there to starve." you both stopped at a line of trees "this is the easten boundry, across it is the bears lands and we have a netural relashion ship with them so don't cross it." you said "sure" you headed of into the woods.

You were both walking along talking when you saw a pair of deer of guard drinking from a river. You said "shall we take one each or team up to take one." she smiled at her getting the choice and then said...
111122111111211.title: Aproval

choices: Go for the healthier one and hope it does not injur you.
1111221111112112.content: "I think that we should take on one as a team, that way we have a better chance of taking it down." Karna said. "Ok so which one should it be, one looks a bit older than the other, although it isn't as big." You replied gesturing to the deer on the left. "I don't know, if we take down the healthy one then we get more resect for taking it down." She said. "That is a good point but if we take down the older one then we will at least get some credit and it would be easier to kill. But if we go after the healthier one we have a chance were one of us can get seriously injured if not worse." You say, shuddering at the thought.
1111221111112112.title: Which one.

111122111111212.content:
"Sorry, little one." said mum, seeing your act of compassion. "Though I am sure Karna appreciates your offer of food, she will still fight you at the next kill."

"Wait." you whispered. "I won the fight, doesn't that mean I move in in ranks?"

Mum shook her head. "Sorry, no." she said. "You did not work for your meal, you just came to eat, that earns you nothing in the pack." she paused. "However, by offering Karna the larger share of what's left, who does work for her meal, you have earned some respect."

"Which means...?" you asked.

Mum gave your wounds a quick once over with her tongue, dulling the pain. "You live another day." she whispered. "Work for your meal at the next kill and win your chance to eat next against Karna, that is the only way you will advance." she paused. "Be warned, though, she will not be as easy to beat next time."

You shivered at the thought as you had barely managed to defeat her the first time and began to gnaw on what was left of the scraps, trying to ignore the smell of the fresh kill and the taste of the other wolves' saliva on the bones. You had not advanced any, you were still seen as an outcast, but you had earned some respect from the others.

"As mum told me, I live another day." you thought, chewing on the rough, raw meat. "However, I had better be ready when the pack hunts again if I am going to gain any ground in this new life."

Once you were done eating what you could, you followed the pack back to the cave with Karna staying close. She gave you a quick lick in the face. "Thank you for the offering." she whispered carefully. "But don't think that means I will go easy on you at the next kill."

With that said, she hurried passed as you moved to keep up. "Why don't we team up at the next kill and move up the ranks together?" you asked, quietly.

Karna gave the same series of low grunts, forming a laugh. "If we did that, the pack might start to see us as mates." she replied, amused. "Do you really want that?" she 'laughed' again. "I'm sure, as a human, you are quite handsome but as a wolf, you leave much to be desired."

Karna gave a loud series of grunts, laughing at you before strutting into the cave, up to mum, who 'laughed' as well, after listening to her. You blushed brightly as mum came up to you with what appeared to be a smile. "You have much to learn, little one." she told you, amused as well. "What Karna told you is not entirely true but what you suggested will seem strange to the others, I am not sure how they would react."

"Just trying to make peace." you whispered, still blushing."

"You already have." replied mum. "If you had not, you would have shared the fate of those two deer."

She then left you to find a comfortable spot to sleep while a subordinate took first watch over the pack. You guessed against the rival pack mum mentioned. After you had found a spot the other wolves did not protest against you taking, you fell asleep, unaware that Karna had taken a place right next to you. Although your actions gained you little ground, you had earned some respect. Unknown to you, the Alpha male had decided your place in the pack, you were the new Omega and Karna was ordered to watch over you
.
111122111111212.title: This changes little.

choices: You made a mistake, wait your turn.
1111221111112121.content:
You are the first to wake the next morning and see a deer walk, unaware, passed the cave entrance. Your mouth began to water as you did not get much to eat the day before. As a human, you were not really a hunter but you saw yourself as a fair fighter and you had proven yourself one, facing Karna.

"I have to try." you thought to yourself, determined to win your meal.

Moving as quietly as you could, you carefully crept out of the cave, into the morning light. Unknown to you, the Alpha male was awake and watching. He nudged his mate, mum, waking her, and she watched you with a certain curiosity. Using what you knew about how other predators hunted, you stayed as low to the ground as you could, trying your best to stay down wind so the doe would not pick up your scent. Once you were close enough, you jumped the doe, hoping to knock her off balance and quickly get your arms around her head to snap her neck. It would be quick and the doe would die instantly.

"Careful." you thought to yourself, eying the doe's hooves. "She could really tear you up if you let her."

By this time, the other wolves were awake and watching you as well. Finally, you were in a position where you believed you had a good chance and made your move. Unfortunately, while you were so focused upon the doe, you failed to sense the buck who the Alpha male saw right away. You were knocked away by him, sending you tumbling but you were back on all fours in the next breath, growling at him.

"Damn it!" you thought. "Why didn't I see him coming!?"

The buck brought up his two front hooves and brought then down upon you but, fearing for your life, you quickly dodged his blow and growled again, hoping to last long enough to wear it down. While you were 'locking horns' with the buck, the Alpha male ordered the pack onto the hunt and they made short work taking down the doe, no longer being protected by its larger and more powerful mate. The buck again attacked you but missed as you dodged again, noticing that one of the buck's rear legs was shaking badly.

"It must have been injured there recently." you thought, surprised by how quickly you were spotting such things. "If I could throw it off balance..."

The buck reeled you back into the present with a charge of it antlers, which you barely managed to dodge, then moved to charge again. This time, you were ready and charged him as well! Unknown to you, being focused on your fight, the pack hesitated, seeing your bold move, and watched as you jumped aside at the last second and wrapped yourself around the buck's hind legs. He have out a loud sound of surprise then came crashing down, his head striking a large rock with the full force of his weight. A loud bone breaking crack was heard and the buck immediately fell silent.

"Did I do it?" you asked yourself, whispering. "Is he dead?"

You carefully pulled yourself away from the buck's hind legs then moved on all fours to his front. His eyes were open but unmoving and there was a small but steady stream of blood running from the rock under his head. The buck was clearly dead, you had made your first kill.

"I did it!" you whispered, slightly proud of yourself. "I faced a full grown buck and took it down!"

"What you did was very foolish, little one." scolded mum, walking up to you. "What you should have done was alert me or the Alpha male of the potential meal outside our cave." she paused, eying your kill. "I am impressed by your success but remember, the pack hunts as a team for a reason, better chances of continued success."

"Have I earned my meal?" you asked, knowing that an apology at this point would be futile.

The Alpha male approached you, his face covered in the doe's blood and eyed your kill before turning mum and gave her a quick nod before tearing into the flesh as mum then turned to you. "You may eat your fill with us today." she told you. "This is your reward for your first kill but do not expect any favors tomorrow, you must learn to hunt with the pack."

With that, she fell silent and began to eat as well with you left wondering if you actually deserve to dine with the Alpha male and female, mum.

What do you do?
1111221111112121.title: Your first kill.

11112211111121212.content:
"I... I acted out of line." you said, to mum. "I don't deserve the honor.... I'll wait."

"You are learning, young one." said the Alpha male, speaking to you for the first time. "You may yet survive."

With that, he returned to his meal, not speaking a word but taking his fill. Mum also did not speak a word to you but she did occasionally throw you what you had come to know as a grin. Though you feared you were far from being fully accepted, you sensed that were gaining more respect within the pack. Karna ate with the other subordinates, also giving you an occasional glance while you patiently waited, your stomach complaining.

"I feel honored that the Alpha male spoke to me, finally." you thought. "Maybe now, the others will soon follow." you moaned inside. "Oh, so hungry..."

Nearly an hour later, the pack had ate their fill and you were relived to find that there was plenty left of the kill for you to feast upon. You took at the deer carcass and began to take in your fill, moaning slightly as you were starving. Then, you noticed your refection in a puddle of the deer's blood, it seemed as if you had the beginnings of a beard and mustache on your face. This caused you give a grunt like laugh.

"What is is, little one?" asked mum, curious, coming to your side. she rubbed her face against yours in a gesture of caring. "Did you find something humorous?"

"I'm starting to look like a wolf in the face." you replied, quietly.

Mum looked at your face and 'smiled'. "That you are." she said. "Finish eating, the others are waiting for you, they wish to return to the den to sleep."

You nodded and went on to finish eating your fill. Only, unknown to you, as you were learning, you were also changing. In time, you would literally one with the pack, if you survive.

Later, at the den...
11112211111121212.title: You are learning and changing.

choices: Humans but you are not told.
111122111111212121.content:
Later, at the den, one of the subordinates jumped you from behind and began to gnaw on your neck! You yelled out and was about to shake him off but then you noticed that the wolf as not biting down very hard.

"What!?!" you thought.

Then it dawned on you that the wolf subordinate was only playing, practicing for the next kill without intentionally hurting you in any way. You shook your body, throwing the wolf off of you then jumped him in return, throwing playful fists into his sides and shoulders as if you were in a mock fight at school. You heard the familiar 'laugh' from the subordinate as another wolf jumped you, knocking you off the other.

"You must remember, we hunt as a team." said the second subordinate, pinning you down. "He is Jargon, I am Khan, we are the lead attackers behind the Alpha male."

"If you want to move up in ranks, little one, you must learn to stay alert at all times and fight with everything you have." said Jargon. "What happened during your first kill tell us that you need to learn."

"How would you get out of this?" asked Khan, still holding you down. "By now, I could have killed and eaten you."

You smiled, careful not to show your teeth as you knew it would be seen as a challenge. "With my feet." you replied.

Khan 'laughed' but it did not last long as you kicked up your feet and pushed him off of you with one move before pinning him down yourself. "See?"

"You are a strange creature, little one." said Khan.

Remembering Khan's lesson to stay alert, you heard Jargon coming and jumped away just in time, causing Jargon to lad on top of Khan. The two began to roll about, 'laughing' as the playing continued.

"You are earning more respect by the day, little one." said mum, stepping up behind you. "Soon, you will be accepted and, by then, you will be a wolf yourself."

Part of you wanted to scream at that statement as you started out human, lost from your family. Yet another part of you wanted to celebrate as you were really growing attached to your new family. you looked at your hands and were almost surprised to find that you had grown a lot more hair. Also, you noticed that you had grown large calluses that resembled the pads on a wolf's paws and that your finger nails had become more narrow and slightly more pointed. Your body was slowly transforming, just as mum had said, you were becoming a wolf...

"I don't know weather to see this as a dream come true or a nightmare." you thought. "What can I do?"

That night, as you tried to sleep, you heard something moving outside. Remembering your lesson from your first kill, yo woke mum and alerted her. She in turn awoke the Alpha male who trotted out to investigate. It was...
111122111111212121.title: Wolves at play.

1111221111112121211.content:
While you stayed inside and tried to listen to what was going on outside the Alpha Male woke up the Beta Male and two subordinates and together they went out to investigate. The Alpha Male led the way as they patrolled the edge of their territory looking for the noise. Soon they found it. It was a trio of wolfs and from the looks of it a rival pack. The Alpha Male and his band laid close to the ground and watched them. If the wolfs were just scouting then there was no need to fight them. Instead they would increase the watches once the wolfs left. The Pack's territory was the largest of the various wolf packs in the forest and was close to a river and had high rocky cliffs to protect its rear. The pack had defended this area for many generations and many other packs were their enemies, luckily their pack was one of the strongest due to the position of their territory.
As they watched the wolfs moving around, the Alpha Male found it hard to distinguish their motives. They were moving along like they were scouting but also laying low to the ground in attack positions. Turning to the Beta Male the Alpha whispered.
"Felix what do you think? Should we attack." The second in command shook his head and whispered back.
"If we do that we may alert the rest of their pack plus they haven’t entered too deep into our territory to warrant such aggressive behaviour."

Back in the save you stayed awake and listened to the conversation. You wondered what would happen if the wolfs attacked. You didn't want to lose your family so early on, but you reminded yourself that this kind of thing must have happened many times before.

Back at the woods the wolfs waited. They were in attack position in case the wolfs stuck and far back enough to hide. What did the rival wolfs do.
1111221111112121211.title: A rival pack.

111122111111212122.content:
That night, you curl up next to mum and sleep. As you do, you begin to dream.In the dream, you are standing on top of the alpha male's "throne". The pack surrounds you, bowing their heads while the Alpha male's body lays at your feet. Mum climbs to stone stairs up to you and says something, but you can't make out what.


There is a bright light, and everything goes white. When it clears, you are laying beside Karna, as she nurses a group of pups. Your pups. She licks you affectionately as you stroke her back.


There is a bright flash again. This time you look over your children who are now grown. Only they now look like wolves, but their bodies are built like a human's. They are Anthropomorphic wolves.


Then, another flash. This time, your are fighting against one of your children. A black wolf with blood red eyes. You slash and bite at each other, leaving many wounds on the other. Before the winner can be determined, there is yet another flash.


Now, you are walking out of the forest alongside two humans, into a huge crowd of other humans, mostly reporters and camera men, saying about you and your previous disappearance.


Another flash, and then you wake up. You stare at the cave ceiling as you ponder your dreams. "Could these have been visions of the future?" You think to yourself. "If so, then that means that I will challenge the alpha male, Have Karna as my mate, father anthro wolves, battle one of my own children, and be found again by humanity."


As you think, Mum wakes up. "What's wrong dear?" she asks.


"Nothing." You say. "Just a dream." You roll over and try to go back to sleep.

But Mum rolls you back towards her and looks you in the eyes. "What did you dream of?"


"Nothing." You say.


"Don't lie to me." She warns. "Dreams of often premonitions of things yet to be. What did you dream?"
111122111111212122.title: Visions of the Future?

choices: You deny it, try to escape.
1111221111112121221.content:
"I... I dreamed that I had won my place as the Alpha male." you replied quietly. "I then saw myself with Karna, she was nursing puppies, our children."

"I see." said mum, quietly. "What else did you see?"

You sighed. "I saw myself fighting one of my pups, all grown, for my place in the pack." you described the wolf. "Before I saw who won, the dream changed to me being lead out of the forest by humans with several others around me, talking about how I had vanished so long ago."

Mum was silent for a moment then licked my face. "First, all wolves strive to rise in the ranks of the pack." she told you. "Second, we all know you have feelings for Karna. If you had not, you would not have given her such a large share of the kill you had won."

You blushed at that. "I... I do like her." you said. "But, I'm a man and she is a wolf...."

Mum responded with the quick series of grunts you had come to recognize as a laugh. "You are not human anymore." she said quietly. "Not fully, anyway." she gave you a 'grin'. "Look at your paws."

Curious, you looked down and saw that your hands had become more harry than usual and that a number of thick calluses had formed, looking like the pads on the feet of a wolf. You also noticed that your finger nails had become slightly more pointed. "I'm... changing?" you asked, whispering.

"There are not too many of us left." explained mum. "It was decided that we would increase our numbers by selecting one of those who hunt us and make him one of us."

Mum's words shocked you. "How?"

"We have our ways but, for now, let us say that you are the first in this pack." she replied. "You have a choice now, let the animal within you out and become one with the pack or fight it and well, you know what that will bring."

With that said, mum gave you another affectionate lick on the face and went back to sleep while you found it impossible, pondering over your fate.
1111221111112121221.title: Tell her

11112211111121212211.content:
You lay awake for another hour or so, pondering what you should do. "Well, I suppose I should just follow through with it." You think to yourself. "After all, from what I saw, it looks like it'll be a pretty good life, at least by wolf standards. And eventually, I'll be found by civilization again."


You smile and close your eyes. "Besides, Sci-Fi stories have taught me anything, it's that trying to avoid a certain fate is what causes that fate to happen. Plus, anyone else in my position would do the same. Who wants to be an outcast for the rest of their life?" You fall asleep soundly, knowing what is to soon come.


The next few weeks, you try to come up with a strategy on how you would go about your future. In the meantime, you practice running on all fours, and are getting rather good at. You can nearly keep up with the other wolves now.


Karna still fights with you over food, and it usually ends with her bleeding. But when the others aren't looking, you say you're sorry to her, and sometimes lick her wounds. She never responds to this, but lets you lick her anyway.


When you're not hunting or fighting, you spend your time thinking of how to go about fulfilling your visions. Fighting the alpha male would be a challenge to say the least. He has brute strength on his side, but you have your intelligence and could be able to outwit him.


As for Karna becoming your mate, well, you really didn't know how to go about that. Maybe you could get her to go out with you. Find some dinner, maybe watch the moon together, and eventually, mate.


However, your not sure if the visions you saw were in the exact order they would happen. Should you challenge the alpha male first, or spend some time with Karna?
11112211111121212211.title: You accept your fate.

111122111111212122112.content:
You had just gotten strong enough to keep up with Karna and she was the weakest of the pack, going after the Alpha male so soon would be suicide. You decided to try your luck with winning Karna's affections first. You started with giving her an occasional rub with your body, which had become more harry than any 'human' you had ever met. Karna did not return your slight advances but she did not reject them either.

"I think I'm starting to really like you, Karna." you said, quietly.

Karna responded with the quick series of grunts that made a laugh. "Careful, you are not the only one trying to win me." she replied quietly. "I'm the only female in the pack, other than the Alpha female and she has a mate."

You inwardly moaned. "You mean I'm going to have to fight the others to..." you stopped yourself cold, blushing.

"...to mate with me?" asked Karna with a 'grin'. "If that is what you want, then yes."

"I barely won my meals from you."

Karna 'laughed'. "Yet you are the new Omega." she replied. "Your old life has spoiled you. Nothing out here is easy, you have to kill your meal, fight for your right to eat, win your mate through fierce struggles..." she paused. "There is but one rule out here, adapt or die."

You swallowed hard at that then eyed the subordinates, who were all throwing you light growls of warning. It did not take a genius to realize that mating season was approaching.

"I like you too, little one." said Karna. "Only, I must bow to the victor or die myself."

You sighed then turned to the subordinates. "Alright." you said to them. "Who's first?"

One of the wolves answered your challenge and charged forward, bearing his fangs...
111122111111212122112.title: In the wild, nothing is easy.

choices: The rest of the pack back away in fear
1111221111112121221122.content:
The wolf rushes towards you, snarling, saliva flying from its' maw. You brace yourself and clench your fists. This is going to be one hell of a fight.


The wolf leaps, it's mouth wide open, rage in its' eyes, ready to chomp on your throat. You swing your fist, connecting with the wolf's face in midair. The wolf lands on its' side and immediately gets back up and charges you again.


This time he tackles you, pinning you to the floor. You grab his neck and keep him elevated off of you, as he snaps and snarls in you face. His breath reeks of dead game and blood, making you gag.


You get an idea. It's a low move, but you don't have a choice. You raise your knee between the wolf's hind legs and launch it upwards.


The wolf lets out shrill howl and a whine of pain, as it is distracted long enough for you to throw him off of you. The wolf gets back up again and you stare each other down, waiting for the next move.


Suddenly, another wolf ambushes you from behind! It leaps onto your back and tears into your flesh. It snaps it's jaws down onto your shoulder, it's teeth sinking deep.


You scream. Not from the pain, but from something else.


When that wolf bit you, something deep inside you awoke. Some sort of great, animalistic rage. Your muscles clench, you let out a deep primal growl, then a mighty roar!


You violently shake yourself, rocking the wolf still holding onto you back and forth until it was a blur. Finally, it releases it's jaw from your shoulder and fall onto it's side.


You raise your now claw-like nails, and slash them across the wolf's stomach, leaving deep gashes across its' belly. The wolf cries in pain,you punch it in the gut and it heaves forward, and collapses on the floor whimpering.


One down.


You turn towards the first wolf. It tries to look threatening, but you can see the fear in its' eyes. It charges for the third time. This time, you charge too, ramming into it in midair and slamming it into the cave wall.


It lets out a squeal of shock as you chomp down on it's neck. It cries in pain as you shake you head back and forth, deepening the wound. "Submit!" You snarl through the fur and blood that fills your mouth.


You finally let go of the neck and look at your handiwork. The wolf now lays there, paws over its; head, shuddering and whining in fear.


You have won.


You pounce back into the circle of wolves, raise your head, and let out a howl of victory! A full blown, true blooded wolf howl!


You turn to the remaining wolves. "Who else wants some!?"
1111221111112121221122.title: It's on Now!

choices: You back down, an Omega once more.
11112211111121212211221.content:
The other wolves back away, bowing their heads and, for a brief moment, you thought you had finally earned their respect. That idea died the instant a powerful blow to your head sent you rolling across the ground. You quickly returned to all fours, angry, only to find yourself facing the powerful Alpha male.

"Mind your place, small one." he warned quietly. "You're still too weak to be making enemies now."

With that, he trotted away but paused at the first wolf who had attacked you and grunted something to him. You were not sure what it was but the subordinate did not seem to like it at all as he began to whimper miserably. Then, mum came out and approached you, she did not seem pleased at all. "You won your mate, little one." she said. "You have also won a new rank in the pack, Jargon is now the Omega as you have defeated him. You are now a subordinate."

"Then I have raised in the ranks." you said, trying to sound bold.

Mum turned to you, her eyes glaring into yours. "Jargon will do everything he can to win his place back quickly, little one." she warned. "You won your mate..." she then gave you what looked like an evil smile. "...go mate with her."

You turned to Karna, who lowered her head as if to be submissive, causing you to swallow hard. "If I knew it was going to happen this fast, I would have waited." you thought.
11112211111121212211221.title: The pack is afraid but not of you.

111122111111212122112211.content:
You approach Karna, who looks up at you and sighs. "Well, you won me fair and square. Might as well get it over with." She turns around and bends over, presenting her rump to you.


"Wait wait wait, we don't have to do it right now." You say. Karna turns around to face you. "So, you don't don't want to mate with me?" She almost sounds hurt.


"No no no, I do!" You say quickly. "But first, I want to talk to you. Follow me." You quickly turn to mum. "We're going out to The Cliff." She smiles and nods. "Don't be too long, little one."


The Cliff was, of course, a cliff that overlooked a sparkling river, that looked like something out of a painting. Karna follows you out of the cave to the cliff. As you approach it, you begin to feel woozy. You did lose a good bit of blood fighting for Karna.


You both sit near the edge of the cliff. Karna notices your still open wounds. "Let me get that for you." She starts licking your wounds, numbing them. "Thanks." You say when she finishes.


"You did the same for me." She says. You both look out at the landscape. The moon is full and high, casting a reflection in the river below. "Isn't it beautiful?" Karna asks. "Yeah. Lovely." You say.


After ten minutes of admiring the view, your remember why you brought her here. "Karna, I have something to tell you."


"What is it?" She asks.


You tell her about the vision you had of her and you together. "So.....you and me......we're......."


"Meant to be together." You finish.


Karna licks you on the lips. "I always thought so." She says.


You both look up and let out a long, loud howl at the moon. Back at the cave, mum hears you howl and smiles. "I guess he's not so little anymore." She thinks to herself.


"So, wanna do it now?" Karna asks.


"Right here?" You ask.


She nods.


"Well, I did earn it."
111122111111212122112211.title: Can You Feel the Love Tonight?

1111221111112121221122111.content:
Early the next morning, you woke up, lying next to your mate, Karna. Mating was interesting for you as fighting for your mate had caused the changes you were going through to accelerate, making you basically more wolf than human.

"Last night was amazing, I felt as if we were one." you whispered. "I don't remember what my life was like before mum found me in the woods but I know I will never forget this."

Karna licked my face. "You are now a member of the pack." she said. "Soon, you and I will have a pack of our own."

You smiled at that, as much as your evolving face would allow. Only inside, you sighed, worried. "There is no turning back now that I may be the father to a little of pups." you thought. "My new life as truly begun."
1111221111112121221122111.title: The next day

11112211111121212211221111.content:
The next few weeks we're pretty uneventful. You still went with the rest of the pack for food, but now you were able to run ahead of Karna. Not surprising, since her bulging belly was slowing her down.


The two of you were feasting on a deer, talking. "Karna, why don't you just stay at the cave, and I'll bring you some meat back?"


"I doubt you could bring enough to satisfy me." She said between bites. "I'm eating for more than one now. "


"Yeah, but don't you get tired, running with the extra cargo?" You ask.


"Yes. But I'm going to be a mother, I have to feed my cubs."


As you continue eating, your thoughts wonder to how you're going to challenge the alpha male. You're much stronger than you were before, and if you can take on two wolves at once, you could surely take on another. What made him any different from the other wolves?


Or, maybe you should wait until after your cubs are born. If you did die, you wouldn't want them to grow up without at least knowing their father. What to do?
11112211111121212211221111.title: The Next Stage

111122111111212122112211112.content:
Remembering what little of your old life you can you remember that the alpha wolf may kill pups that aren't his. So you decide to wait until your stronger to fight him.

Later that night as you laid down next to Karna mum walked up to you. "Allpha would like a word with you." She said as she stopped in front of you. You nod and stand as you see the alpha walk out of the cave. You follow shotly after. "You wanted to see me?" You say and bow at thesame time. "Yes little one. Come walk with me." You look at him confused for he seemed too calm but you do as you are told. You walk along the limit of the packs territory before the alpha stops and turns to you. "I have heard that you had a vision. One that would cause me to tear anyone else apart." You look down as he speaks."I am getting old. And I fear that the rivil packs know it." You look up and see that he is truly worried. "A war between us and another pack is about to start. If I fall you will be thye alpha." You nod and see that he just made you beta of the pack. You walk back to the cave and lay next to Karna knowing your new title and rank.

Not much later you wake to the sound of a duel. You quickly go to wake mum but she is gone. You run outside to see the alpha fighting another member but he seems to be loseing. You look to see that mum and Karna are standing to the side so you walk up to them. "What going on?" You ask. "It was a challenege." Mum replied. You look up to see the alpha throw the challeneger before pounceing on him. "Yield!!!" You hear the alpha yell. "I.....I surrender." You hear the challeneger say. The alpha moves and walks away. "Get out of my territory." The alpha said as he turned his head. The challeneger turns and starts to walk away as the alpha reaches you. "I must rest. You are to lead the pack in the hunt." The alpha says as he looks at you. You nod as you step aside to let him pass. The rest of the pack is starting to walk out at this point. Karna and mum follow alpha back into the cave. "Come, let us hunt." You order. The others follow you but you see the former beta stare you down and you can tell he plans to fight you.
111122111111212122112211112.title: Wait untilthe pups are born

1111221111112121221122111121.content:
After you and the pack eat to your fill you order three others to carry food for the alpha and the females. When the former beta Jargon walked in front you with an angry look on his face. "What are you playing at?" Jargon said as he started walk around. "What do you mean Jargon?" You ask. "You were brought here by the alpha female and not once did you try to leave. So why are you here? Why do you stay?" Jargon said lettin his angry show. "I have adapted to this way of life and decided not to turn back. I'ev execpted my fate and I will live it as eachday goes by. And don't forget your place." Ypu say as you walk pass him but asyou do he pushes you.

"I know my place. It is here with my kind. You should go back with yours." Jargon growled. "Watch your mouth when talking to those you rank higher than you Jargon. Doing other-wise would call for a fight." You say acting like your betterthan him. "Then so be it!!" He roared as he jumped at you. You dodge with out much trouble. "Jargon, if you want a fight we will fight while the alpha is watching." You say seeing that you are only yards from the cave. Jargon turns to see the cave. "So be it, but loser leaves for good." Jargon says as he turns and runs to the alpha male.

Minutes later mum and Karna walk up to you. "Don't lose this fight or you'll be kicked out." Mum said as she reached you. "And then our pups mightbe killed." Karna added. For some reason hearing this made you lose more of your humanity. You fell to the floor as your body started to change once again. As you stood up you looked at your self seeing that you had become a full wolf, you had no trace of human left on you and you saw that your fur was shadow black when you saw Jargon getting ready for the fight so you started to walk toward him. "Jargon, you ready." You say calling him out. Jargon turns and sees you. He is shocked to see that you look nothing like a human but a pure wolf. The alpha male walked betwen gthe two of you. "Jargon's challenege will now begin. The loser must leave for good or die." The alpha said looking at you then at Jargon. You and Jargon stare eachother down. Jargon seems to be scared seeing your new look. "Begin!!" The alpha yells. you and Jargon run at eachother baring your teeth as you do.
1111221111112121221122111121.title: After the hunt

11112211111121212211221111211.content:
Jargon jumps into the air baring his claws in front of him,your filled with shock and anger as the world slows down around you two,allowing you to think about your next move while getting away.Time starts again after you figure out your plan,Jargon looks around shocked as you seem to have disappeared.He laughs and turns,and gets his smiled wiped off his face.You're right behind him about to bite his leg off but as he turns around you instead get a grip on his neck.You automatically tighten your bite as he tries to get out of it.

You growl,"Yield,Jargon.I might let you still walk out of here alive."Jargon whines and finally flashes his tail a second before you think you will have to kill him.You let him go and turn your back on him,you speak to him roughly(as if you've never met him and never want to),"Leave Jargon,leave and never return..."Jargon turns to the alpha but as he lost and wasn't getting any support from him,slunk out with his tail between his legs.

You turn and walk to Karna and growl happily as she smuggles under your chin,recognizing you as her alpha.
11112211111121212211221111211.title: Fight

choices: Use logical argument. He won't deny obviousness.
Run! He won't belive you anyway!
11112211111121212211221111212.content:
The wolfs of pack turn their heads aside, and start to get excited. You wonder what's happening when you hear a familiar noise. And you see it. It was an attack Chopper that was coming right on you.

"Don't worry" you say "It will just past over us and get away".

But the chopper slows down a stays in a stationary position.

"What the heck..." Jargon says. He doesn't have time to finish that the chopper open fire on him with the machine gun. It then fires two rockets on it's body, before turning away.

All the pack, including you is shocked.

"What does it means?" You ask, speaking to no one in particular.

The Alpha male turn his head over you. "I hope for you that you have a good explanation for this"

"What?" You says "Believe me. I have nothing to see with this chopper"

"Really?" Ask the Alpha male. You nod. "So why did this machine kill only Jargon, the wolf who was challenging you?"
11112211111121212211221111212.title: Attack Chopper !!! Incoming!

111122111111212122112211112121.content:
"Look." You says. "If I had any to see with this chopper, why am i still here?"

"What do you mean?" ask the Alpha male.

"I don't remember a lot of things from my previous life, but i know that,before I was accepted in the pack, if I had had a way to go back to my world, I would already have been en route for home by now. Yet, I'm here. And why does this chopper appear only now ? It's not my first fight. It could have attacked when I was fighting Karna, or the males that wanted her as mate."

The Alpha have a thoughful face and stay silent. "He must be examining my arguments" You think.

After a while, he says "You're right. This machine had many occasion to kill us and you could have fled at anytime if you were related in anyway with this machine." You see concern on his face "but this raise more questions. Terriffying question..."
111122111111212122112211112121.title: Use logical argument. He won't deny obvious...

1111221111112121221122111121211.content: All of a sudden a dart hits you in the side. you look mat it but you fell sleep coming over you. you start to stumble trying to get your balance but you fall. you wake up...
1111221111112121221122111121211.title: You're hurt by... a dart?

11112211111121212211221111212112.content:
- "Sir, he's waking up." you hear
- "Good. let us alone." another voice says.
You see the other human. He wears a black uniform, with a black trench-coat and a black cap.
- "I'm Colonel Claus." he says."Do you know where you are ?"
The surrounding noises make your lost memory react. you say:
- "We're inside a TU-664 'Akruna' attack/transport chopper, the last military chopper still in function. It has been replaced by a V-TOL, the MV-24H 'Vulture' several years ago"
- "At least, the Animorph Process, didn't completely erased your memory." Colonel Claus says. "Do you remember your name ?"
- "Animorph Process..." you say. yes, your remember this name. This process has forced you to execute some of your brothers-in-arms who was becoming monsters. It killed the girl you loved. It destroed you world, Mannheim, the latest and most thriving of the human colonies. "I'm Lieutenant Keïnan Aîden, Advanced Recon Group of the 315th infantery Regiment of the United Earth Forces, Last Survivor of Mannheim."
-"Excellent. With you, we will be able to create a cure against the Animorph Process. and we will make them pay for their crimes in Mannheim. (he speaks to the radio) Outlaw 2-5, take us to the Fifth Fleet. we have a war to win"
11112211111121212211221111212112.title: Welcome back, soldier

choices: The helicopter was too high up, you fall to your death.
The helicopter was close to the ground,  you survive with minor wounds.
111122111111212122112211112121122.content:
"Wait! What about Karna?!" you ask Colonel Claus.

"Who?" asked the black coated man.

"She was my mate in the pack, she is pregnant with my children." you reply

"Oh, she's a wolf, don't worry, she will die with the rest for her crimes." he replies, misunderstanding

"Okay, I'll join your war." you say to the Colonel

"Very good." he says as he walks over to the table you are strapped to and releases your bonds.

As soon as you're free you pounce on him and impale him with your claws, killing the Colonel

"I never said which side I was on." you say under your breath. You open the door to the helicopter cabin and kill the pilots, dooming it to crash and rush over to the outside door and prepare to jump.
111122111111212122112211112121122.title: Wait ! What about Karma ?

choices: A group of heavily armed human scouts.
1111221111112121221122111121211222.content:
As you plummet down from the attack helicopter the trees wiz by you, your mind is racing, wondering if you'll survive, but then you remember the vision. You haven't stood over the alpha's corpse or left the forest a human yet and the vision hasn't been wrong yet, so there's a good chance you'll survive. You near the ground and speed up, plunging head first into the forest floor.

As you open your eyes you gasp in surprise as you see...
1111221111112121221122111121211222.title: The helicopter was close to the ground,  you su...

choices: Lead them to the den and then warn the wolves.
Attack them from behind with the nasty looking gun.
11112211111121212211221111212112222.content:
As your eyes slowly open you do a double take, seeing a gear-laden, camouflaged human scout.

"He's coming to, Sergent." said the scout who stood above you.

As you regain your sences you feel that you are not restrained and consider attacking the scout but then look at the large gun and decide against it. When your vision clears completely you see that you are bandaged and on a stretcher.

"Thank you private, stand guard." said the Sergent "Yes, Sir!" said the scout as he saluted and left the medical tent.

"We found the Colonel's helicopter and Identified his remains, his last transmission was that he had retrieved you and was heading back to base, we were ordered to destroy the pack of wolves that had held you captive. We were hoping you could provide some insight as to what happened on the helicopter, private." said the unarmed sergent.

You think fast and reply, "Sir, something hit the engine, dooming it, but the srapnal impaled the colonel before he could jump, the pilots insisted on staying behind and trying to save the helicopter."

"You're a lucky, eh, whatever you call a human wolf hybrid, can you lead us to the wolves' den?" said the sergent

You see the opertunity to lead them into a trap and quickly reply:"Yes, I think I can find it."

"Very good, private, be ready to move at mid-day." said the sargent as he tossed you a gun and left the tent.
11112211111121212211221111212112222.title: A group of heavily armed human scouts.

111122111111212122112211112121122221.content:
When the private returns to tell you that it's time to move you agree and lead the scouts deeper into the forest. You sniff the air trying to pick up the scent of your pack. You soon find it and lead the men towards it. You continue on for hours, carefully leading them around the den in new ways to delay their attack.

By 9:00 you tell the sergant "We should camp here for the night, it would be unwise to go into battle without having rested."

"You're right, private, we'll stop here" replied the raged officer.

The troops pitched camp and rested for the night. As they slept you sneaked away to the den. You climbed up the hill that lead to it's entrance and slinked inside. You were greeted by familiar faces and exclaimations of delight.

"We thought you were dead!" said the alpha

"No, not yet, but there's a company of human scouts outside waiting to pounce on us in the morning."

"Hmmm, we can go about this two ways than, fight them outright or trap them in a cage until they become wolves like us." replied the alpha

"I think it would be best to....
111122111111212122112211112121122221.title: Lead them to the den and then warn the wolves.

choices: the human didn't post a sentry
the humans did post a sentry
1111221111112121221122111121211222211.content:
fight them." you said "They wouldn't make loyal members of the pack.'

"You're probably right, I'll gather a hunting party for us, we'll strike while they sleep." the alpha relied

He lead you down into a lower chamber of the den where several male wolves slept.

"Wake up!" yelled/howled the Alpha

They all snapped to attention at the call of the Alpha.

"I need seven brave wolves to fight a heavily armed group of humans." he said

most of the wolves reluctantly backed away leaving exactly seven stern faced wolves.

"Good, seven volunteers, follow me, we strike now." said the alpha, leading you and the seven wolves out of the chamber and into the dark, muggy forest.
1111221111112121221122111121211222211.title: fight them."

choices: The Alpha was shot in the leg and will never walk again.
The Alpha was shot in the heart and will die.
11112211111121212211221111212112222112.content:
As you approch the camp the continuous snapping of machine gun fire rings through the air and the the Alpha grunts before leaping to the tree that the gunner is in and dispatching him.

Your party run into the camp, forsaking stealth as the entire camp is up. Every tent is stormed, the occasional shot is fired off but no wolves go down. There are only two tents left and the alpha walks up next to you, saying "You take the command tent, I'll take the medical tent."

You find it odd that he doesn't want to kill the sergant himself but you think it best not to question his orders and slink into the tent. The sergant is standing in his fatiuges with a rifle trained on you.

"You're a traitor to your kind" spits the sergant

"No, I'm loyal to my kind, the wolves." you counter

You quickly jump at the sergant and slit his throat before he can fire his rifle.

You leave the tent and rejoin the party. soon after the Alpha emerges from the medical tent and leads the group back into the forest.

As you walk just behind the Alpha you notice that he seems to be slowing down and ocasionaly stumbling. you write it off as fatige for now but you can't shake the feeling that some thing is wrong with him. You think you've seen it before as a human but you can't pin it down.

Soon you can't ignore it, you're close to the den but the Alpha is practicly dragging himself along now, struggling to move. You then see a hypodermic needle sticking out of the Alpha's leg. Pain killer! of coarse, he was shot by the sentry and now the painkiller is wearing off. That's why he wanted to take the medical tent, he knew it would contain medicine. you thought. but where was he shot? you ask yourself.

When you reach the den the Alpha moves to a position under his rock and colapses.
11112211111121212211221111212112222112.title: the humans did post a sentry

111122111111212122112211112121122221122.content:
You rush up to him and find blood on his chest, directly in line with his heart. He is dieing and you don't have the equipment to treat him.

The Alpha moves his mouth to your ear and, with his last breath, barley whispers "You're the Alpha, now" before coughing violently and dropping back to the floor.

You bow your head and turn to face the pack. "He is dead." you say in in a solemn voice "He told me that I was the Alpha now"

The Alpha's mate, your adopted mum, nudges you from behind and points you toward the rocky outcropping that served as a throne for the Alpha. You slowly ablige and climb the rocks up to the edge, followed by mum. when you stand at the top she walks up to you and whispers in your ear "The best way you can honor his memory is by being a great leader."

The other wolves all bow to you as Karna climbs up the rock and rests next to you. soon they raise their heads and you jump down off the rock. You thought it was as good a time as any to give the old Alpha his funeral rights.

"I need two wolves too help me give him a proper burial in your tradition." you say and choose two young male wolves to help.

"What is the custom of your people?" you ask them

"We _______ our dead." said one with brown fur.
111122111111212122112211112121122221122.title: The Alpha was shot in the heart and will die.

choices: Wake up to Karna going into labor!
Wake up to humans Attacking the cave!
1111221111112121221122111121211222211221.content:
"We bury our dead." said the wolf. You were relieved that it wasn't something sacreligous like canibalism. You dig a resting place for the fromer Alpha and lower him in. After you fill it in you stand over his grave and give your best attempt at a speech.

"Ashes to ashes, Dust to dust, and I hope you go to heaven or were ever you believed in. We will all miss you greatly."

After the other wolves gave their speeches and you had suficiantly regretted never having been to a proper funeral you headed back to the cave to turn in for the night.
1111221111112121221122111121211222211221.title: Burry

choices: Continue with the plan to trap them
Agree To Continue But Turn On Them
1111221111112121221122111121211222212.content:
"We Will Trap Them" The Alpha Says "Winter is coming and we could stock up on food"

You look at the Alpha in shock at what he just said who growled back

"you have a problem with that?"

He asks growling "you come to warn us about the humans but you can't live with what we will do to them..This is survival of the fittest you should know this by now" The Alpha says "Either your one of us or one of them" he says

"Choose now"
1111221111112121221122111121211222212.title: trap them."

11112211111121212211221111212112222122.content:
"I'm with you." you say "If we don't stop them, Karma and my children will die"

"Good." the Alpha says "let's trap them"

He walks away, unaware of the thoughts that raced in your mind. When he suggested to use humans as food, it triggered your memories. And you remembered what the wolves did to the girl you loved. They ate her, teared her apart. When you found her body, it was nothing but a slaughter. No, The wolves won't kill humans anymore.

The wolves arrive near the human camp. There is a sentinel. What do you do?
11112211111121212211221111212112222122.title: Why you fought the wolves...

choices: "Call reinforcements, so we are sure to win"
111122111111212122112211112121122221222.content:
"I'll kill him" you says. The Alpha nods.

You approach the guard, who salutes you. You quickly make gestures to tell him to be ready to play dead. When you're close enough you pretend to impale him. His eyes widen, hes making strange gurgling noises.

"Wow" you think "If he weren't a soldier, he could have been an actor"

While the guard fall on the ground, you use quickly his radio. "Everyone, be ready. Incoming wolves". You hear several clicks on the radio. They now what to do.

"One wolf per tent" the Alpha says. The wolves crouch down, ready to jump when you shout

"OPEN FIRE!"

"What?"

He doesn't have time to say anything else. He takes a bullet in his head. you can see the shock in his eyes while pieces of his brain fell to the ground with him. The other wolves are greeted with dozens of bullets.

"Wow, I didn't think they would attack so soon" The Sergeant says.

"In fact, I warned them" you confess

"What?"

You sigh

"I have a mate in this pack. I wanted to be with her, but when the Alpha suggested to use you as food, I remembered what they did to Altana"

"I saw the place where she was murdered." A soldier says "It was horrible"

"She wasn't murdered." you retort "She was slaughtered. While she was pregnant."

"Well, what do we do, now?"
111122111111212122112211112121122221222.title: A trap in a trap

1111221111112121221122111121211222212222.content:
"Can you contact the Fifth Fleet?" You ask. "And do we have laser pointer?"

"Yes, sir" answer the Sergeant.

"Excellent. Follow me."

You lead them to the den.

"So, that where they sleep." A soldier says. You recognize the guard. "If only i could sneak inside and blow they heads up."

"I've got a better idea" you answer. you take the radio. "Fifth Fleet, this Lieutenant Keinan Aiden, regimental number 226739. Do you read me?"

"Loud and clear, Survivor. What do you need?"

"Orbital strike. I'm sending the coordinates now" You activate the laser and aim at the entrance of the cave.

Several seconds later, the cave is surrounded by powerful explosions. It lasts ten minutes, then it stops as suddenly as it started.

"Now that's power..." the Sergeant says.
1111221111112121221122111121211222212222.title: Now, that's power

1111221111112121221122111121211222212222.content:
You enter the cave with your team. You can see that it has partially collapsed. Several wolves are wounded, the others a trying to help them.

"Finish them" you order.

The soldiers open fire, showing no mercy.

You see movement on your left. you run towards the wolf and you see it's Karma.

"Why? Why did you betray us?"

"My memories are back. And I remember what you did to my species. How you killed the female I loved before your attack."

"What?"

"You ate her, monsters."

Karma look at you, speechless. She then close her eyes while you're aiming at her head

Do you shoot her?

1111221111112121221122111121211222212222.content:

11112212.content:
You remain silent as you watch the wolves continue to howl. They finally stop, and several minutes pass, none of them moving a muscle. Then you hear what sounds like a large animal running through the cave and approaching the room you're in. Finally, you see it, another large wolf, runs into the room. The wolf is carrying a large caribou in its mouth. It approaches the center of the room, where you notice the large a stone pedestal that seemed to avoid your attention before. It sets the large caribou down on the pedestal, and you can see it clearly. The caribou is much larger than usual, but smaller than the wolves. The neck has been snapped, with blood dripping down from the neck, and the wolf's fangs.

The wolf walks over to the Alpha pair and bows its head, moving in a way that made it look like it was stretching. The male approaches it, and gently licks it, accepting the offering. The female does the same, and the two approach the caribou. The other wolf moves and sets itself down next to a female wolf with what seems to be a very tiny bite mark in her left ear. the wolf from before was a male.

"They must be the Beta pair." you guess.

The Alpha pair carefully examine the fallen prey, and sddenly stop. The male is at the stomach, and the female at the rump. Both sink their teeth into the flesh and pull away the fur, until they get nothing but soft flesh. They chew the meat, completely focussed on their meal. As they chew down to the bone, you wonder if they plan on eating all of it. Finally, the male lifts his head and motions for the others. The other wolves slowly approach the body, making sure that they're allowed. The Beta pair go first, and the rest follow suite. You hear your stomach growl and realize that you're hungry too. Very hungry to be precise.

"I don't even remember the last time I ate." you tell yourself.

Realizing that all of the wolves may eat, you slowly make your way over. Several wolves, including the former Omega, stop eating and growl at you. The former Omega is young, and his fur isn't as shiny or as well taken care of as the others. He runs at you knocks you away, causing you to lay motionless on the floor before he returns to his meal. It is there that you notice another opening in the cave wall to your right. No wolves are guarding it. You are much closer to it, than the one of the left that you came through to get here. You start to wonder if you'll get fed, and if you should try to escape.

You...

The Omega, since you're the lesser member.

"No' it's no use..." you think. "They'd catch me immediately!"
So you just sit where you are, hoping the wolves aren't going to make you starve to death.

Finally all of them finish their meal, looking very pleased and licking their lips. Then, the Alpha Male growls something to the young Omega, making with his head a gesture toward the corpse, then another toward yourself. The Omega looks rather disappointed, yet he obeys his leader, and goes to grab something from the body, then carries it to you in his jaws: it's a bone, with some meat still on it. He drops it in front of you.
You sigh in relief, seeing they're going to feed you; the meat is raw and bloody, of course, yet you're too much hungry to be picky, and devour all of it in a few minutes.

The Alpha male and the other pack members seem pleased, seeing you know your place and like their food; maybe you're on the right path to be accepted in the pack.

When you've finished, it's sleeping time, and the wolves start walking to their "bedrooms".
You're going to spend your first night there with....

1111221211.content:
You sit perfectly still and look around as all of the wolves leave, unsure about what to do. It is then that you feel something licking the back of your neck. You shift your eyes around to behind you and notice the Alpha Female. Once agin, you find the touch soothing. The wolf picks you up in her mouth like before. You are slightly startled by this, but realize that if it's anything like before, she will not harm you. She carefully makes her way up the stairs, trying not to move her head to make your experience uncomfortable.

You finally reach the top, where you find the Alpha Male lay atop of pile of furs from various large animals. He gives a small growl, not one directed at you. The volume of it suggests that he is not angry, more like a form of communication. The female growls back, you still in her jaws, and male nods his head. The female walks over to him and sets you gently up against his side. You feel the soft fur against your body. The female then lies down right next him nearly crushing you between both of them. It was only the soft fur that allowed you to relax.

A chill goes across your face and body, and now you realize why they are crushing you. The temperature has suddenly dropped far below 0 degrees Fahrenheit. Without the proper coat of fur, you'd freeze to death. Knowing that they are protecting you, you relax and fall asleep. Little did you what the wolves were saying to each other before.

In exchange for spending the nigth with the Alpha pair, you would be learning the ways of the pack tomorrow, whether you wanted to or not.

1111221211111.content:
Luckily for you, you know how to swim, and quite well. However, the cold water is so freezing cold that your body begins to slow down. You focus on the land near the wolf, and try your best to swim to it. The current isn't strong, but the cold water makes up for it.

"I'm not going to die here!" you shout as you continue to push yourself to the land.

Finally, after a long struggle for such a short distance, you make it to the land. The male wolf is pleased with you making it, but your shaking so violently that you don't even realize this. The wolf walks over and rips your wet clothes off, preventing you from freezing faster. Though your bare skin is now directly to the cold, your body is slightly warmer. The male wolf then proceeds to lick you as if cleaning you. The tongue may be wet, but it's drying you off and helping you keep warm.

You slowly begin to fall asleep, the wolf's tongue on your face wakes you quickly. The wolf then lays his massive body over your small and fragile one, allowing you to keep warm under his fur. After a few hours pass, daylight shines high overhead, and the sun is more than warm enough to keep you warm for a long time. The wolf gets up and signals for you to follow him. You follow and pray that worst is over.

You slowly follow the large wolf back to the den. You've grown more accustomed to walking on all fours, but you're not used to being completely nude. When you finally arrive, you notice that all of the other wolves are wide awake and are outside the den entrance. The young pups are playing, even a couple of the older ones, but most of them are just lounging about or pacing back and forth. A couple seem to be missing as well, presumably to go and go hunt.

The Alpha Male signals for you to sit, which you hastily comply. Based on the wolf's gestures, you are to sit back and carefully observe the wolves' actions. The wolf growls at you, showing that are not to move from that spot. Knowing exactly how strong the wolf, you're not in any position to object.

Luckily for you, you know enough about wolves to not understand everything they do. You watch how higher status wolves tend to walk around with their tails held high, and how the lesser status ones act towards them. You watch the younger wolves play several different games, or so you think. It is nearly sunset and you're still in the same spot, surely by now you've come to understand everything they do outside of a hunt.

The Alpha Male approaches you.
