111122121111111.content:
The Alpha Male carefully examines you first. He then moves closer to you. You stay perfectly still for a moment, then realize what you need to do. You lie down and give a whine, the closest thing to a wolf-like whine you can give. You sit back up and lick the wolf's chin. The wolf gives you a lick back. He steps back and signals for you to do several tasks that you saw the wolves doing earlier in the day. You perform all of them as fast as you on all fours. When you retunr to your starting postion, you begin to pant heavily. Strangely enough, as exhausted as you are and as how hard you just worked, you're not sweating, almost as if you can't anymore. The wolf nods his head in approval and approached you again, licking you as a praise.

The wolf goes behind you and picks you up once again, taking you inside the cave back to the main chamber. Once there, you are surprised to find a large, dead moose on the center pedestal.

"Wow, these wolves really are strong!" you gasp.

Of course, the moose must not have been too healthy if such a few amount of wolves caught it so easily. The ones that went hunting weren't even sweating. The male sets you down and joins his mate. They approach the spoils and sink their teeth in. However, instead of eating his fill, the male walks over to you with part of the upper leg and drops it in front of you. He turns his back and returns to his meal.

"Did he just...feed me before the others?" you wonder.

Even though you have your food, so as not to make the other wolves jealous, you wait until they all have had a chance to get some fod before you try to bite into it. You finnally give it a try, but nearly break your teeth on it.

"Ow!" you whine, "My teeth aren't strong enough for this!"

The Alpha Female seems to have heard you and walks over. She swallows her food and leans her head down in front of you. She motions for you to give the meat to her, which you do. She begins chomping down on it, chewing it it like her mouth was a well-oiled machine. She opens her mouth and prepares to give you the meat.
111122121111111.title: Test

1111221211111111.content:
"No, thanks," you tell the female, "I'm not really that hungry."

Your stomach growls as if in disagreement. And after a long day, you really can't go without food. You never had any breakfast or lunch. The wolf once again tries to feed you. Your stomach growls again. Slow, your turn to fac ethe wolf and open your mouth. The wolf dumps the meat into your mouth. Not only is the chewed meat damp and soggy, but now it's covered in wolf saliva. You slowly making chewing motion and swallow the food.

"Bleh..." you let out as you stick your tongue out.

Just then, you look up at he female stand overs your head. She drops another mouthful of food directly into your mouth. You end up accidently savoring the taste this time, once again giving a "bleh" expression. After everyone has finished their meals, you notice the has completely set already. Your nude body feels the cold air start to flood the cave, it won't be long until it's as cold as the previous night. And this time, you don't have any clothes.

The female gently cleans your body with her tongue, even your private places. He then reaches down to pick you up and carries you back up the stairs. You notice the other wolves go off as well. Once up the stairs, you notice a small patch of furs next to the larger wolf bed. The Alpha Female gently sets you down upon it.

"They can't be serious! I'll freeze if I'm alone!" you think.

You don't dare blurt it out though, you're lucky enough to be sleeping near the Alpha pair. Apparently the female still wants to keep an eye oon you. With know other way to keep warm, you pull several furs over your body like a blanket and attempt to stay warm.
1111221211111111.title: Second Night

11112212111111111.content:
The night is so cold you can hardly stand it. Still, it's not the cold taht's really bothering you, but your own body. You constantly toss and turn under the fur, your face showing obvious signs of discomfort. You're still sound asleep though, but it's hard to tell. The Alpha Female wakes up and notices your movement. She simply gives what almost looks like a smile and falls back asleep.

After a rough night's sleep, you are finally woken by a female voice.

"Hey, it's time to get up!" the voice says.

Your eyes are still closed. Upon hearing the voice, you instantly think that it's a human and that the encounter with the wolves was all a bad dream. You open them and instantly become somewhat disappointed when you see the Alpha Female standing over you.

"Wake up!" the voice says again.

You close your eyes in disbelief, the voice was coming from the wolf! It is then taht you hear another voice.

"Here, I'll him up!" a gruff male voice says.

If the other voice was the Alpha Female, then this must be... As soon as the thought crosses your mind, you instantly sit up.

"About time!" the Alpha Male scowls.
"Y-You...can talk?!" you gasp.
"I've been talking the entire time. I just though you weren't." the wolf replies.

You get on all fours and stretch out, unaware of how easy it was you. You notice the female looking over you carefully.

"Your transformation is coming along nicely." she says.

You become puzzled by the words, and instantly realize something scratching your back. You reach back with your right hand and grab something furry. You pull it forwards and know what it is.

"A tail?!" you gaso.

Sure enough, it was a grayish-white wolf-like tail. In addition, your body hair had grown a tad bit, giving you a very thin coat of hair...or was it...fur.
11112212111111111.title: Beginning of a Transformation

111122121111111111.content:
You scream.

Panting, you look at your hands. The nails are slightly bigger and they are slightly covered with grey fur.

The Alpha Female comes closer, and you back up holding out your arms, then screaming again when you see the fur on your arms. You turn around to run and hit the wall. You wobble then collapse on the floor and faint.
111122121111111111.title: Freaking out

choices: Run away, you can't live as a wolf.
1111221211111111111.content:
You finally wake up, only to see the whole pack standing over you.

"Wow, that's one ugly bruise you have there." one male wolf says.

You finally pick yourself up, sitting up straight with your hand over your forehead.

"Are you okay?" another wolf asks.
"Do I look okay?!", you exclaim. "I'm a bloody freak! The only thing that hasn't changed is my ears and face! What the hell did you guys do to me?!"

The Alpha Male clears his throat.

"We didn't do anything to you," he explains, "This isn't the same place you probably came from. This is a parallel universe where creatures like you, or humans as you call yourselves, don't exist. One might call it your world's shadow."
"What do you mean?" you ask.
"You aren't the first person who's come to this place. However, the others either survived and became other animals, or possibly met with more gruesome fates. Two others have stumbled upon our pack. When they went through the same experience as you, they fled. One went off in that direction." the Alpha Female explained, pointing at the cave exit you once thought about escaping through.
"I remember that, boy did he make a nice splat when he went over that cliff!" one wolf laughed.

You remain silent as a few other wolves laugh.

"What about the other one?" you finally ask.
"He ran out out the main entrance and out of our territory. We found some human-looking bones a few days later." the Alpha Male answers.

You gulp as you feel your heart jump into your throat.

"Your body is changing because it's responding to a chemical in the air. In about a week you'll probably be a full-fledged wolf. Now, the question reamins... What will you do?" the Alpha Male questions.

Your body starts shaking, unsure of what to say.

"If you stay, we can ensure your protection and make you a pack member when you're finally a wolf. You will have to obey our laws though. However, should you run, we won't bother trying to stop you, nor protect you from whatever's out there. We may even hunt you ourselves one day, if you're still alive that is." the Alphe Male informs.

You go deep into thought considering th possibilities. You look aaround at all of the wolves. Some don't care what you do, and some want you stay. Should you stay, or run away?
1111221211111111111.title: Explanations

choices: You decide you want to join in.
11112212111111111111.content:
After thinking hard about it, you finally come to an answer.

"O-Okay..." you hesitantly say, "I'll stay. I w-won't r-run away."

It was obvious from your tone that you are still very nervous about your choice. The Alpha Male nods his head, as do all of the others. The Alpha Female approaches you, getting closer to your face. You close your eyes, slightly afrad. You feel something moist and open your eyes, staring widely at the wolf who is gently licking your face affectionately.

The female stops and gives a smile, turning yoru body the other way, but not her head. She is still looking directly at you.

"I'm glad to hear that, soon-to-be son." she says to you.

She turns her head and walks away. You continue to stare with wide eyes.

"S-Son...?" you wonder, the word echoing in your mind.

The wolves all walk away, resuming their previous activities.

"Whatever you do, do not leave our territory." the Alpha Male warns as he walks away.

You decide to leave the cave and sit atop a bunch of rocks, looking down at the young wolves playing. You suddenly feel a presence next to you. You look over to see the Alpha Female sitting beside you.

"Little one, there's something I've wanted to ask you for a couple days now." she says.

You feel akward by being called "little one", not being so little anymore. You were smaller though, and it somehow just felt right.

"What is it?" you reply.
"What is your name? Now that you can speak our language, I'd like to know it." she asks.
"M-My name?" you stutter.

Now that you think about it, you never did tell anyone. However, now there is a new problem...you can't. You try as hard as you can, bt can't seem to remember it.

"I...don't...know..." you finally answer, tears streaming down your face. "I can't seem to remember it...or anything for that matter. Not my friends, not my family, not even my own name!"

You continue crying, completely ashamed that you can't remember anything. The female gently licks your cheeks, trying to dry them. She then places a paw on your shoulder.

"Since I'm the one who gives birth, I get to name all of the pups unless I say otherwise. I'm not surprised you don't remember, your memory of your human self will probably fade completely upon your transformation. Normally, I'd name you after that. But since you've decided to stay, I'll give you one right now." she tells you in a soothing voice.

You can't help but stop crying as you look up at her.

"How about Nanokami*? It's a combination of 'nameless' and 'wolf'." she suggests.

You don't know what to say. But seeing how she was being so nice to you, and with your instincts telling you it seems appropriate, you silently nod your head.

"From now on, all of us will call you Nanokami. I'll go tell my husband, and he'll tell the others." the female says.

She takes her leave, but not before licking your face again. All of the tears have now dried up. Whether you wanted to admit it or not, soon she would be your new mom. Not thinking about it anymore, you resume watching the young wolves play.



(*Nanashi means "nameless", and okami means "wolf". So, I've decided to call the main character Nanokami. Despite this, please refer to him as if you were him when he speaks. Note that you do not have to call him this in any other storyline, though it'd be preferred.)
11112212111111111111.title: A Name

111122121111111111111.content:
You uneasily walk up to the other wolves. they are busy romping around, and don't seem to notice you. suddenly, one of them leaps in your direction. Startled, you dodge, then quickly pull out and whip around. as your feet hit the ground, you grip it with your recently grown claws. you leap at the wolf's side, tackling it. You land on top of the wolf, panting, but another wolf zigzags towards you. you leap out of the way, then turn around, galloping on the soft meadow ground. you feel wolfish instincts slowly coming to you, and you trap the astounded wolf in midair with a ferocious leap, gripping it with the pits of your elbows. you both come crashing down, you on top of the other wolf, while the other wolf is now on its back. you now realize that this other wolf is much bigger than you, and has a scar running down its face. the wolf seems astounded.
"how the hell did you do that?" he asks,amazed that such a puny demi-wolf could overpower him. the conversation is cut short by a howl from the distance. you are startled... can there already be more food? you just ate!

111122121111111111111212.content:
You decide to visit the Alpha Male and Female and ask them what they plan on doing with you. As you enter the den you see the Alpha Female walk over to you. She licks you face in a loving manner. When she finishes she says. "I am glad to see your ok Nanokami." You smile, knowing that you are cared about. "Who were they?" You ask as you follow the Alpha towards her mate. "The other wolfs I mean." She sighs and sits down next to her mate who answers your question. A rival pack. Our Pack makes our home in a very convenient sot, close to herds of prey and a river. Thus many other Packs try to take over but none have ever succeeded. You smile, knowing that you are in the safest and apparently strongest Pack.

You then began to notice how you have begun to get more comfortable in the presence of the wolfs. You feel happier knowing you are starting to be accepted.
"Oh by the way." The Alpha male says to you brining your attention back to him. "I never told you my name. I am Strongmoon and this." He say indicating the Alpha Female. "Is my mate Winterwind. We are the Alphas of the Pack." You nod your head and on instinct submit to the Alpha's. "You do not have to always submit to us. But be sure to give us proper acknowledgment." You nod then ask rather uncertain. "W..what will I do now?" Strongmoon walks over to you and in a more serious tone then before explains. "It will still be a while before you become fully fledged wolf. Until that time you must prepare for that day by learning our ways. You have already learned some of our customs but you have as o yet to seen a hunt or met al our members. You will be taught how to hunt and how to fight. So when you finish your transformation into a wolf you will be ready to become a true wolf and true member of our pack. You will soon notice that as the changes appear you will find things much easier to do because of your newly changing form. You nod your head, already anxious for the day ahead. Winterwind then walk over and in a soothing voice say. "But for now it is late, rest up ell, for your training starts tomorrow.

You nod and lay down to sleep.
111122121111111111111212.title: Ways of the Pack

You also decide to check yourself out to see if any more changes have occured. The only thing that has changed is that your fur seems to have grown more. Though not as thick and full as the wolfs it has managed to keep you warmer then you have been since you got here. " Strongmoon has left to hunt with some of the others." Winterwind tells you. You head out of the den just in time to see Strongmoon leaving into the woods with some other wolfs.

You start wondering what to do when Winterwind comes up to you and says.
"Nanokami, while you wait for Strongmoon why don't you meet your soon to be packmates." You nod your head smiling. "That sounds good. I havn't met many of them yet anyway." As you get nearer you see that they are.
1111221211111111111112121.title: Waking up fine

11112212111111111111122.content: But before any more could be said, you were surrounded. Then... unfortunately, you pass out. When you wake up...
11112212111111111111122.title: IT'S A TRAP!!!

111122121111111112.content:
Your mind whirls as you tug on your tail in disbelief, sure that this had to be a joke, or a dream, but sure enough you feel the uncomfortable feeling down your entire spine, causing you to gasp as you let go. Examining your hands, you see the beginnings of a rough pad formed on your hand, while your nails seem to have grown slightly. Beinging your hands to your face, you feel your face slightly pushed out, the beginings of a muzzle, while your mouth now bears a set of sharp fangs.

Your first instinct: Scream.
Your second instinct: Run
Your third: Faint

However, forgoing what would definatly cause an uproar amoung the pack, and probably undo the respect you'v managed to earn from the alphas, you take a deep breath, hold it, count to ten, and try to calm down, though through your mind seems to run this constant voice saying 'oh my god, I have a tail'.

"At least his one seems to be taking it well," says the gruff voice of the Alpha male, "The last one screamed so much, he didn't realize he had run right off the cliff," he said, chuckling slightly as he looks you over. "I'll give you a few minutes to ajust, then I'll be waiting for you outside," he says, walking past you, tail raised high as he heads for the cave exit.

As soon as he's left, you sit down, trying to digest what has just happened, "I'm sure your quite confused, Nanokami," says the Alpha female, sitting next to you, "I'm sure your wondering what has happened to you."

You nod, "How can you talk?" you say, almost without thinking, in which the Alpha laughs, "Anything can talk, we have always talked, the difference is, now you can understand. You are slowly becoming one of us, as do any of your kind that enter in to these mountains. We do not know why, or how, but it happens to them all."

"Then what will happen to me?" you ask, "Is there anyway to stop it, or any way to leave the mountain? Not to seem ungrateful or anything, but, I miss my family and friends..." You trail off, as you try to recall your family, but all you draw is a blank. You expression tells what is going on in your mind, and the Alpha nods understandingly, "As the transformation persists, memories of your old life will fade away. You can try to leave the mountains, but none have been sussesful, most lose their memories far before they ever reach the edge, and others have lost their lives to the predators that roam there. Even if you were to survive, the cliffs that surround us are to steep to scale, and even we cannot tell what lies beyond it's borders."

"Then what else is their for me?" you ask, near tears as hope seems to slip from you. The alpha puts a paw on your shoulder, "Nanokami, I took you in from the wild near dead, and cleaned and healed your wounds, do you not think I have not done so for a reason?" you look at her in disbelief, wondering what she is saying, "You are a part of my pack now, and if you choose, you can be part of our family, look around you."

You look, and watch the wolves. The pups play on the ground, wrestling each other, while the older members socialize, even playing their own games. Even the omega, though more carefully, involves himself in the community, or goes off to explore. "Our way may not be your own, but do you not think we would accept you? The pack is a family, and even if you were not born amoung us, you are a part of it as sure as any one of our pups, Nanokami."

"Why do you keep calling me Nanokami? My name is..." and you stop, sudenly realizing that you cannot even remember your name anymore, "I... can't remember..." you say. "We have called you this since we found you," says the she wolf, "We name all who come here, for none remember their names by the time they can understand us. So to us, you are Nanokami," She stands, and pushes you to your feet with her muzzle, "And you need to go meet with Strongmoon, my mate has little patience, so it's best not to keep him waiting little one."

Quickly, you run to the cave entance, coming upon the Alpha male, Strongmoon, as you exit the cave, overlooking the forests from atop the cliff. "I assume Winterwind has talked to you," he says, and you nod, as you realize that sounded more like a command then a question. "Then you know you have two options available to you, you can leave, and try to find the exit to these mountains, or you can remain here, and become a part of our pack. Know that, if you leave, you will be facing the wild alone, for I will not sacrifice any more under my charge on such a fools quest. The discision, and your fate, is yours alone to decide."

You gulp, thinkng carefully about what you want to do, before finally giving your answer...
111122121111111112.title: The Choice

1111221211111111121.content:
After some thought, you finally speak, "I... will stay, if that is ok..." you say, respectfully as possible. There is no way you'd be able to find your way to the edge of the mountains alone, you don't even know which way the safest route would be, and then, your memory would fade, and you wouldn't be able to recall where you would be going in the first place, and be lost on top of that. Your best option it seems is to stay with the wolves, at least, you could find a home here.

"A wise decision,” says Strongmoon, still watching you with scrutiny, though the look in his eyes seems to soften slightly. “You are unlike most that have come here,” he says, the tone in his voice somewhat pleased, “You compose yourself with more self control then the typical human, but we’ll see what your made of once a proper set of fangs grow in.” He stands and approaches, and you quickly kneel lower to the ground, in a submissive posture, whining slightly, “You can get up,” he says, “Not every gesture I make is a signal for you to submit. Just show proper the respect and courtesy to your elders, and you’ll fit in soon enough.” You rise keeping your tail lowered, though it twitches slightly as the more relaxed tone Strongmoon has taken makes you feel a bit more secure. “Now, go and meet the rest of the pack, I’m sure your brothers and sisters will want to get to know you,” he says, and can’t help but give a small chuckle as your face lights up, and your tail wags, as the thought of acceptance washes over you.

Quickly you dart back down the tunnels, noticing for the first time that running on all fours has become considerably easier. And he accepted you! You can hardly believe it, but then it shouldn’t have come as a surprise, wolves are a very close knit family, even the omega is a valued member, even if it is the lowest rank.

As you enter the main cave, you see the cubs playing energetically, while it seems the more mature wolves too, have began engaging in wrestling, but by now you know that this is normal, unlike humans, wolves engaged in activities like this together, it was not only about eat and sleep, wolves love play from puphood to adulthood. Still, the older wolves are still much larger then you, should you introduce yourself to them first, or should you try your luck with the smaller pups first?
1111221211111111121.title: Acceptance

11112212111111111211.content:
Looking at the pups, you begin to think that it would be more important to get to know you peers before playing with the pups, besides, you don't want to be labeled as a puppy before you meet the pack. You approach just as one of the larger females pins a male, playfully putting her teeth around his neck as he struggled, trying to get footing on her. It amazes you how such play can look both like fun, and dangerous at the same time. Just then, the female spots you, and following her gaze, most of the other wolves turn to look at you. You freeze on the spot, feeling rather nervous all of a sudden, your tail going instinctively between your legs. "Umm, hi?" you say, suddenly worried that your thoughts of acceptance may have been a little to soon.

Then the pack of wolves dart at you, and you find yourself tackled by the big female. At first you yelp in fear, but then you realize that your being licked and crowded by most of the pack, an overexcited greeting. "It's about time you came back down," says the female, "We were worried you had left. You decided to stay?" you do your best to talk back, but find yourself smothered in them muzzle greetings your getting from the other wolves, "Yes.. omph.. I guess.. I am."

"Great!" she says, "Let's start the introductions, I'm Fleetfoot," she says, the goes off naming other wolves, who respond in greeting, "That's Proudsong, there's Digger, the those two are Wilypaw and Slywit, twins you know, that grey is Stormrunner, let's see where is... ah, there's Sharpscent, and those three are Midnight, Silkytail, and Willow. The rest are out at the moment scouting game, but you'll meet everyone soon enough."

"I'm, um, Nanokami," you say, still a little unsure. "Well, Nanokami, you ready to have some fun?" You feel both excited and nervous, still unsure about your size, but finally you muster the courage to say...

Yuma looked up at your mother and asked, "May I stay and keep Nanokami company?"

Your mother looks at you and asked, "It depends, do you want him to Nanokami?"

You smile and say, "Yeah." Yuma walks up to you and laid down next to you. Your mother smiles and backs away from you a few feet. Yuma looks over and seems to be studying you. You keep wondering what he was doing.

After a few minutes, Yuma gives a curious expression and asked, "So, what is it like; you know, being human?" Your mother, who was dozing slightly, instantly got to her paws and gave a low, menacing growl at Yuma.

"Yuma," she said in a deep voice, "we do not discuss things like that."

"It's okay mom," you say quickly. "To be honest Yuma, I don't really remember too much about it. But I do know that I couldn't smell as good and was never as strong as this. To be quite honest, I don't care about being human anymore; I love being a wolf!"

After that there was a long, uncomfortable silence which you broke by asking, "So who are your parents Yuma?"

A large grin enters his face as he says,'My parents are the Beta pair, Hakou and Sayaka. They're really nice and I love them."

After that you can hear a high feminine voice yelling Yuma's name. "That's my mom, I gotta go. Goodbye Nanokami, goodbye Winterwind." And with that he scampered off.

After that you just lay in the cave with your mother and eventually nod off into sleep.

You know that you were treated horribly back when you were human. You ask, "Why have you shown such generosity? No one has shown me any kindness that I can remember from my old life. I know my memories fade with time, but that's one thing I do remember." Winterwind says,"Like I have said before our way may not be what you know, but you will learn with time. We look out for one another and teach each other to be kind to one another, but also to be prepared to defend each other. You and all the other pups will learn this. And I'm sure that you will become a great leader. Another reason I am so kind to you is because Strongmoon and I want to take you in as our son and we hope you accept it like you accepted you being a wolf." "I thought I already was," you say. Winterwind and Strongmoon both smile. Strongmoon then says, "Well then, you better get your rest son, you need to regain your strength and let your leg heal, and we'll need to make sure you and the pups have extra protection for the next few days." You didn't see any argument with your new father. You really weren't feeling 100% and simply nod and lay there with your new mother. "I hope I get better soon," you say. "Don't worry dear, you will. For now, get some rest son." You nod and lay your head down, and your mother gives you a gentle lick before you fall asleep.
1111221211111111121212.title: you wake up with everyone looking at you

11112212111111111212121.content: You are asleep for a few hours are hoping you will wake up again during the day when you hear your mother say in a gentle voice, "Nanokami, wake up little one." You slowly open your eyes, feeling drowsy after your rest and then you feel your mother lick you. You giggle saying, "Mom, stop that, it tickles. hahaha." She smiles and stops licking you. "Glad to see you awake again Nanokami," came the voice of the beta female, Sayaka. She had come with Yuma and Nyla to see you. As your mother placed you between her forepaws and cleans your wound, Nyla says, "Are you feeling alright Nanokami?" "Couldn't feel...Aah...better," you joke and all of you laugh. "Man, that was quite a blow you took. I probably would have been out for a week after taking a hit like that. I have to admit you were pretty brave to protect me from that lynx, and I thank you for that. I guess I owe you one," Yuma says. You reply, " Thanks, but I have to admit, I didn't have a lot of time to think. I was actually just as scared of getting blamed for you getting hurt as I was brave for not wanting you getting hurt. If I was very brave, I probably wouldn't have been trembling in the presence of my mother when I first got here." "I don't think anyone could have blamed you dear. You were after human at that time and all alone, cold and frightened. Seeing pack of wolves probably was a bit overwhelming for you. I feel you were very brave during the attack dear, and I don't think anyone would have blamed you if Yuma had been hurt. Still we are thankful you rescued him," your mother says. All of you keep up the conversation till lunch time.
11112212111111111212121.title: later that day.

choices: Something happens later in the night..
11112212111111111212122.content:
You take some naps through out the day and wake up when either it was lunchtime or one of the pack members and their pups came to see how you were doing.
Now it was dinner time and you were having a dream about the attack when you hear your mother say, "Wake up my little one." "Huh wha," you say as you wake up. "Relax dear, you were just having a bad dream. It's time for dinner, the pack has already dug in and I've had my fill so come drink honey," your mom says as she lays on her side next to you. You slowly lift yourself up so your leg doesn't hurt so much and soon latch on to one of your mother's nipples and begin to suckle like you did during lunch. You soon feel her milk flow into your mouth and down your throat, giving you the nourishment you needed for the next couple of weeks. The milk tasted sweeter then anything you ever had as a human. You kept drinking until you were full and laid next to your mother, she then picked you up and placed you gently between her fore paws, cleaning your wound. You felt a slight sting and say, "Ah." "I'm sorry dear, I'm being as gentle as I can, but this should help the wound heal faster, " she says. "It's okay mom. I know your only trying to help me get better. I'll just have to, Aah! Go with the pain," you says as she continues to clean your wound and she gives a slight chuckle. "Well you better get your rest dear. We need your leg to heal fast if you want get back to playing with the pups," she says "Yes mom," you say not putting up an argument, and soon fall asleep between her fore paws. She gives you another gentle lick as you fall asleep and says "Sleep well my little one. You'll regain your strength soon. No matter what, the pack will protect you and your father and I will love you with all our hearts." She nuzzles you and then places you next to her as your father walks up. He smiles the sight of you cuddled up next to your mother's side. He then lays next to your mother and they too fall asleep.
11112212111111111212122.title: First night as an alpha pup.

choices: You wake up the next morning back in your family's resting place.
Your mom wakes you up an hour later.
111122121111111112121222.content: You were asleep for a couple of hours, when all of the sudden you feel your mother grab you by the neck. "Huh," you said before your body went completely numb and you mother was heading down from the resting place. You had no idea what was going on, but whatever it was, your instinct was telling you that it was something bad. She, the beta female and some other ranks who had pups were moving you and your friends deeper into the cave. As soon as you were at the end, your mother gently placed you down and you ask, "Mom, what's going on?" "We have another wolf pack outside and we don't know if their friendly. Your dad will try to reason with them, but it seems a bit odd for a wolf pack to show up this late at night. That's why we brought you pups down here. To make sure you pups will be safe in case we have to fight them," she replies. "I hope we don't have to fight them. There's been enough fighting with the lynx's today," you say. "I know dear, I know, don't worry though, our pack is very strong they'll be able to fend them off. Now get some rest dear, I'll wake you when it's over Nanokami," your mom says. You soon fall asleep, as do the other pups, while all the mothers stayed awake to keep an eye on all of you.
111122121111111112121222.title: Something happens later in the night..

choices: swallow you and the pups whole
drag the pups out of the den
111122121111111112122.content: You started to wrestle and scratch the pups playfully. Then one of the females started to feel uneasy. Then she started to
111122121111111112122.title: join right in and play with them.

11112212111111112.content:
At first, you are uncomfortable, but the fur feels warm and soft, almost like last night. You cover up with the fur and fall asleep almost immediately.

In the morning, you are nudged awake again by the Alpha female. She smiles and nudges you, forcing you to stand up. The Alpha Male stands before you.

"So, you are finally awake. I was beginning to worry."

You gasp as you realize the wolf is talking! You wonder if it's all a dream.

The Alpha Female goes to stand by the Alpha Male.

"The spiritual furs worked really well. He looks so... different! Yes, different."

She smiles.

You frown and look down at your body. Your body is covered in a thin layer of gray fur. Your hands are slightly paw-like (you still have opposable thumbs and four fingers), and you have slightly more muscle.

You gasp and close your mouth, then wince in pain. You feel your teeth, which are now stronger and more fang-like. Your ears are more pointy and you can hear and smell better.

"What happened to me? What did you do to me?"

"We made you more like a wolf. It's not going to affect you any more. We gave you our gift."

"Now that you speak our language, things will be much easier. Come." The Alpha male beckons you out of the cave into the forest.
11112212111111112.title: Overnight Enhancements

111122121111111121.content: Where does the alpha take you?
111122121111111121.title: More learning

1111221211111111212.content:
You, still on all fours as its become a routine for you, follow the Alpha Male to a small clearing in the forest where you see animal tracks scattering the forest floor. The Alpha Wolf then beckons you with his paw to two sets of tracks.

"It's time you train on your hunting skills, before you are two sets of tracks left here by two animals that intruded our territory. I want you to follow one set of prints and bring me back the animal as it will be your breakfast." The wolf licks your cheek in a way of wishing one good luck.

You, being in love with and all relating with nature know by instinct what animals made the two sets of tracks. The set to your left leading to the river you were thrown in a few nights ago were made by a rabbit. The prints you see to your right, leading into an area deeper in the forest, were made by a small fawn.

You give the Alpha Wolf a nuzzle on the nose as you make your decision of following the...
1111221211111111212.title: deep into the forest

choices: You will scratch at the tree until your nails are sharp enough.
11112212111112.content:
The Alpha Male takes you deep into the forest, far past any distance that would allow you to memorize the path back. You shudder at the thought that the wolf might leave you behind and force you to find a way back on your own. If that happened, you were screwed. In truth, the Alpha Male did plan such a test for another day, but today you would not be subjected to such a thing. You could tell by a smirk on his face that he knew that if he left you here alone today, you'd freeze to death when the sun went down. Naked as you were, even a fire wouldn't keep you warm enough, and there was nothing providing a sturdy shelter.

The wolf comes to a halt, causing you to stop as well. He lifts his back leg and pisses on a rock, probably refreshing a mark indicating territory. The wolf then growls at you; you watch as he sniffs the mark. He wanted you to do the same. The thought of sniffing a wolf's piss grossed you out, but after what you had gone through already, you knew it would be best not to disobey.

With a heavy sigh, you get down on all fours and sniff the mark. It smelled just like any other pee mark. Seeing that you didn't get it, the wolf places a heavy paw on your head and smothers your face against it. You hack and spit and curse out about being forced into such a degrading act. The wolf then points to another mark. Not wanting your face to be pressed into more piss stains, you go over and sniff it. To your surprise, it smelled different, surprisingly different.

"This isn't from a wolf, is it?" you ask the Alpha Male.

The wolf shakes his head.

Now you understand why the wolf did what he did, though you kind of wish that it wasn't necessary. Now that you could tell the difference, you could find the wolves' territory. The wolf also points out various claw marks to show you where to go if you found yourself lost. The Alpha Male looks at you, as if expecting you to do the same if you got lost. The wolf slashes at a fallen tree log, leaving a deep mark and tells you to the same. You try, but you can't leave any indentation of any kind.

The wolf heaves what looks like a sigh.
11112212111112.title: Learning to Track

1111221211112.content:
BUT I DON'T KNOW HOW TO SWIM! *SPLASH*
In less then a few seconds your thrown into the freezing waters, Quickly sinking like a stone you panic and begin to make a break for the surface. Coming up fast you can hardly see... You keep being dunked and forced under the water only to come back above the surface a few seconds later. Another huge wave forces you under making you swallow huge amounts of water and coughing it up again. When you surface again your next obstacle comes to you...
1111221211112.title: Don't know how to swim.

choices: you wake up in the cave
you wake with the alpha male stand over you
11112212111121.content: You then see that there are rapids ahead of you and start getting pulled under. You try to keep your head above water and then see what you didn't want to. A rock was right in front of you and with no way to evade it you say, "Shit." You close your eyes and then wam, blackout.
11112212111121.title: Rapids!!!

choices: remain calm and what has happened
111122121111211.content: You wake up in the cave with the alpha female laying next to you and looking at you with a worried face along with the rest of the pack. "Thank goodness, your finally awake Nanokami." This gave you a such a shock that she could speak. You then look at yourself and see that your body has completly trasnformed into a wolf pup.
111122121111211.title: you wake up in the cave

1111221211112111.content: you run as fast as you can out of the cave adrenaline pushing you farther and farther away from the pack but you soon tire out and collapse from exhaustion. you then hear something coming as you slowly turned your head around you saw...
1111221211112111.title: freak out and run

11112212111121111.content: It was the wolf pack coming towards you, the alpha pair in front and before you pass out from exhaustion you feel the alpha female pick you up. A few hours later you wake up and this time are laying between the alpha females forepaws and once again everyone is looking at you. "Easy does it Nanokami, don't freak out dear. You need to take it slow. Your skull's have taken a good knock after hitting that boulder," says the alpha male. Nanokami must have been the name they gave you, and for some reason you cant remember anything past when the alpha female found you in the woods, not even your own name. So you stick with Nanokami and ask, "What happened to me? How, how did I change into a wolf?" "Well It happens to everyone who comes through here, but your the first in six months. They come to this mountain, some are in the same condition as you and they transform after two days of being with the pack. You've been out cold for the past three days, so you transformed two days ago," the alpha female says. "Sorry for freaking out and running off earlier, I can understand if everyone is mad at me. You brought me here and were taking care of me, and I repay you by running away," you say, hanging your head low. The Alpha female replies, "It's alright little one. We were kind of expecting that to happen, but we were surprised at how far you got. The last one who freaked out only made it as far as the den's entrance. No one is mad at you. We're just relieved your finally awake." "Well I have to help check the borders this morning, so I'll leave you two alone for now. I suggest that we get volunteers for the hunting party, and some to watch the rest of the pups including my own," the alpha male says before taking his leave along with everyone else. "What did he mean by 'including his own'?" you ask the alpha female, with a confused look on your face. "Well we do have our own pups. You just haven't met them yet and they are actually sitting right behind you," she says as you look behind you and see three other pups (one boy and two girls, all your age) looking at you with welcoming eyes. "And we talked about it and wonder if you would like to become part of our family dear," she finishes. You were taken back by this offer. To become part their family, that was a bit overwhelming and you wonder if this would make the other pups jealous of you. When looked the only other pups (four more to be exact, and same number of boys and girls) were sitting next to the alpha female. You weigh out your options and accept her offer. You say, "I'm grateful for the offer. Thank you, but what are we going to do about my leg. I actually noticed it was sprained after I collapsed from exhaustion." "My mate Strongmoon will back with some vines and twigs after he's done with patrol. We just didn't want to touch it incase you woke up and tried to run off again. Oh, I almost forgot introductions. My name is Winterwind, but you can call me mother and Strongmoon father. This is your brother Talcain, and your sisters Aria and Nyla," Your mother says. "Hi Nanokami," your sibling say in unison. "Hi sibs," you reply back making everyone giggle. "Well We'll introduce the rest of the pack later. Right now It's time for lunch," she says and she lays on her side positioning herself so you didn't have to move much. Your siblings start to suckle, but your a little hesitant until you here your mom say as she nudges you, "Go ahead son, drink." You latch on to one of her nipples start to nurse and soon feel warm nourishing milk flow down your throat. The milk tasted sweeter then anything you've ever tried. You continued to nurse until you were full and feel your strength come back to you. After that you laid there with your siblings playing the guessing game.
11112212111121111.title: it was the wolf pack

11112212111121112.content: You soon feel pain surging up your right leg after collapsing, but wasn't what you were worrying about. Something was coming towards you, and it was coming fast. At first you thought it was gonna be the wolf pack, but then again why would the come after you, you had just run out on them. You soon see what it was, it was a mountain lion (female), and she looked both mean and hungry. You try getting away from her but with your leg, whether it be broken or sprained, didn't get you far before she had her paw on top of you. You fear what she will do next and soon find out as she drags her claws across your already injured leg. You scream in pain, but don't expect anyone to come and help you. You then look at the the lion and she looks like she's about to go for your throat, when all of the sudden one of the pack members knocks her off of you. You look at who it was, and it was the alpha male who had hit her, but now more wolves had entered the fight. The alpha female was standing above you and you hear the alpha male yell, "Winterwind, get Nanokami back to the den!" "Yes Storngmoon,", Winterwind replies, both sound worried rather then mad. She then picks you up and hurries back to the den, along with some other members of the pack.
11112212111121112.title: readers choice

111122121111211121.content: Once you were back at the den, Winterwind sets you down between her paws. You hung your head in shame, feeling responsible for what had occurred, and feel guilty as well. If something happened to one of the pack members, it was because of you. You think now they will never forgive you, and make you the lowest rank if they don't kick you out. You begin to cry silently. Winterwind notices this and says, "Hey, it's okay Nanokami. Don't worry, that cougar is no match for this pack. My mate will be back soon, in the mean time we need to tend to your leg. It's hurt pretty bad." "I'm sorry for what I did. I should have known better, You took me in and were teaching me the ways of the pack, and I repay you by running off. I just hope none of the member's are severely injured or killed. I'm sorry for putting all of you in danger," you say, preparing for whatever was going to happen. "You don't need to apologize little one. We were expecting you to react the way you did. It happens to most humans once they see they've transformed. We were just worried we wouldn't get there in time, and what happened was coincidence. We understand why you ran off, you were alone, scared and weakened. Seeing a pack of wolves and that you had become one was an overwhelming experience for you. My mate and I have talked it over and want you to become part of our family. My pups, Talcain, Arya, Northwind will be more then happy to have you as a brother," Winterwind says as Strongmoon walks in. "I thought you would've had the omega pair take care of me for what I did," you say. "Oh no dear, the omega pair isn't ready to take care of pups," she replies. "And trust me Nanokami, I've seen pups get themselves get in to deeper trouble then what you got into, so don't be so quick to assume we will be harsh on you for what happened. Besides I think you've taken enough punishment to last you a month, after what you've just been through," Strongmoon says. You blush a little and then see the pups Winterwind spoke of and they look at you with welcoming eyes. "So, will you accept our offer little one? And don't worry, this won't make the beta's pups jealous," Winterwind says. "Yes," you say as you nuzzle her. She nuzzles you back and says, "Alright, now we need to mend that leg of yours, my mate already has the vines and twigs to make splint, and I'll put some leaves on your wound once I'm done cleaning it. Pups, go off and play, your brother will be fine." And with that, they go and play tag. "Hold your leg out son," Your dad says, and you slowly put it out, because it hurts to move it. He starts to make a splint for leg and say, "Ow," as you wince in pain from the splint tightening. "Shhhh, it's okay honey, I know it hurts. If you need to cry, it's fine," your mom says. "Ow, this teaches me not to wonder off alone, ow," you say with tears falling down your face. "Sense of humor in tact I see," you dad says as he finishes making your splint. You smile with tears rolling down your face. Your mom says as she nuzzles you again, "You were brave dear, it's okay to cry. We can't have you walking any where for a couple of days, so don't try to wrestle with your siblings Nanokami." "Alright mom," you say, knowing it's better to not argue with her. "Now, it's time for you pups to have lunch," She says as she lays on her side. Your siblings come up and start to nurse, but you are hesitant, for you had not had wolfs milk before, but then again you can't remember anything from your past life, including your name, so you stick with Nanokami. Your mother notice you weren't nursing and nudges you towards her nipples and says, "Go ahead my little one, drink. You need this kind of nourishment for the next few weeks. Your only 6 days old dear, so it's completely normal for you to nurse, go ahead." You then latch on to the nipple closest to you and begin to suckle, feeling warm milk flow into your mouth and down to your stomach. The milk tasted so sweet, you want to keep nursing, but your stomach said otherwise. You then latch off of your mother and your mother smiles and gently picks you up and places you between her fore paws. You make yourself comfortable between your mother's fore paws, as she cleans your wound and gives you a bath.
111122121111211121.title: Back at the den.

1111221211112111211.content: After your mom gave you a bath you take nap between her forepaws feeling a little tired from your encounter with the cougar. "Don't sleep too long dear or you won't be able to sleep later tonight," She says before you fall asleep. As you nap your mother puts some leaves on your wounds to help them heal faster, but your nap doesn't last long as your sister Northwind comes up and licks you on the cheek making you say, "Huh, who, what, what's up." She giggles as you say this and replies, "Time to get up sleepy head, Arya Talcain and I want you to play with us." "Well what can we play? I can't exactly get up and run around with you guys, I sprained my leg remember?" you say, curious of what they had thought of to play. She giggles again and replies, "We know, that's why our brother and sister are getting the other pups to come and play here, don't worry we'll think of a game." "Well, while you play your game up here, I have to meet with the beta's to see who wants to go on the hunt tonight and who's staying to watch you pups," Your mom says. You soon see the other pups coming up as your mom walks down. "Well, what game do you think we should play?" one of the beta pups asks. "Maybe you two should introduce yourselves to Nanokami first," Talcain says. "Oh right, my names Hayate," Hayate replies. "And I'm Nyla. Forgive my brother, he gets excited when thinking of a new game," Yuma says. "Yeah, sorry about that," Hayate says. "That's okay. So, what game are we playing anyways?" you ask. "How about 'Name the Animal', I describe a certain animal on the mountain and you guess what that animal is, whoever guesses first gets to think of the next animal," Nyla says. "Sounds fun," you say, and you play this until dinner.
1111221211112111211.title: After your bath.

1111221211112112.content: "What exactly happened to me and how long was I out?" you ask, "Not to be rude or anything." "Well, you've been out for a little more then a day, but after you hit that rock you blacked out and your body started to transform. It has some thing to do with the river and whatever type of animal finds you first that desides what you transform into. We thought you were going to freak out and run just like the last one did, you suprised us when you just stayed calm," she tells you. "Wait, you mean I'm not the only human to pass through here? Just out of curiousity, how many pack members here are wolves who used to be humans?" you ask. "Very few," the alpha male states, "Because most leave once they find out. And now you have a choice will you stay or leave? If you stay, you will become my son and the pack will protect you with their lives. But if leave we will not be able to protect you and many who venture off try to look for a way off the mountain with no success and have already forgoten why by that time. The choice is yours alone Nanokami."
1111221211112112.title: remain calm and ask what has happened

choices: The pack returns with food and another human.
11112212111121121.content: You decide it is best to stay with the pack since they said they will protect you and on top of that, you can't remember anything about your old life your, freinds, family, where you lived, you can't even remember your name, so you stick with the one they gave you. Plus you don't know what kind of dangers are lurking about out there, and you'll probably forget any recollection of being human. "I'll stay," you say, "I really don't have anywhere else to go and I know I'm definately too young to fend for myself." "A very wise choice," Replys the alpha male, "You should get some more rest. Your skull's taken a good knock." "I'm sorry I failed the swimming test," you say with a feeling of embarasment. "It's alright, alot of first timers couldn't do it. Right?" he asks. Many wolves nod their heads in agreement. "For how small you were, no offence, It would ha been remarkible if you did. But now, your stronger, even at your young age." This helps you feel better and gain some confidence. "Well, I must go now I'm leading tonight's hunt," he says with pride, and takes his leave. Everyone starts to leave and talk to each other, except for the alpha female who stays with you and says, "Thank you for deciding to stay, oh, where are my manners, my name is Nyra, and my husbands name is Talcane. But you can call us mom and dad if you want. I'm sure that the others want to introduce themselves to you and you surely make many freinds. As soon as your dad gets back from the hunt, I'll eat some meet to produce more milk than I have right now so that you don't run short when you start to drink. For now get some rest dear, I'll wake you up when your father gets back." You finally do fall asleep but still feel the pain in your head. When your mother wakes you up...
11112212111121121.title: you stay with the pack

111122121111211211.content: The pack has returned with a big moose carcus. You thought for sure your father must have taken a good amount of the pack with him to take that beast down. The pack soon dug in, one rank after the other. After your mother got her fill, she layed down and exposed her under belly, where you soon latched on to one of her nipples and suckled, feeling warm, nurishing milk flow down your throat. You drank until your stomach told you there was no more room. You then latched off and said, "Thanks mom." "Your welcome," she replies. She picks you up and carries you over the bed where your father is laying. Then she sets you down between her and your father and lay between them, feeling content and safe. "Good night Nyra," your dad said. "Good night love," your mom replies. "Good night Nanokami," your dad finishes. "Good dad, good night mom," you say. "Good night son," she replies to you. And with that all three of you fall asleep.
111122121111211211.title: The pack returns with food.

choices: knew the human was your real mom/dad
111122121111211212.content: you see the wolf's come back with food but you see something else. you then ask your mom what the thing was and she said it was a human. a human? you said confused yes she said. then as you looked at the human you...
111122121111211212.title: The pack returns with food and another human.

1111221211112112121.content:
you growl looking at the human, you know who he was, you slowly approached him growling louder, "son what's wrong?" your mother asks "i know him" you say growling licking your lips as your stomach growls "who is he?" your mom asks "he was my father" you say jumping on them and tearing into



his left arm

His stomach
1111221211112112121.title: knew the human was your real mom/dad

choices: The Beta pair will look after her.
1111221211112112122.content: You did not recognize the human. It was female, and she seemed to be in as bad of shape as you were when you first arrived. It was your dad who had brought her in and she seemed very scared, which you could understand since she was surrounded by wolves and thought it might be best to show her some kindness. You ask your mother, "Is it alright if I give her some meat mom? You know how the pack gave me some when I was here." "Of course son, but you'll have wait for the rest of the pack to have their fill. I'll save her a piece so you can give it to her. She might find it cute, then you have to have some milk," your mom says. The pack had their fill and then your mother walked over to the human girl with you, and you had the piece of meat in your mouth. She looks at you and her mother and she trembles. You then drop the piece of meat and push it towards her. She is hesitant, but then your mother gives her gesture signaling her to eat it. She does so and eats all of it and then she does the submission posture that you did and this surprises both of you. Your mother licks her and then grabs her by the back of the neck after licking it. You follow your mother up to your resting place having a little trouble climbing and didn't realize that your dad had come behind you and chuckled before picking you up. He carried you the rest of the way and once you were there he set you down and you walked over to your mother to have your fill of milk. You were fully aware that the human girl would become one you, but you didn't know she'd get the same offer. So, you ask after nursing, "Mom is she going to be my sister or is someone else looking after her?"
1111221211112112122.title: did not know the human

choices: Many  pack members are outside talking.
Everyone is inside waiting in the den for you and your dad.
111122121111212.content: When you wake up from unconsciousness you see the alpha male standing over you and wonder what is going to happen now. At first all you could see was his figure since your vision was still blurry from impact. You also have a pain in your right arm and don't want to move it. As your vision clears up you see the Alpha male and he looks a whole lot bigger. You also see an expression on his face, which was not a sign of disappointment, but worry and said, "Thank goodness your awake little one. I was afraid that rock would have put you in a coma." (Wait, he can talk? And the last time I was called little one was when I was.....) your thoughts trail off as you look at your body which was now that of a week old wolf pup. You are in a state of shock at what has happened to you. Your arms were now forelegs and your knees were bent the way wolves were of course. Your body was now covered in light gray fur, which matched that of the alpha female, your face was the shape of a wolf's, your ears were now on top of your head and you had grown a tail, definitely telling you that you were no longer human in any shape or form. You look at the alpha male and he beats you to the punch, "Relax little one, I know that you are surprised at what's happening, but this is a blessing. Your one of us now and will have much easier time walking on all fours now. I know the pack and my mate will be pleased to see their newest member in his new body." "Well what position will I have in the pack, am I the new omega?" you ask. "If you were an omega, you would have been trained by the omega pair. So no, your an alpha. By the way my name is Strongmoonand and my mate Winterwind is the one who found you. She couldn't bare the thought of leaving you there to die, or to let us feast on you so we took you in. We were surprised that you had some wolf in you. My mate and I want to become your parents and our pups are looking forward to a new brother. You just haven't seen them yet since you were asleep before they were and woke up after they did. We should be heading back to the den before it gets dark. The Mountain can be dangerous at night for pups your age Nanokami," he replies. He had called you Nanokami and you went with it since you can't remember anything from your human life, even your own name. You then say, "I can't make it back on foot. I think I may have sprained my leg, it really hurts." "Well I'm not too surprised that it did after you had hit that boulder, so I will carry you back to the den. We're going to have to let that heal for a few days, so no rough play with you siblings," He says in a fatherly tone. "Yes dad," you reply making him smile at the fact that you were already accepting them as your family. He proceeds to grab you by the back of your neck and picks you up. Your body goes numb and you cant move as he carries you back to the den. You figure that this makes it easier or the parents to carry their pups so that they don't put up a fight. Right now you didn't want to fight back, you'd rather have him carry you back then have to limp all the way back. Once you are back at the den....
111122121111212.title: The Alpha male is worried.

1111221211112121.content: You see many of the pack members outside the den in little groups talking, and the pups (possibly some a few of them were your siblings) were chasing and tackling each other. You know full well that you can't play like that for a few days after what your dad told you. As the two of you get closer you notice that some talking has ceased and the pack members are looking at you with smiles on their faces. One of the pack members come up and says, "Good evening brother. How's Nanokami doing? I see his transformation is complete. He has his mother's fur." Your father sets you down and says,"He is fine Sayaka, but his leg is sprained, so he's going to have to take it easy. I'm sure his siblings are anxious to see their new brother. Oh, Nanokami this is your aunt Sayaka, she's our beta female and Hakuo is your uncle. He's the Beta male." "Hi," you say timidly. Your aunt giggles and says, "There's no reason to feel shy honey, your safe with the pack. I heard a lot of the members talking about how cute you are right now. I'm sure the girls fall for you when you get older." "I think that's enough sis, he's already had a lot to take in one day and he doesn't need more to make him pass out," your Father says sternly. She replies, "Sorry Strongmoon, guess I got a little carried away. I'm sure he'll learn a lot more tomorrow. I'll let you two head to the den, I'm sure Nanokami's exhausted." Your father nods and picks you back up carrying you into the den where your mother was waiting.
1111221211112121.title: Many  pack members are outside talking.

choices: You have a rough sleep. Nitemare wakes you up.
You have a peaceful sleep. Wake the next day.
11112212111121212.content: As your taken into the den, you see your mother and she is happy to see you. Your father sets you down in front of her and she says, "Hello Nanokami, I see your transformation has gone along nicely. I'm sure you have many questions son, and they will be answered with time, but you must be overwhelmed with all that has happened to you so your questions can wait another day. Your going to need nourishment soon and you and your siblings are not old enough eat meat yet so we'll have to wait until the hunting party gets back, then after I've had my fill you and your siblings can nurse. For now just take it easy son." "Yes mom. I really don't think I can do much after I sprained my leg in the river," you reply. "Well then, we can't have your siblings playing rough with you for a while then can we?" she says as your siblings come running in. "Nanokami, this is your brother Talcain and sisters Nyla and Arya. Pups this is your new brother Nanokami," she continues. "Hi Nanokami," they say in unison. "Hi," you say back. "So how are you feeling Nanokami?" Talcain asks. "Well I sprained my leg, so I wont be running around for a while. Other than that I feel fine, just a little overwhelmed as mom put it," you reply. "Well, then we'll have to make a game that doesn't involve running and wrestling. Arya, Nyla, What do you think?" he asks. "I agree," Says Nyla. "Yeah, I don't want to leave our new brother out of all the fun," Arya says kindly. "Well playing will have to wait little ones. It's time for dinner and then bed time. It's been a long day," She says. "Awwww," you all say in unison. This makes your mother giggle as she heads down to have her fill. Once she is finished she comes up and lays on her side to let the four of you nurse. You all have your fill, then your mother says, "Bedtime little ones." "But mom," Nyla says and the four of you yawn. "We wanna stay up," Arya adds. Your dad walks up with vines and twigs dropping them to say, "I don't think so. You 4 are already on the verge of collapsing on your sides already. Nanokami, I need you to stay awake for just a little while longer. We need to make a splint for your leg," he says as your siblings pass out, and you were on the verge yourself but your mom quickly nudges you. "Put out your leg Nanokami," your mom says. You slowly put it out since it is painful, then your dad starts working on it. Your about to dose off again, and your mom says as she nudges you again, "Stay with us son, just a few more seconds." Your dad finishes and says, "We're done. Now you can sleep Nanokami." With that you are out cold. Your mother then picks you up place you next to her with your brother and sisters. Then they too fall asleep as does the rest of the pack.
11112212111121212.title: A talk with your mother.

111122121111212121.content: As you sleep you start to have a nitemare. You are in the river again, but your a wolf this time. The rapids come again and you do your best to keep your head above the water. While you keep going you don't see a boulder, but a wolf that didn't look like it was from the pack, and it was smiling, as if it wanted you to drown. All of the sudden you hear someones voice. You couldn't understand what they were saying for a second, but then you hear them say, "Wake up Nanokami." You jolted awake panting heavily and see your brother and mom are awake and are looking at you worried. "Nanokami, easy, easy," your mom says as you jump between her forepaws. "Dream was that bad, huh?" Talcain says. You nod as you slow down your breathing and your mother pulls you closer to her body. "It's alright son, we're here. shhhh. Do you want to talk about it." You nod, feeling it was better to let them know than to keep it to yourself. You say, "I was back in the river, where the water was rough and quick. I thought I was going to hit the rock but it wasn't there. Instead I saw a wolf. He didn't seem to be part of our pack and he was smiling. As if he wanted me to drown. After that I woke up." "It was just a dream son, but you say you saw a wolf. That could be your sixth sense kicking in. We'll be on the look out for rouge wolves and members of rival packs. You don't have to worry though. Our pack is prepared for any ambush or battle that could take place," Your mom says. "Yeah, and you can count on me and our sisters to help you out of any scramble bro. We're family, and family looks out for each other," Talcain says. Your mom and you smile and you say,"Thanks bro." "We should probably get back to sleep. The sun will be up in a few hours but both of you need your rest," your mom says. "Yes mom," your brother and you say in unison and you soon fall asleep next to each other and your mother. Your mother licks and nuzzles you both as you fall asleep and was thankful that your sisters didn't wake up from all the movement. She soon falls asleep herself.
111122121111212121.title: You have a rough sleep. Nitemare wakes you up.

1111221211112121211.content: The next morning you and your brother are still asleep and your mother told your sisters to go play for a bit so the 2 of you could get your rest. She explained what happened last night and they understood not to bother the two of you. For another hour she let you sleep and then said, "Time to get up my little ones." She then nudges the two of you. "Do we have to wake up now?" you groan, "Yeah, we wanna sleep more," Talcain added. Just then you hear the screams of your sisters and the both of you jump in surprise, fully awake now. Your mother goes running towards the entrance of the den and you see your sisters running in towards her. Your mother then steps in front of them and you see another wolf walking in. It was the wolf from your nightmare. You are frozen with fear and your brother realizes what's happening and is also unable to move. Your mother says something to the wolf and he says something back, just then your father comes running in and stands beside your mother and says something as well, though neither you or Talcain can hear what is being said and your dad seems a bit more aggressive towards the wolf. The wolf leaves soon after that and your parents walk up with your sisters who are both trembling. "Seems your vision came true sooner then expected Nanokami," your dad says. "Huh? How did you know about my dream?" you ask confused. He replies"Your mother told me this morning. Seems he slipped through our patrol this morning, and I can see why. We can only scan so much area, so he just found the right spot to slip through. Seems he thought he could kidnap your sisters to try and gain leadership of the pack. Those rouges don't know when to stop trying for the highest rank. Your mother tried reasoning with him and he refused to listen, so I kicked him out of our territory and told him if he invades our territory again we won't be so charitable next time." You understood what he meant by that and soon went off to play with your sisters.
1111221211112121211.title: Next morning.

1111221211112122.content: Everyone was waiting in the den for the 2 of you and were smiling. Your father sets you down, gently, and says, "Everyone, as you can see our newest pack and family member is fully transformed. Nanokami has much to learn, and I'm sure that you all are more then eager to meet him and help teach him, but we can worry about that another day. For now we need to let him rest, his leg is badly sprained, so pups no rough housing for a few days. Winterwind, if you could be kind enough take our son up to our resting place with his siblings." "Of course dear," Your mom says smiling, and she grabs you by the back of your neck and carries you up to the resting place. You are soon set down next to your siblings and your mother says, "I'll be back after the meal pups." and she takes off to feast on the fresh kill.
1111221211112122.title: Everyone is inside waiting in the den for you a...

choices: a few weeks later or earlier.
11112212111121221.content: All the pups were your age and the male pup says, "So, your our new brother huh? My name's Talcain,". "Hi, so, my name's Nanokami, that's what everyone calls me right?" you ask. Your brother nods and says, "These are our sisters, Nyla and Northwind." You sisters say hi and your brother says, "Mom should be finished with her meal soon, then we can have ours." "So are we still too young to eat meat yet?" you ask. "Yep, so we'll be having some of mother's milk. So dad took you on your first swim test. How did it go?" Nyla asks. You hung your head low in disappointment and say, "I failed, and as you can see I sprained my leg." "Hey don't sweat it bro. None of us passed either, in fact I sprained my hind leg and could walk for a till today," Talcain says as he puts a paw on your shoulder. You smile and ask, "So you were only a few days when he took you out for your test?" "Two days ago actually so your not too far behind," he says. "Mom's back guy's," Northwind says and you all turn your heads to see your mom walking up. She soon lays on her side and signals you to go ahead and drink. Your siblings proceed to suckle, but you are a little hesitant to do so since you've never had wolf's milk before and were new to the pack. Your mom soon nuzzles you and says, "Go ahead honey, your part of the family now, and you need this nourishment for the next few weeks." She then picks you up gently and places you close to one of her nipples. You then start to suckle and feel warm, nourishing milk enter your mouth and flow down your throat. The milk was sweeter then you could have imagined and you keep nursing till you feel full. You then let out a burp and are about to say "excuse me" when your siblings proceed to burp as well. You all laugh as does your mother as your dad walks up with twigs and vines in his mouth and drops them and says, "What did I miss that was so funny?" "Our pups just had some gas dear. They couldn't hold it in. But can you blame them? Their only a week old dear," Your mom says. He replies, "That they are dear. Nanokami, I need you to hold you leg out for me." You then put your leg out slowly to not feel so much pain and then your dad starts to make a splint for it. You yelp a little as the splint tightens around your leg. "It's almost over sweetheart. We know it hurts, shhhh," your mom says, and you breath deeply as you try to hold back your tears while your father mends your leg. Finally your dad finishes and you have shed a few tears. Your mother says as she nuzzles you close to her, "It's alright to cry dear. You were in pain, but you were very brave to take the pain." "I'll say, I nearly screamed when they were mending mine," your brother says making you smile. "Well, it's time for bed little ones," your mom says. "Aww, but mom," Northwind says as you all yawn. "We're not ti...mmmmm," you all say in unison before passing out cold. Your mom smiles and says to your dad as you sleep, "Not tired huh? Seems to me all them had too much fun for one day." your dad replies,"That or your milk made them sleepy, you know how mother's milk sometimes has that affect at night. Seems it outdid them this time." They both smile and place all of you next to your mother. The rest of the pack (aside from the ones on patrol) soon fall asleep as do your parents.
11112212111121221.title: Introductions while you wait.

choices: Your siblings go off and play.
111122121111212211.content: "Time to get up my little ones," your mom says as she nudges you awake. "I don't wanna get up," you groan as she keeps nudging you. "Yeah, I was having a good dream," you sister, Northwind adds. "Oh no, the four of you have had enough sleep today you better get up if you want play before the sun is high in the sky," your dad says. "That's after they have had their breakfast dear," Your mom says. The four of you get up and stretch as your mother lays on her side, and soon the for of you latch on to one of her nipples and drink. After breakfast was finished you ask your mother, "Mom, what am I gonna be able to do today? I can't go running or wrestling with my siblings with this sprained leg of mine." "Well you'll be staying with me today dear if your brother and sisters want to keep you company, then I won't stop them. I'm sorry this happened to you Nanokami," your mother says. "It's not your fault mom. It happened by chance, for all I know I could have gone over a water fall if there is one, and then where would I be," you say. "I see you sense of humor is still in tact. You'll just have to take it easy. Come on lets go outside so your not cooped up in the cave all day," she replies. And with that she gently picks you up and carries you out of the den.
111122121111212211.title: The next morning.

11112212111122.content: you could not believe your eyes as you saw a waterfall close by. you then...
11112212111122.title: WHAT IS A WATER FALL DOING HERE?!!

choices: drops you and you fall to the bottom of the waterfall
111122121111221.content:
what the fuck, am i going to die?, was all that was going through your mind as you quickly were approaching the edge of the waterfall you feel yourself falling.


~~~~~5 second black out period~~~~~

your quickly being shaken awake. when you open your eyes your staring at the bottom of the waterfall but you not falling , and you have a sharp pain on the back of your neck you glance up to see the alpha male standing in the water with no problem dangling you from his maw.

What does the wolf decides to do what cause of your swimming failure.
111122121111221.title: fall

choices: your back in the den lying between the alpha female's forelegs
your few yards away from the bottom of waterfall
111122121111222.content: The thought of falling down a huge water fall was enough to make you pass out all that was going through your head before you were completely unconscious was 'I hope I survive the fall.' when you wake up...
111122121111222.title: pased out

1111221211112221.content: Your back in the den but that's not the only suprise you get your also lying between the alpha female's forelegs with her look at you like a concerned mother wolf would her own pup. And that wasn't all you were feeling a little different, smaller to be exact, then you looked at your body and yelped in surprise that you were now a little wolf pup, about a week or 2 old. You look back at the alpha female who beats to the punch with the question you were about to ask and said, "I know what your question is little one, your wondering what happened to you, correct?" You nod your head in reply and wait for the answer. "Well, you've been out for 2 days after you were thrown into the river. My mate was quick to grab you before you went down the waterfall. After he brought you back you were already begining to tranform the fur came first then then rest of your body soon followed. Your one of us now and part of our family, my mate has chosen you to be his son and successor little one." You know your to small to escape her grasp she has around you, and even if they did let you leave where would you go you can't remember any thing about your past life, plus you don't know what dangers are out there and you don't know the territory either. "Thank you for your kindness and offer. I will accept, but what shall you name me? I can't remember my own, and I sure you don't want to keep calling me little one," you say. "How does Nanokami sound?" she asks. "Sounds great me" you reply.
1111221211112221.title: back at the den

choices: You wake up before everyone else.
11112212111122211.content: "Well Nanokami, I was going to give you meat if hadn't transformed into such a young pup, but your not even past 2 weeks old, so it only makes sense to give you my milk. Now I need to go and have my share of the kill so the rest of the pack can dig in, but I need you to stay here. Your head took a good blow from that boulder in the river so we need you to take it easy for a few days. Once I've had my fill, I'll let you nurse dear," she says, and with that she walk off and dug in with your new dad. You waited there patiently having a feeling if you tried to get up and walk you would pass out or make the pack angry. As you waited you thought that this would be the first time in a long time that you had mother's milk, let alone that it would be wolf's milk this time and not human milk, but you weren't complaining. You hadn't had anything to eat or drink in two days as far as you knew. You probably had some of her milk unconsciously, but you still were very hungry and thirsty, so having her milk would satisfy both needs. As soon as she finished eating she came up to your families resting place and laid on her side next to you and let you start nursing. As you suckle off one of her nipples, you feel warm nourishing milk flowing into your mouth and down your throat. The milk was sweeter than anything you remember tasting and kept nursing until you were full.
