Once you finish nursing, your mother then picks you up and places you between her forepaws again, proceeding to give you a bath. "How much cleaner can I get mom?" you joke. You both laughing and she says in a joking tone, "Well I can't have my son looking dirty if any girls come by tomorrow to say hi. Oh, I almost forgot my manners. My name is Winterwind and my mate's name is Strongmoon. And yes, you can still call us mom and dad, oh and you have a brother named Yuma who will also take over leadership once your father and I can no longer lead. We figure two Alpha pairs leading after we're gone is better than one, but no need to worry about that right now. Your brother's playing with the other pups right now but should be up in a little bit since it is almost time for bed. You should probably get a jum pstart on that dear. You need a lot more rest if you want to feel better." You didn't argue with her since she was your mother after all, and also due to the fact that she's three times bigger than you are, so she can easily overpower you. All you say is, "Okay mom." and you soon fall asleep between her forelegs. She gently places you to her side so she wouldn't wake you up and your brother comes to lay next to you. Soon everyone is asleep.
11112212111122211.title: Dinner time

1111221211112222.content: You see that you are washed up on shore a few yards away from the waterfall and that night fall is approaching. Your vision is a little disoriented and your legs feel like their at a different angle. They weren't broken, but seemed to bend the other direction and you soon see that your body is no longer human, but is that of a wolf pup, maybe a week or two old. As your vision clears up you see the alpha male running towards you and now looks a whole lot bigger to you due to the fact that you are smaller now, but why was he running to you? Was actually worried about you? You had just failed the swim test so you don't see why he would be worried. Maybe wolves weren't as savage as you were led to believe. As soon as he reaches you he asks "Are you alright Nanokami? I'm sorry didn't grab you before you fell, but the current was to fast." He called you Nanokami, that must have been what the pack called you while you were human, you stuck with it since you can't remember your old name. You say "I'm fine, just a little shaken from the fall. I do want to know how I became a wolf though if it's not too rude to ask." "Well most humans that have come to this mountain don't make it through the first night, but the few who have turn into wolves some time during the next day. Your transformation took place after the fall it seems. I hope you can forgive me for not pulling you out," He says. You reply "It's alright, I'm sorry I couldn't swim." "Well I can teach you another day but we have to get back to the den. I'm sure everyone wants to see how their newest pack member is doing. Oh, where are my manners. My name is Strongmoon and may mates name is Winterwind. We are going to be your new parents. Now, lets start getting back," he finishes. You get up and start to follow him, but as soon as you take your first step, you feel a sharp pain in your right foreleg and fall back down yelping in pain. Your dad immediately notices and comes back to you and asks, "What's wrong son?" You reply "My leg, it hurts. I think I sprained it." With that he says, "Then I'll carry you back home we're going need to let that heal for a few days." He then grabs you by the back of your neck and your body goes limp. You can't move a muscle. You guess this is every pups Achilles heal, and let him carry you. You can't really complain, it's better then having to walk all the way back with an injured leg and he could easily overpower you. And with that you head back toward the den.
1111221211112222.title: your few yards away from the bottom of waterfall

11112212111122221.content: By the time you got back to the den, the hunting party was hulling in the evening kill. It must have taken the entire party to take down the caribou but you didn't bother ask. You also knew that given your age your still t oyoung to eat meat, so whoever is producing milk right now, hopefully and probably your new mother, would be nursing you for a while. Once you were inside the den everyone looked in your direction, making you feel a little intimidated since you didn't know what would happen next. Your dad sets you down and says, "Everyone, as you can all see now, our newest pack member, Nanokami, has fully transformed into one of us and is now part of our family. I want everyone to make him feel welcome here since he has much to learn about the ways of his own kind (meaning wolves). I also advise the pups not to play rough with him for a few days due to the fact that he has sprained his leg. I'm sure you all want to get to know him, but that can wait till after dinner. For now let us feast on our kill." After picking you up once more and placing you gently on their resting place he went to the kill and started the feast. After your parents got thier fill your mother lays on her side and lets you nurse until you are full.
11112212111122221.title: Back at the den

111122121111222211.content: You found out while you were nursing from your mother, two other pups had come to nurse along with, they seemed to the same age as you. Once you had your fill, you were about ask your dad a question, but your mother beat you to the punch and said, "I know what your wondering son. Those 2 pups beside you are your new brother Talcain and your new sister Nyla." "Hi Nanokami" they say in unison as they finished nursing. "Hi sibs" you reply. All of you laugh at the statement. You start to talk about things that were new to you. Funny, you didn't know that you could even learn things from pups your own age. Your brother and sister say that they wan't to keep you company til you could walk again and for the rest of the night, you and your new family talk about things that don't relate to you ever being human. In fact the more you talk, the more memories of what happened during your time here 'in human form' begin to fade your mind and the pack's minds and everyone, including yourself start to see you as Nanokami, Strongmoon and Winterwinds third pup, and your siblings think that you were their real brother all along. The memory of you being thrown in the water had turned into a memory of you exploring with your dad and accidentally slip into the river and luckily survived the fall and kept your head above water since you could only paddle and not swim. You and your brother have your mother's fur (which is light gray) and your father's eyes (which are navy blue) and sister has your father's fur (which was just a tad darker then your mother's) and your mother's eyes (which were sky blue). Your mother had just finished with your bath's and all 3 of you start to get drowsy, so your parents place you next to each other and the 3 of you fall asleep, with your parents sleeping on etheir side of you.
111122121111222211.title: After dinner.

1111221211112222112.content: About an hour after falling asleep you start to toss and turn while you were dreaming. This grabs your mother's attention and she fears you may hurt your leg even further and tries to wake you up. While this was happening you were dreaming about the accident that happened at the fall and were trying to escape the fall. As you were about to go over, you shut your eyes in your dream and hear your mother's soothing voice saying, "Wake up Nanokami." You wake up breathing heavily as your mother says, "It's alright Nanokami, it's alright, shhhh. Everything's fine, you were just having a bad dream. I have a feeling it was about the fall." You nod your head and say under your breath, "I was back in the river (gasp) about to go over the fall and (gasp) the fall was really high." "Shhh, but it wasn't high, it did injure leg and your dad brought you back, remember?" she says. You nod and this helps you calm down and breath easier. She then says "Next time you go out exploring with dad, just stay away from the edge, alright?" You nod once more and fall back asleep soundly for the rest of the night.
1111221211112222112.title: you have a nitemare.

choices: skip to teenage years (in wolf years)
11112212111122221121.content: When you wake up the next morning you see your brother and sister already up and about. You let out a yawn and your mother says, "Good morning sleepy head, how are you feeling?" "Better, but my leg still hurts if I try to use it. How long was I out?" you ask. "A little longer then your brother and sister, but you needed the rest dear. Your brother and sister wanted to play with you, but they thought it best to let you sleep. It's amazing how the 3 of you care about each other so much. Talcain, Nyla your brother's awake." As soon as they heard this they came running over to play with you some of the other pups come and join in and are careful not play too rough with you due to your condition. Then another pup who seems to be a week older than everyone else comes up and starts to bully you saying, "So Nanokami, how does it feel not to be able play like everyone else around here? You seem to be too weak to even hold yourself up. You will never make a good leader." "Leave our brother alone Hayate," Your brother and sister say trying to defend you. You were a little suprised at this. "See, can't even defend yourself." "I can defend myself just fine Hayate. You know, instead of bullying everyone to try and make yourself look superior, maybe you should try and make freinds with everyone," you say "Yah, get to know them better than you already do," Nyla adds. "I think you would find it alot easier and it might be helpful to you in the future," Talcain finishes. Hayate is at a loss for words by your statements and everyone else is amazed and smiles at the 3 of you. All the pups are now looking at Hayate and he says, "I Guess I spoke to soon, you will make a fine leader someday, so will your brother and sister. I think I'll try doing what you said." "Good, so you want to hang out with us?" You ask. All the pups look at you in confusion for a second while your siblings know what your doing but then everyone else catches on to what is happening. "Sure, but, what can we do? I don't want to be rude, but I know I can't be too rough with you since you sprained your leg. How is it feeling by the way?" he asks. Your all suprised at his sudden change of heart but go with it and say, "Better, but it still hurts too much to walk on it." "Sorry about acting like a bully, but I thought everyone would respect me if they thought I was tough." "It's okay, come on lets play," you reply. For the rest of the day everyone plays with you make sure they aren't too rough. At the end of the day once everyone had their dinner and you and your siblings finished nursing, your mother says, "I am proud of you 3 today pups. It was very noble what you did. You all turned a bully into a friend and that is a true mark of leadership. I think the 3 of you will work well together in the future. Don't let anyone tell you different." She then licks the 3 of you and everyone says goodnight and you all fall asleep. You have the nitemare again but this time wake up as soon as you see your in the river. You see that your back in the den and as you fall asleep you think to yourself 'get out of my head'.
11112212111122221121.title: The next morning.

111122121111222211211.content: A few days after the accident your leg healed up and you were up and running around with your siblings and friends. Hayate had gotten to be a closer friend to you and your siblings over the past few days and was now trying to help think of something you could all do now that your leg was healed. Just then, your dad walks out and says, "Would you all like me to teach you how to swim today?" All of you nod eagerly, you think that would be best so if you fell into the river again, you be able to get out and not go over the falls. he then leads you to a pond that was deep enough to swim in. He then starts to show you how to fight the current when swimming. Now he wanted you to try it. At first you were a little nervous to be going into the water, but Hayate puts a paw on your shoulder and smiles at you, and this boosts your confidence. You then get into the water and start to swim the way your dad taught you. You were a natural, and your dad says "Your doing great pups, keep at it." Just then, you see one of the pups, Northwind, struggling and swim over to help her. Just before you got to her, Northwind's head went under. You then trust your instincts and dive under to help her back up to the surface. Once your heads were above water, you were both coughing and have Northwind get on your back and start to swim to shore, but you were having trouble keeping your head above water and were starting to swallow water and drown when you feel something underneath your body. It was your dad he had gotten you on to his back saying, "Hang on Pups," and brought the two of you back to shore. You both were still coughing up water once you are on shore and you then look at your dad, you felt you had disappointed him, but he was smiling. He says, "Nanokami, I'm impressed. You just started learning how to swim and were doing a good job, then you make an attempt to save Northwind. That is a very noble act, I'm very proud of you." "Yeah thanks for helping to save me," Northwind says. "Well, I don't think I ever would have gone in if Hayate hadn't boosted my confidence, thanks Hayate," you say. He replies, "Anytime Nanokami." "You know, I wasn't the only one going to help Northwind. I saw the rest of you swimming towards her. It's nice to know that everyone looks out for one another," you say trying not to take all the glory. They all smile and tour dad says, "Come on pups we best be getting back to the den. I need to help with the noon hunt and I think you've had enough excitement away from home today." And with that you start walking back. Northwind nuzzles your chin while your walking and then licks you. You were a little shocked by her gesture but politely nuzzle and lick back. Hayate walks up next to you as Northwind pads farther up and he says, "I think Northwind has a crush on you Nanokami. And I think you feel the same way, don't you?" "How could ya tell?" You ask. "I saw the way you were looking at her. It's was a little obvious," he says. You blush and wonder if you should talk to your dad about it. Right now you were just wanting to get back to the den.
111122121111222211211.title: when your leg is healed

1111221211112222112111.content: After the pack has it's noon hunt and you and your siblings have thier fill of your mom's milk word had spread fast about your effort to save Northwind. You couldn't help but feel a sense of pride in yourself. You also felt you were making your brother and sister jelious, but they weren't. Your brother says, "Hey Nanokami, you know we're not jelious. Saving her was instinct, not showing off. I saw the worry in your eyes when she was in trouble. If you had done it to show off, then we would be angry. Your not that kind of wolf bro. And if it's not to rude to say, I think you and Northwind are a cute pair." You blush and say, "Thanks Talcain, you know I'm too young to be setting my eyes on girls though." "Hey what's that suppose to mean?" Nyla sarcasticly asks, and you all laugh. Your father returns after talking with the grown-ups and says, "Well what's so funny? Have I missed something? Don't be keeping secrets from your dad now." "We were just talking about Nanokami and Northwind, dad," Talcain says. "Don't you think they make a cute pair?" Nyla asks. Your father says, "Well I think your all too young to know what love is yet but we'll see what happens with Nanokami and Northwind once their older. You decide to play wrestle tag for the rest of the day. After nursing you are all tired and as your mother starts to give you a bath your brother and sister fall asleep but you lay there eyes open. yor mom sees this and asks what's wrong. You tell her, "I just wonder what would have happened if I hadn't gotten to Northwind in time. What if she had drown?" She says"Well she didn't. And now she sees you as a good leader. I think that it was very brave of you and the entire pack is proud of you, your brother and sister, and the other pups for what you atempted to do for her. You should try and get some sleep dear, you've had a big day. And don't worry about could have happened. Think about how you showed the pack how helpful you are." And with that you fall asleep and she places you by your brother and sister.
1111221211112222112111.title: After lunch

choices: Skip to when you start training.
11112212111122221121111.content: It has been 2 weeks since the day of the accident in the lake and everyone had gotten bigger and stronger. Hayate, the oldest of everyone had to start training for hunting, so everyone wishes him good luck. The rest of you would start in a week, and by now everyone has gotten their taste of meat by now but are still in need of their mother's milk, not as frequent though. You and your siblings head outside to play as your father goes off with the hunting and your mother went off with patrol. The Beta pair are there to watch you, and as your running around you bump into Northwind, both of you tumble to the ground with her now on top of you. "Oops, sorry Northwind, didn't see you in front of me," you say. She giggles and replies, "That's okay Nanokami, hey are you guys playing tag?" "Yeah, You wanna play?" you ask. "Sure," she replies. "Then we better start running Talcain's it and he's coming," You say and both of sprint off in the same direction, laughing as you do. You do this for a while and wait for Hayate come back.
11112212111122221121111.title: 2 weeks later

111122121111222211211112.content: The day had finally come for you and your siblings to start training. Your father woke you all up early to get a head start on it. You are finally to your training grounds and your dad explains everything to the three of you and you understand the rules. You are about to pounce on your target when you hear something coming and you turn your attention to it. A moose had entered the training grounds and was staring at you. Your dad says, "Do not run or he'll charge." You hold your ground as the moose stairs at you and you think of what to do if he does charge. Soon you have to act because he is coming towards you. Your siblings want to help but your dad stops them and says, "He has to figure it out on his own pups." Your dad said not to run but you had to do something. Then you remember what your dad had told you a few days ago about moose's having a hard time turning sharply while charging. Your dad saw that you knew what to do and waited for you to take action. As it charges you, you take a stance and say in your mind (Wait for it. Wait for it. NOW!) at that moment you jump to your right and do a somersalt role. The moose runs for a little while more, giving you and your family enough time to retreat into the trees. Your father then says, "Well done Nanokami. How did you know to duck out of the way in time?" "Well, I remember what you said a few days ago about moose's and used that knowledge to my advantage. That's why I did what I did because if I had run before hand it would have kept following me," you reply. "I'm impressed bro. I never would have thought of that. But don't let it go to your head," Talcain says. "Don't worry I won't. Besides I'm sure there much more to learn than how to dodge a charging moose," you reply. "That's for sure. Maybe we should start heading back. What do you think dad?" Nyla asks. Your dad replies, "I think that's a good idea you all trained hard today and you've all had enough excitement for one day." The three of you smile and head for the den.
111122121111222211211112.title: Skip to when you start training.

choices: A howl bursting through the air outside the den
the sight of a slightly older Northwind (still the same age as you)
1111221211112222112111121.content: As you three and your dad head back inside the den, your mother comes in to welcome you back. "How was training?" Your father nods and replies, "Very well, but a moose had entered the grounds and interrupted our time. your mom whined in a worry way. "You all aren't hurt are you?" she asks. All three of you shake your heads. Sighing in relief, your mom licked dad and lays down to give you what was gonna be your second to last meal from mom. When that was all over, you and your siblings went to were all the pups were and played wrestling with all the pups till you are interrupted by...
1111221211112222112111121.title: back at the den.

111122121111222211212.content: You had just dreamed about the accident at the falls again and you wake up saying "Whoa, haven't had that dream in a while." Your siblings are still asleep as well as your mother, but your dad was already waiting outside the den. "Dad? Oh snap," you say as you just remembered you and your dad were going back to the falls today. You get up and head out the of the den quietly so not to wake anyone. Your dad was waiting outside talking to the on going patrol. As the walk off you walk up to him and he still towers you a little and say, "Sorry I'm up late dad." "Late? Your actually early Nanokami. I was gonna wake you up after talking to patrol. What woke you up son?" he asks. "I had that dream about the falls again. Guess it's kind of ironic and makes sense since we're going there," you say. Your dad smiles and says, "Well maybe there's some other reason behind it, but we won't know until we get there will we?" he replies, and with that the two of you take off.
111122121111222211212.title: skip to teenage years (in wolf years)

choices: Your sisters wake up as you bump into them.
You and your brother go play outside.
111122121111222212.content: As you finish nursing, you realize that it has made you drowsy and you can't keep your eyes open. You let your subconscious take over, but not before you saw three other pups scampering up to start nursing. You had to admit you were exhausted after having gone down a waterfall so you don't try and fight it and soon fall asleep. While you slept the three pups look at you and smile and after they had their fill they lay down next to you. The next morning your nudged awake by your mother as she says, "Nanokami, wake up little one." You open your eyes slowly as it was daybreak saying, "But mom, it's early and I'm still sleepy." She smiles at the fact that you are calling her mother and replies,"You need to get up dear, I'm going to tell you who your brother and sisters were before they wake up, and I know that you have accepted my mate and I as your mom and dad, but I just want to let you know that my name is Winterwind and your father's name is Strongmoon. Now your brother's name is Tailcan, and your sisters names are Aria and Nyla." After she finished introducing everyone, your brother wakes up and starts wrestling around with you as your sisters sleep.
111122121111222212.title: You fall asleep after feeding.

1111221211112222121.content: As you wrestle with your brother the two of you didn't realize that you were rolling towards your sisters and accidentally bump into them. They wake up and are startled by this making them yelp which in turn makes you and Talcain laugh. "What is so funny?" asks Nyla sternly. "Your faces," Talcain and you say in unison. They then look at each other and laugh along with you and Talcain. "Well do you guys wanna play wrestle tag?" Talcain asks. You and your sisters nod and all of you scamper off to play. While you play your mother is surprised and happy at how quickly you are starting to fit in with the family and the pack. You had just tackled Talcain when you heard....
1111221211112222121.title: Your sisters wake up as you bump into them.

11112212111122221212.content: You heard a long howl making you jump off your brother and the four of you ask your mother, "Mom, whats going on?" Many of the grown ups head toward the entrance to the den while your mother, the beta female and some other wolves who seemed they needed time to recover from recent battles were gathering you and the other pups towards the back of the den. Once there, your mother says "Now don't be scared little ones, but there is another pack outside that wants to take over our territory, and I have feeling we have run into them before. But don't worry, we're safe, our pack is too strong to back down and will not let them take the territory. They definitely would start running if your father wasn't hunting." As soon as she said that you hear a growl from outside, which could only be your father and the fighting ceased. You then hear him say, "This is the last time I will let your pack walk away with your lives. Next time you are in our territory, the punishment is death. You should realize after your first attempt that my pack is too strong and too fit for your pack to defeat. If you value your lives I suggest you leave now." The pack then left and your father walks in with the kill and the rest of the pack and you and your siblings go to greet him. After he drops the kill he then nuzzles all of you and says, "Hey pups, how's your leg feeling Nanokami? Hope it's healing fine." "Well I played a little more roughly then I should have this morning, so I hope it didn't get worse by much." you say as you look at your leg, which had a thick branch and some vines on it to be used for a splint now since your parents had put it on you while you were asleep. "Well, as long as you didn't play to the point where you made your leg hurt or the splint break, it should have done little damage. I do want you to take it easy for the rest of the day though, so Talcain, Aria, Nyla don't be wrestling around today, I want you all to find a game to play that won't involve running and wrestling, but for now let your mom feed you after she has her fill," he says. "Yes Dad," you all reply. You wait to nurse from your mother and then a question hits you and you ask her before the 4 of you nurse, "Mom, why does that pack want the territory so bad?" You all wait for her answer and she says, "Well for one Nanokami, the leader of that pack is bent on controlling all the territories on the mountain, and for another, Our territory is bountiful in food and forest protection for the pack. That pack's leader has made many attempts on other packs but has failed and all the other packs know that we're too powerful for them to conquer, so they don't dare attack. The only territory that he can set foot into other than his own is his brother's territory. His brother doesn't share his lust for power and knows better though, but it is nothing for you to worry about little ones. Your safe, and that's what matters. Now It's time for breakfast pups." With that, the four of you latch on and star to suckle, and this time the milk doesn't make you dose off.
11112212111122221212.title: A long howl.

111122121112.content: now being caried by the alpha female you try not to shiver in cold as you are crried out, now you are essentialy in wolf talk, which you only understand there bodies and motions. she says to sit still and wait when she brings a piece of a log to test your nails! now you with your un clipped well kept finger nils, slash at the bark and make a deep cut in the 2 inch bark but now all the nails you used are jagged but no pain?, now she has you sharpen the jagged edges into a fine point and has you try agian, this time no pain, no jagged nails! and now she takes you back from your strange trainig (well strange to you). now what?
111122121112.title: Female

1111221211121.content: you essentially can't wait but she motions for you to follow and several minutes later... there is a large deer! she wants you to get when suddenly a bear jumps out (grizley) and he stands up and says "test your might!" and you remeber that song as he slashs at you and misses then the she wolf yells "MORTAL KOMBAT!!!!!!" and you run at the bear and throw punch after punch, slash after slash, with your now stronger and adrenaline infused fists. then unlike the bear you go kick after kick etc as the bear only keeps losing because of your new speed + adrenaline you are just a little bit faster than the bear you are beating the hell out of as you start round two 2 wolfs (the beta pair) then the omega then you growl actually really close to thier, closer than should be posssible and you manage (through it's thick skin) you slit it's thoat, it stumbles, gurgles blood and falls down. ff7 victory song,as you throw your drenched hands in the air, fall down and pass out with a third (all to you) remainnig as (no one) has eaten yet and you can tell what thier saying because your blood bath+rage+adrenaline+ your sudden power/claws/newspeed=your body has changed as in your hands and feet are strong as a grizley's but look human, your feet are that of a wolf but you have bear's/wolf's+human's speed mixed together, you have guard hair but no real coat of fur and you speak people/animal (mostly canine or bear talk though!) now you all eat your fill and the alpha male is impressed he still gonna train you tommorrow though (but harder) you'll be a okay!
1111221211121.title: dinner time!

1111221212.content:
As the pack goes their separate ways to each spot to sleep, you notice that an old shaggy wolf is left on the sidelines eyeing you cautiously. You figure this must be your "sitter" since you really haven't a clue where to go sleep at that wouldn't be in someone else's bed.

The old wolf looks a little annoyed at being voluntold to look after this furless creature, although you heard nothing said prior.

You figure its a "he" by the salt and pepper fur that looks well worn and you can see there are scars here and there almost covered up. You think that there must be more to this fella then meets the eye.

The wolf approaches you and makes a "gruff" sound, uncertain what else to do- you follow.

"This place could use some cleaning.." You say to no one in particular. The wolf walking beside you perks its ears your way and huffs as it kicks a white bone from the path that leads away from the light.

You begin to get a little concerned because the light is fading fast and you can't see that well.
"Ease up fella," you call out and nearly stumble into the wolf that is waiting just a step ahead of you.

You can see the eyes of the wolf looking around as if to see whether or not you are out of ear shot of the others.

"You may hold onto my fur if you need."

You are momentarily stunned by what you just heard. No only was it in a language you can understand, its the voice of a female- similar to a concerned mother.

"Sorry I called you a fella, I really couldn't tell." You say feeling a bit awkward but not for long as you hold onto the wolf's back fur. It's surprisingly smooth and its calming to you.

"It is ok," she starts lowly, "there are reasons why I was picked to take care of you."

If there was light in the area you are sure there would have been a smirk on the wolf's muzzle as she said that last line... take care of you.

The hairs on the back of your neck stand on end as you try to decipher what that could have meant.
1111221212.title: Small mistake

choices: You wake up after a peaceful sleep.
11112212121.content:
The wolf finally comes to a stop, and you do to. You examine her closely.

"Are you really the Omega?" you ask. "I thought it was that other wolf who was pushing me around."

The wolf gives what almost sounds like a snicker.

"No," she answers, "I am not the Omega. Though I'm close enough to it. That wolf before was my little brother, he's the true Omega."

"Oh..." you answer, "I think he really hates me."

The female wolf gives another laugh.

"He doesn't hate you," she said in-between her giggles, "He's just abusing his new status. He wants you to know he's superior to you. You have to let him know who's boss. He tries it every time a new member is brought into the pack and each time he fails. That's why I'm watching over you, because he'll torment you. You better learn to stand up to him soon, because right now, you are not an official member."

The wolf stops talking for a moment, giving a grin.

"Not yet anyway..." she adds.

Something about the wolf's tone troubles you. She gives a yawn, a lies down in a small bed that appears to be made out of things like large raccoon skins. You get down and back off a bit.

"Get some rest little one, you'll have a lot to learn tomorrow." she says.

You aren't sleepy, but you agree to lie down. You lay awake until the silent night grows darker, and you decide to close your eyes. You can tell its darker even though there is little to no light in the cavern room already.

Only a few hours pass, and your eyes shoot open. You began shaking violently, shivering from a temperature so cold you can't imagine what is is. You can see your breath, and your clothes aren't helping at all. You look towards the wolf, and notice that she is awake as well.

"Cold, are you?" she asks.

You hold your shoulders tightly, and nod your head.

"Come lie down next to me," she tells you, "Don't worry, I won't harm you."

You don't really want to put full trust in her just yet, but you do so, making sure to approach her on all fours. You snuggle up beside her, her fur amazingly warm and snug. You can't help but get warmer as you lie against her.

"Why is it so cold?" you finally ask.
"Not to worry little one," she replies giving a suspicious grin, "You'll just have to wait a week or so until your fur coat finally grows in."

You are completely confused by the statement.

"W-What do you mean by that?" you stutter.
"All in due time, little one..." she replies softly, "All in due time."

She gently licks your cheek, and you can't help but feel comfortable and fall straight asleep. The wolf smirks as your eyes shut closed.

Though you're sound asleep, thoughts continue to run through your mind. What did she mean by her all of her statements? What was to become of you? Better yet, why could you understand this wolf? Maybe it isn't just her...
11112212121.title: A Cold Night

111122121211.content:
You awake to the warmth of the she wolfs body pressing against yours. Your movments cause her to wake and she smiles at you before licking your face softly.

"Morning Little one i hope you slept well because you have a big day ahead of you" she tells you.

You nod your head in reply and she rolls on to her side exposing her stomach to you.

"Ok its breakfast time go ahead and drink you need your strength" she tells you.

You realize what she means and you pause before considering what to do next.
111122121211.title: Time for breakfast

choices: go and see the rest of the pack
1111221212111.content: You decide that it wold be fine since she offered her milk to you the wolves haven't done anything bad to you yet and your really to thirsty and hungry at the same time to complain. Besides, you might hurt her feelings. So you latch onto a nipple and start to drink. You already start to feel some strength come back to you, but then something happened that you did not expect. Your entire body started to change rapidly into a wolf pup and the she-wolf replies to you as you latch off, "Don't worry little one, milk just speeds up the process of the change. Your only one of few who have willingly breastfed from me. I'm sorry I didn't tell you last night before you fell asleep. You don't have to drink any more if you don't want to, because the transformation is complete." you do latch on for a little longer until you are full. "Come along Nanokami," she says, "We should go and see the rest of the pack. I'm sure the alpha pair is eager to see the newest 'full' member of the pack, and your definitely strong enough to show my brother who is boss even though your only a pup. And the rest of the pack is just as eager to see you, especially the other pups. Their always wanting a new play mate." you except the name she has given you since you cant remember your human name and follow her.
1111221212111.title: You go ahead and drink

11112212121111.content:
As you followed the wolf, you didn't really know what to expect. Honestly, you were quite afraid. The wolves towered over you when you were a human, but now you were even smaller than you were then. What happened if some of the wolves didn't like you; they could easily kill you without much effort or remorse. "Don't be scared Nanokami," the wolf in front of you says.

"I'm not scared," you yelp in your defense.

"Oh, come on Nanokami, don't lie. Mom knows best." You look at her face and saw a flash of pain on her face and she quickly looked in front of her.

"What did you say," you ask shocked.

"The Alphas said that as long as I looked after you until your transformation was complete that you could be my pup. I'm going to be your new mother, if that's okay with you." You think about it for a moment and in your head you seem to only be able to think of her as your mother. You wonder if it was a side effect of your transformation or if it was because of your fleeting memories.

"Okay," you say. Then as an afterthought you said, "Mommy." By the time you said that you had reached the end of the tunnel and were now in the main cavern. As soon as you had set foot, or paw now, in, all of the wolves instantly stopped what they were doing and looked up at you. You instantly felt excessively nervous and froze. Your mother walked behind you and gave your rear a light nudge.

"Come on Nanokami, don't feel shy," your mother says. "You'll meet them soon enough, but right now we need to go see the Alphas." You nodded and walked up beside her as she continued to the raised platform near the far end of the cave. When you got to a small set of stone stairs your mother ran ahead up the steps. You were about to follow her when you looked at the steps and saw they were nearly your height a piece. Your mother was almost halfway up when she noticed you weren't following her and she began to walk back down to you. She simply let out a barely audible sigh and began licking the back of your neck and picked you up in her mouth like the Alpha female did for you when you were human and began to ascend the stairs.
11112212121111.title: Meet the Pack

choices: stay with mom,  your still nervous
111122121211111.content: You feel really embaressed that you couldn't make it up the stairs and had to be carried up them, but you did try. In this position, you couldn't move to fight back, for this was a weakness every pup had, though, you weren't realy complaining. Soon your mother reached the Alpha pair and sets you down. The Alpha pair look down at you with pleased face due to the fact that you were one of them now. You give a small smile but it instantly fades. You look back at your mother and say, "Sorry I couldn't make it up the stairs mom." "It's okay son, I didn't realize how small you were until I saw you were at the stairs," she says, "But it was valiant effort to try to climb them dear." This made you feel better as she nuzzles you to comfort you. You then look at the alpha pair to hear what they have to say. The Alpha male steps forward and you kneel in a submissive position to show respect. He smiles and says, "I'm sure that Northwind has told what happened." You nod. "Well we need to tell you the rules around here so you know how to behave," he continues in stern but gentle voice. "First thing is that you must obey an order that is given to you when it's given. Second, if you feel up to it and when your old enough, you may challenge the wolf that is one rank above you, in your case, Talkain, our Omega. If you try and go higher, will gang up on you. And third, do not wander out alone, and, since your very young, never wander without a grownup. Do understand Nanokami?" You nod your head, and the alpha male nods back in aproval. "Now if you'll excuse me I must help with the hunt tonight," he says. You kneal once more as he takes his leave, and he nods back. After that you look at the alpha female, who looks back at you and says, "I'm sure that the other pups would like to meet and play with you little one." You look at your mother and she gives you a nudge in the side. It was still daytime and the sun won't set for a while. You...
111122121211111.title: Continue

All the pups are outside playing and before you leave you see some of the grownups look at you smiling. The beta pair comes up to and the female says, "Hello little one, I see you transformed nicely. Oh, allow us to introduce ourselves. I'm Sayaka and this is my mate Hakuo. We are the beta pair. Northwind is a good friend of ours and she'll be a very good mother to you. don't worry about your rank for now dear. That won't matter until your older." "Hey, Nanokami," you hear one of her pups yell, surprised that he called your name. "Well it seems our son wants to play with you. We won't keep him waiting. Go on and play dear," she says, and with that you go to play with him. "Hi, names Blaze. So, your Nanokami, the new member. Wow, my parents weren't kidding about you transforming. Looking good," he says. "Thanks, You look awesome yourself. Does word spread that fast around here. I thought that everyone would treat me like an outcast," you say. He replies, "Nah, your not the first human to pass through here. I think my dad may have been one of them. Come on lets go gather the others for a game of tag." "Good morning my sleepy little one," a voice says. You turn your head to see the voice belonged to the alpha female, and she looked bigger then when you saw her last night (like three times your size). This makes you look at yourself and you see that you are no longer human, but a wolf pup (5 or 6 days old by the looks of it). You finally look at the alpha female speechless at what happened to you. She then says, "Relax little one, I know that your confused, but this is a blessing dear." "Wh-what happened to me, n-not to sound ungrateful," you say nervously. She replies, "No, I know you have many questions and they will be answered. You have been brought to this pack for a reason. When I found you out there in the forest, badly injured and nearly unable to move, I felt you needed my help, call it maternal instinct if you want. I decided to bring you back to the pack and take care of you, I knew full well that you would become one of us. Once I brought you back to the den, I talk to my mate Strongmoon about taking you in and he agreed. The pack soon came in with the kill and once I had my fill, I was going to bring you some meat, but you were gone. I knew you would come back eventually and if not we would have sent a search party to find you. Once you came back to the den unharmed everyone was happy to see you, but my mate had let everyone know he is still in command, that's why he scratched your face yesterday." You rub your cheek with your paw and say, "Yeah, that one I deserved, not sure how I got the rest of my injuries from yesterday though. In fact I can't remember anything before you finding me, not even my own name." She replies, "Well I don't Know how you were injured either, but Your memories of your human life before being found by us have faded. We have decide to call you Nanokami. Oh, and my name is Winterwind, but you can call me mom and Strongmoon dad. I'm sure your hungry little one, so come have some of my milk. Your going to need this kind of nourishment for the next month or so." You soon latch on to one of her nipples, because she was right, you were hungry and are not old enough to have meat. You begin to suckle fast and your mom says you slow down, "Slowly dear, sloowly. that's it dear, if you drink too fast you'll get a stomach ache." You had slowed down your drinking by this time and were enjoying your meal, the milk had tasted sweeter then anything you had ever imagined, and you wanted to keep drink, but knew eventually you'd have to stop. You mother licks you as you suckle and then says, "Drink as much as you need dear. Looks like I'll have eat a little more of the kills we get since I'm providing for two now." You give a slight chuckle as you nurse, but feel a little embarrassed that you have to depend on her and the pack for food and protection, but hey, better to have their love and protection then to be torn to shreds by them. They were your new family and pack, and they will do whatever they can to guarantee your safety while you grow.

1111221222221.content:
You notice a large green snake slither its way out towards you. You notice its saphire blue eyes, its large scaley body, and its head that was almost as large as you. The length of the snake is at least 12 feet long. It slowly approaches you, causing you to remain to frozen from fear. The snake's tonger moves throughout its mouth as it stares at you.

"Dear child, why are you out here all alone?" the snake asks.
"Y-You...can talk...?" you stutter.
"Of courssssse I can." the snake replied.

The snake moves closer to you.

"Why are you out here all alone?" it asks again.

You don't answer, too spooked by its body moving closer.

"Oh...I'm sssssorry." the snake apologizes, staying perfectly still.

The snake realizes that it was scaring you, and it stays put until you can finally relax enough to speak.

"The wolves..." you say.
"Wolvesssss?" the snake interrupts, "I sssssee, you were their dinner."
"No, I wasn't! They..." you protest.
"Then, they brought you in to help you?" the snake interrupts again.

You nod your head, and your stomach lets a growl.

"I sssssee, you ran becaussssse you weren't getting fed." the snake says, seemingly reading your mind.

Once again, you nod.

"Poor boy," the snake says in a soft tone, "You're going to end up like the lassssst boy."
"W-What do you mean?" you ask, your interest picked up.

The snake gives a sinister grin, knowing you had fallen into its trap.

"The wolvesssss once helped a lad like you," the snake explains, "But he ran after they failed to feed him too. The wolvesssss did not forgive hisssss actionsssss, and decided to let him ssssstarve. When the boy didn't die after two weeksssss, they decided to feassssst upon hisssss flesssssh. Such a healthy boy would be sssssure to add plenty of nourissssshment to their bodiesssss."

You aren't quite sure about the snake's story, but can't help but believe it. The snake looks in the distance.

"I feel it in the ground," it announces, "They are coming for you early."

The snake doesn't seem to be lying based on its expression, but snakes are masters at telling lies. Still, your fear of becoming a wolf's meal blinds you from the truth.

"What should I do? They're going to kill me!" you exclaim.

The snake gives another sinister grin.

"If you want," the snake replies, "I know a place where you'll be sssssafe from any wolf. It'sssss the sssssafessssst place around. Would you like my help?"
1111221222221.title: Snake's Offer

11112212222211.content:
"You really know of a place where I'll be safe?" you ask in a hesitant manner.

"Yesssss, dear child," the snake answers.

You're still not sure about this. The snake could be lying to you. Maybe the wolves really aren't coming. And if they were, who's to say it was to harm him? Or, maybe the story of the boy was a lie all together.

"I guesssss I'll be going then," the snake says, his tone suggesting that he was feeling sorry for you. "I tried to help you. I guesssss you don't want it though."

Could the snake really be lying? He seems trusthworthy enough.

"Wait!" you call out. "Please, help me!"

The snake turns to face and gives a wide grin.

"You have chosssssen wisssssely dear child," the snake says with a smile.

The snake opens its mouth to reveal two sharp fangs on the roof of its mouth. It lungs at you and nips your arms, causing two holes to appear on it and begin bleeding.

"Hey!" you shout.

"Relax," the snake says in a calming voice. "It may sssssting a little, but it'll help calm you down. Jussssst relax, dear child, and let it take hold of you."

"Is this...poison?" you ask, noticing your ability to speak is getting harder.

The snake doesn't answer, it only hisses in delight.
11112212222211.title: Accepting the Offer

"So...what are you...going to do...with me?" you ask.

"I told you I'd keep you sssssafe," the snake answers.

"How will...you do...that?" you question.

"I'm sssssimply going to change you isssss all," the snake answers slyly.

"Change...me?" you wonder.

"You'll be sssssafe under the dirt," the snake says.

You open your mouth to reject, but your voice won't come out anymore. You can only gasp in fear.

"Now, dear child, let'sssss begin. Sssssoon you will benefit me and all of nature, forever sssssafe from the wolvesssss!" the snake whispers.

Once your chest was in, the only thing sticking out of her cunt was your feet, and with one final contraction of her vaginal muscles, they to disappear from the 'outside world'. The rest of your body soon slides into her womb and the cervix closes up, now making your escape impossible. Soon an umbilical cord attaches itself to your navel and your heart is now in sync with your new mother's and your body immediately transforms into an unborn wolf pup, eyes shut tight, making you blind, and you recollect nothing of your human existance. She then says, "Rest well my pup, we will see you in a few months as one of us." All you can do is give her a kick and she smiles as you rest within her. She soon lays on her side and begins pushing, the pack helps her any way they can. You are the first to be pushed through the birth canal, and with a few strong pushes, you come out onto the soft ground. "The first pup is out honey, it's a boy," your new father says. She keeps pushing and what takes a few minutes, your brother lands next to you. "The other pup is out, we have two healthy male pups honey," your father says. "My beautiful baby boys. Oh, their so cute," your mother says as the two of you yip looking for warmth, nourishment and protection as you can't see for the time being. Your mother then wraps her paws around the two of you and licks you clean and bites off your umbilical chords. After she finishes cleaning you, she guides the two of you to her teats filled with milk and you both suckle until you fall asleep. She then says, "We best let them rest, they've had a big day. Honey, you should send the hunting party out so the pack can eat dear." "Of course dear," he says, and soon sends off the hunting party as he lays next to your mother and looks at the two of you. "What do you think we should call them Winterwind," your dad says. She replies, "I think the first born should be named Nanokami and the second born Talcain." "Both are great names dear. Now you should be getting some rest yourself," your dad says. And with that your mother rests as well.

The entire pack hears this and they come to watch. "Come on little ones, you can do it," your mother continues. Your eyes finally open and you gaze upon your mother for the first time. Your eyes were sky blue like your mother's, as were your brothers, but your fur was dark gray like your father's. You then look at each other and playfully bat each other's noses. Your mother then licks the two of you, letting you know it will be okay. "I think Nanokami and Talcain are a little intimidated by the presence of their entire pack. We should probably let them have some time to adjust to their surroundings. We need some volunteers for the hunt and some to go on patrol. And be prepared, the beta pair will be having their pups soon," Your mom says, and with that the pack soon heads off to do what is needed of them.

With that final thought you give a faint smile as your heart stops completely. A few seconds later everything in your body has stopped working, you are dead. the wolves all join together in a howl at your passing. Now the main question is this, what should they do with your body?

1111221222221122122111212.content:
The weeks pass until you're old enough to leave the safety of the cave. During the time you became a wolf, you lost all of your memories and don't remember ever being a human. Since you are now a wolf, a rather large pup to be exact, you can speak their language. It's the only language you know.

Your brothers' names are Hayate and Kai, and your sister is named Aria. Everyone calls you Nanokami, and you've now learned the names of everyone in the pack. Your mother, the Alpha Female, is named Genarius. Your father, the Alpha Male, is named Nero. Of course, all of the other wolves refer to him as Lord Nero, since he is the one in charge. The Beta Male is Hakuo, and the Beta Female is Sayaka. The Omega is called Talkain. There are many more wolves besides them, but they're the only ones whose names are referred to on a common basis.

"Hey, Nanokami," Hayate calls, "Come play with us!"

You notice that your siblings are busy playing with each other.
1111221222221122122111212.title: Always a Wolf

choices: Tackle Nero and play with him.
11112212222211221221112122.content:
"Maybe later," you tell them.

"Okay, but you don't know what you're missing!" Hayate shouts back.

As your brothers and sister continue playing, you lay down on the grass with your tail wrapped you. For some reason, you feel too different from all of the others.

"What's wrong, Nanokami?" a bold male voice asks.

You lift your head and notice Nero beside you. He sits down.

"Oh, hi papa," you sigh. "I just don't feel like I belong here. I don't know why, I just feel different."

Nero looks down at you with an unsure look. He doesn't want to tell you that you were once a human.

"We all feel that way every now and then," he finally says, "But we are who we are. You're my son, and I love you. You're a member of this pack, we're your family. Even if you decide to leave us one day, we'll always love you. Just remember, one day either you or one of your brothers will inherit leadership of this pack. Even if you aren't selected, you'll always have the qualities of a great one."

"Thanks, papa!" you reply, now feeling a bit better.

Nero places his paw on your head and rubs it.

"Now go play!" he says to you, pushing you forwards and causing you to roll on your back.
11112212222211221221112122.title: A Talk With Father

choices: Go visit some of the other wolves.
111122122222112212211121222.content:
You roll back onto your stomach and gaze up at your father, who appears to be laughing. You give a playful growl and lunge at him, tackling him to the ground. The two of you begin rolling in the directions of the others.

"Whoa, bro tackled dad!" Kai gasps.

"Let's go help!" Aria suggests.

Hayate and Kai nod in agreement, and soon your sibling join you in the battle against your dad. He's hardly even trying to put up a fight, allowing you all to get the edge on him. Still, he's strong enough to push you away even without trying, showing clearly why he's the leader.

Many of the other wolves watch and laugh. Some of them would love to join in, but they know better than to interrupt their leader's alone time with his children.

Finally, Nero pushes everyone off of him.

"Okay, you win," he announces. "Now, if you'll excuse me, I promised the others I'd help in catching today's dinner."

"Can we come, papa?" Hayate asks.

"No, you're all still too young," Nero answers. "Don't worry, soon you'll all be big enough."

Nero takes his leave.

Still crying, you scampered off and ran up the stair/ramp that lead up to the Alpha den in the side of the cave. You buried your face in your fur bed and cried. Hours later, after everyone had eaten dinner, and you were starving, Kai walked up to you. "Hey man...how ya doin'?" he asked insecurely. You didn't answer him. "Ok, I know your mad at me, but dad made me, look." he said. He brought him nose under your head and forced it up, when you looked at him, he was showing you the back of his neck. You both assumed a wrestling position, but before you could start, Hayate and Aria came up. "Mama says were have to go to bed." she said sadly. "I'm just thinking about what happened tioday and last night," you say, "Like the what ifs. What if I hadn't howled last night? What if our pack had lost the fight? What if dad had died in the fight?" "I know," she said, "I think about those too, but then I tell myself that they didn't happen, so their nothing to worry about. What we should think about is taking care of each other so that the whole pack benefits, even Talkain." this makes you feel better and soon cuddle up next to your mother and she licks you one more time and puts her legs around you to help you fall asleep.

You reply under your breath, "I had a (gasp) bad dream." "Well it's over now, but why don't you tell me about it," she says before starting to clean you for your morning bath. "Well after I went to sleep, the first thing I see is a huge snake. I wanted to get away but my body couldn't move," you say as your mom stops licking you finishing your bath and is now listening more intently to the story. You continue, "It was like I was parilized or something and It said was going to protect from my own kind, and I tell him I am a wolf, but then he tells me I'm human and I look at myself and sure enough I was one. The last thing I see is him swallowing me whole and then I woke up." Your mother then...
111122122222112212211121222111212122121.title: Tell your parents

1111221222221122122111212221112121221211.content: "Well Nanokami there is something you should know," she says. You listen in curiosity as she continues with, "Before you and your siblings were born, there was a human we found not to far from here. He was severly injured and needed help. I brought him back to our den and was hoping your father would be kind to let him stay, which he agreed to. The human seemed to know somewhat how to act like a wolf and did a submissive posture which everyone found cute." your wondering how this relates to your dream and you. "When it came to dinner time I went over to give him a peace and hoped he would eat it but when I got there he was gone. We split up into search parties to find him but when we got there he was being swallowed by a snake. We killed the snake but by the time had gotten to him the human had already been posined and he died. We all morned his death and howled for him. Now you we don't let dead carcuses go to waste, so due to the fact I was carrying you and your sibblings your father offered him to me and I swallowed him whole. The reason I'm telling you this is because his soul must have gone into your body and so that is why you had that dream. But that doesn't make you different from anyone else. You are our son and we love you very much," she finishes as she pulls you towards her and nuzzles you lovingly. You have to admit, it was alot to take in, but they are your family and you love them as much as they love you and you know they'll do anything to protect you, so you nuzzle her back. "Thanks for telling me mom, that helps put mind at ease," you say. "your welcome son," she replies. "Now how about we get everyone else up so we can enjoy the rest of our day," she says. "Okay," you reply.
1111221222221122122111212221112121221211.title: tells you the truth

So he retreated back into the forest and did not return. The pack was both surprised and relieved. "Great job on trusting your instincts pups, you were quick to notice the cougar's presence. The 4 of you will become a great help to the pack when your older," your mother tells you. Just then father showed up with breakfast, and all of you went to greet him and tell him about what happened earlier. The pack chuckled as they listened to your excitment about what happened.

You quickly stretch yourself out and look around. Your brothers and sister are playing with each other again. You, on the other hand, still aren't in the mood to play anymore and decide to go see some of the other wolves.

As you walk along, you meet up with...

11112212222211221221112122222.title: The wolf is...

111122122222112212211121222222.content:
It's Talkain, he's just laying down and doing nothing in particular. He usually tends to keep his distance from the other pack members, being the outcast and all. He looks very bored, and his fur is much less shiny than everyone else's,

You slowly approach him, wagging your tail as you approach.

"Hi, Talkain!" you greet in a pleasant voice.

"Oh..." he replies, "Hey, Nanokami."
111122122222112212211121222222.title: Chat With Talkain

choices: Go visit some of the other wolves.
1111221222221122122111212222221.content:
"Are you okay?" you ask, noticing that Talkain isn't very happy.

"Yeah, I'm fine," he answers. "Don't worry about it."

Talkain used to despise you, mainly because you were a human who received better care and attention than he did. You even ran away, nearly getting eating and being injected with a poison that resulted in your overall death. Still, now that you were a wolf, it was as if your sin of being a human in a wolf's world was wiped clean. Though he would never admit it to you, he actually liked you now.

He lifts his head up and notices your happy face, unable to help but smile back. You weren't really a playful mood, but you wanted to cheer him up.

"You wanna wrestle?" you ask.

"Nah, I'm fine," he replies, "You can go and play though. Don't let me ruin your day."

Since you weren't really too eager to play to begin with you simply get closer and sit yourself down beside him. As you do so, Talkain remembers something your father told the rest of the pack members shortly after you were born.

"Listen," he had said, "Nanokami is the human who somehow found his way here and ended up dying. I don't want any of you to give him the slightest hint that he was ever human. He's my son, and should find out by any means other than me or Genarius telling him, or he somehow remembers, I'll personally see to it that you receive a fate far worse than death."

He was dead serious too, and everyone knew he could back it up. Other wolf packs might look down upon him if they were to find out, but he was the strongest of all of the wolves and nobody would dare question him.

He suspected Talkain most of all to tell, and on several occasions he wanted to, but Talkain never did. In fact, he noticed how nice he was to you, a kindness that he wasn't actually faking. Talkain was looked upon better for that, and he realized that he might one day escape his cursed rank.

He places a paw on your head and rubs it.

"Go on, little scamp," he tells you, "Go have fun!"
1111221222221122122111212222221.title: Talkain's True Feelings

choices: The others return, it's time to eat.
11112212222211221221112122222212.content:
After talking with Talkain, you finally feel like playing with your siblings. Most of the others wolves are out hunting anyway, just a few have remained behind to keep on eye on you and your siblings.

You find your brothers and sisters still playing, and without warning, you jump in and join them. You're actually much stronger than them, so they stop focussing on each other, and start focussing on you. They tackle you together, and you manage to push off Kai. Hayate and Aria are still holding you down. You're so strong that it takes at least two of them to keep you down.

Kai runs over and starts pulling at your tail, causing you to give small yelps of pain. You quickly kick off Hayate and manage to shake Aria loose. In a vengeful attitude, you charge at Kai and tackle him, pinning him down until he admits you win. Hayate and Aria tackle you together and push you off. You all continuously laugh as you play together.
11112212222211221221112122222212.title: Time to Play at Last

111122122222112212211121222222121.content: "Papas back" yelled Kia. He walks over to you, and your siblings carrying a small deer and drops in in front of you "Here we go kids all for you" He says. The four of you start eating as the sun sets over the mountain veiw. When you finish you decide to goto bed. As you fall asleep you look forward to you 13th birthday when you will be taken out by your papa for your first hunt.

111122122222112212212.title: Who should get it?

1111221222221122122121.content:
The alpha pair decides to let the whole pack enjoy the feast!

They give a signal and wolves rush in! Your clothes are sent flying into the air as the wolves eagerly want to bite into your soft flesh.

Your body shakes as the wolves begin to tear large chunks of juicy flesh from your torso. Blood spurts out of the gaping wounds and covers the ground around you. Several wolves attack your leg, ripping it to shreds and pulling it out of its socket in the processes. Another wolf digs into you belly pulling out the intestines. A fight starts as the wolves begin to fight over the innards, your body starts to get pulled from either side, your intestines used like a rope in tug'o war. Your throat is ripped out and your head severed from the rest of the body. Your eyes gouged, skull smashed, gooey brains slurped up. Ribs fly everywhere as your ribcage is broken. Your lungs are ripped out of your chest cavity. Your heart explodes into a bloody mess as the wolves devour it. They feast on the rest of your organs and any scrap of flesh that can be found.

It isn't long before only blood and shattered bones remain...
1111221222221122122121.title: Rush for the flesh!

Give it to the Omega, nobody else wants it.

The pups are able to eat you on their own

The pups of the pack are famished and haven't had a good meal in a while. Knowing this the alpha pear decides that your dead carcass would provide some much needed nutrition for the pups.

Your clothes are removed from your body by the older wolves and the pups are brought in. The small wolves are filled with excitement and wonder with your dead corpse. They eagerly sniff you body looking for a place to bite down.
