11112212222211222.content:
You relief soon turns to fear, the wolf is gazing at you with hungry eyes...

You are still unable to move and your life is completely in the paws of the wolf. The wolf shreds your clothes off, it almost looks like its drooling in anticipation. You're now completely nude, the wolf examining your body trying to decide were to start...
11112212222211222.title: No saved!

choices: Other wolves come and find the rouge wolf.
You're digested and become wolf scat.
111122122222112222.content:
The wolf licks his lips greedily as he circles around you, considering carefully on where to start as you lie helpless on the ground, barely able to twitch a finger with the snake's paralyzing venom coursing through your veins. Eventually, the wolf comes to a stop at your feet and tauntingly licks over them, his warm, slick tongue coating them in saliva sending a tingle up your spine.

The taunting doesn't last long as the wolf succumbs to his hunger and takes your feet into his mouth, shoving them into his tight gullet with great zealour and greed, a pleased growl coming from his throat. You try to get your body to move so that you can pull away, but the messages dont get to your body and you are left helpless as the wolf is quick in taking you in up to your knees. As your thighs are taken in and your lower body is engulfed in the damp warmth of the tight gullet, you try to yell out for any help, but all that comes out is a muffled humming to which the wolf responds by gnawing on your belly softly to remind you whose in control and he seems to grin widely as you glance over.

With strong slurping and gulping, the wolf takes in your chest with your arms trapped in his bulging cheeks and drools heavily with his mouth wide open as he sits down and tilts his head upwards for you to just start sliding in ever so slowly. You see the ridges at the top of the wolves mouth sliding over your face as your head drifts down through the sharp sets of teeth, before the wolf closes his mouth and the only details you can see now are that of the inside of the wolves mouth, from his tongue sliding over your cheek to his pearly white teeth set in perfect rows around you. After a few moments, the wolf swallows and sends you down his tight throat, his neck bulging on the outside gradually getting smaller until it disappears behind his ribcage. Finally you settle in his large stomach, curled up loosely inside the warm pocket of flesh, visible on the outside as a large, obvious, furry bulge hanging from the wolf's belly.
111122122222112222.title: A nice, wholesome wolf meal!

1111221222221122221.content: What does the rouge wolf decide to do?
1111221222221122221.title: Other wolves come and find the rouge wolf.

1111221222221122222.content:
The wolf trots deeper into the forest, to hide from the other wolves, making his belly shake as he digests you. He soon gets to a lil spring, as he approaches, he notices a perfect hiding place. There are bushes and plants covering a small entrace between a giant ancient tree’s root and the forest floor. The floor inside the lil cave is dry and warm. He squishes himself into it, which was a bit hard because of his stomach’s size, and he curls up, to finish his prey.

The wolf’s hungry stomach rumbled around you as the acid started to pour into the stomach. Inside the stomach, you can feel the strong smell of the acids, and the stomach starts squeezing you, to make the digestion run easier. The greenish acids start burning your skin, and filling the stomach, soon you will find yourself taking a digestion bath.

As it is happening, you struggle and fight for survival, even if you know you dont really have any chance. You are just a delicious treat to the wolf. You kick the walls as strong as you can, but its useless. You are too tight in there to make a strong kick.

Soon the lack of oxygen, the pain, and as the acids filling the tight stomach overpowers you, making you sink into the acids completely, which are working on your body, breaking down the flesh, breaking you apart.

Most of your body is being turned into the wolf’s energy, and fat, the small remanining of amount, being pushed through the intestines, sucking out everything useable for the predator as it can.

The wolf wakes up, feeling pressure inside his bowels, namely: you. He walks out from the hideout under a tree nearby, where he squats down, and pushes out some hot brown logs, one after another. When he finishes building the little pyramid, he looked back a little, and kicked some earth on it, then trotted away happily, safe in the knowlegde that the rest of the pack would never discover his crime...
1111221222221122222.title: You're digested and become wolf scat.

11112212222212.content:
You almost jump at the idea....until reality hits you hard. It's a freakin' snake and what's more IT'S TALKING!

You stand up shakily. Since it is a snake it would be in your best interest to be polite so as to not anger it...after all. You're awfully bite-sized.

"Thanks for the offer but I'm going to head back." You say politely

The snake is clearly stunned that you're going to head back after what he said "happened to the last one".
"Oh? Fine. Off you go then ssssssmall human." it says coldly.

Something tells you that turning around would be a very BAD idea. So you pace backwards slowly.

Suddenly you hear some leaves crackling from all around you. You dart your eyes left and right. Oh crap! the snake was distracting you by talking as it moved it's body around the area to trap you!

"It ssssseemsss you will be accepting my help regardlesssss!" the snake states smugly.

You hear the wolves getting closer. You begin to panic.

"My offer issss ssstill open you know..." it says not as politely as the first time.

"I know where this so-called "safe place" is. You want to eat me and that's all. No WAY! Besides. If the wolves eat me it'd be better to have either a lethal blow to the throat by a wolf and be dead or be swallowed whole by a wolf than by a snake!" you snap back at the serpent "In a snakes disgusting gut the acid would be excruciating because it acts immediately. Whereas with wolves. Since prey isn't usually swallowed alive its acids aren't as strong. I'd rather pass out from asphyxiation and die like that than be burning to death!" after saying your little speech...you begin to think you said too much and have completely insulted your captor....but at least letting out your anger made you feel better.

The snake replies simply "Sssso thatsss how it issss then? Fine!"

Suddenly a noise is heard behind you. You turn and cross your arms to block the blow. DAMN! It was a feint. The snakes tail slams you hard on your right side launching you head over heels in the air. You hit the ground hard. With the wind knocked out of you, you struggle to get back up. You look, still on your hands and knees, around at the serpent.

The snake teases your futile efforts "You had your chance!" It starts coming towards you quickly.

It's right beside you. It's rearing back ready to snap you up.

Suddenly...

AWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

The sound of wolves howling. The snake is startled for that split second giving you a chance to try and make a run for it.

"You won't get away!" the snake hisses. It comes straight for you.

Suddenly a gray blur shoots out of the bushes knocking the snake a good 12 feet from you. The blur reaches the other side. You don't know what it is until it begins to emerge out of the bushes once more.

One of the wolves! You didn't think this particular wolf cared about you...it always seemed to look away from you every time you looked at it.

"Ssssso...you came to ssssave the little creature." the snake sneers.

The snakes starts to move. Quicker than the eye the wolf is suddenly right in front of you bent low, facing the snake and growling ferociously.

You look back and see other wolves in the bushes...they appear to only be there to watch. Looks like only this wolf wants to save you from the snake.

The snake...
11112212222212.title: Ummm....no

choices: Get up and ignore the wolf
111122122222122.content: The snake hissed at the sudden wolf coming infront of you. Coiling his body in defense, it looked from side to side seeing he was surrounded before more howl could be heard in the distance. In retreat it slithered off in the forest, disappearing under the shadows from where it came from. You looked on to the wolf that saved you. You looked away feel guilty you had to let the wolf put up with your trouble. Sitting down you rested your head on your knees thinking on what could have happened if he made the deal or the wolf was captured by the snake. "I'm sorry ...." you whispered knowing it was and would have been your fault if something happened. Still the wolf walked to your side and licked your face letting you know it's alright.
111122122222122.title: Mother's comfort

choices: You are back in the den.
Your still lyinging in front of her at the place you passed out.
1111221222221221.content: The wolf who licked you was the alpha female and she was looking at you in a motherly manner. You couldn't hold back anymore and hug her for comfort as you start to cry. Then out of nowhere, you feel pain surging through your body and collapse onto the ground screaming in pain. So much pain is going through your body that you pass out right in front of her. When you wake up....
1111221222221221.title: Hug the wolf for comfort

11112212222212211.content: You are in the den, so you figure the alpha female had brought you back to the den. What is baffling you is that you can't remember anything before your first encounter with the wolf pack, your friends, family, not even your own name. These thoughts were all interupted by the alpha female shifting her body to face you and say, "I see your finally awake Nanokami. You've been out for a couple of days." You were in total shock that she had just spoke to you and ask, "You can talk?" Once again you were shocked because your voice was that of a kid's which leads you to look at your body and make you jump in surprise as you see that your body is now that of a wolf pup. The alpha female didn't even speak for she knew you would ask her another question. You ask, "What happened to me? How did I become a wolf pup?" "Well here's the thing dear, once humans come to this mountain they change into wolves. The process is a painful experience and I'm sorry it had to happen right after you had hugged me for comort, and yes I saw the tears in your eyes. There is no reason to be ashamed for what happened, many humans have reacted the same way when we first found them. The last one sort of freaked out after he saw what happened to him. He ran right out of the den and didn't come back. We found him a few hours later knocked out after running into branch. He tried to run towards the the bottom of the mountain, but the pack has already looked for a way off and it is surrounded by cliffs too steap to climb down, which makes it useless to leave the mountain. Their memories of their past life fade away and they either become one with the pack or journey off on thier own," she says. "And now you have a choice little one," the alpha male says, "You must decide if you will stay or leave. If you stay my mate and have agreed to take you in as our own, but if you leave the pack will not protect you and might even kill you the next time they see you. It's your choice Nanokami."
11112212222212211.title: You are back in the den.

111122122222122111.content: You weighed out your options for a while and thought it would probably be best to stay with the pack since for one looking at the size of your body you were far too young to eat meat let alone wonder off on your own. For another you don't know the territory at all or the dangers that lurk out there, aside from your snake encounter and for another you really don't have anywhere else to go, if there are other packs on the mountain they might not be as merciful as this pack. Finally once you think about it, the alpha pair said they would take you in as their own son and you did remember reading one thing about wolves adopting pups that were not their own, of course how long would you remember this before that memory faded as well. This was a chance to start over and know more about wolves then you did as a human. You finally say, "I've decided I'll stay. I really don't have anywhere else to go and I don't think I'd be able to make it on my own." "A very wise choice son. Now I suggest that you rest easy. Your body may still feel a little weak right now, but you should be fine tomorrow. We were afraid you wouldn't make it, but you pulled through. If your feeling a little light headed it's natural son," your new mom says. You don't feel light headed but take her advice. She's was already sounding like a mother to you. "Alright, so that means aside from sleeping, I will be laying around all day, right?" You ask. She replies "Yes dear, we don't want you passing out again. The hunting party will be here soon with lunch. Once I've had my part of the kill I will have enough milk to let you nurse from me dear." You feel a little embarressed being so small and helpless right now since you can't get up and walk around, but it was for the best. You were now the son of the alpha pair and they are doing their very best to make sure that your are safe from danger and that you don't get yourself hurt. The hunting party soon returns with the food and your mother goes to have her fill. As soon as she is done she lays down on her side to nurse you. You proceed to suckle off one of her nipples and soon feel warm nourishing milk flow down your throat. Your mother smiles at the feeling of you nursing since she knows that she can provide for another and she can keep you safe.
111122122222122111.title: stay

1111221222221221111.content: After you had finished nursing your mother gently picks you up by the back of your neck, which felt routine to you now, but now you notice that you can't move a muscle. You just go with it and figure this is every pups Achilles' heel. Your mother carries you down from your families resting area and outside of the den where you were greeted by a blinding light making you close your eyes for a split sec trying to adjust. Once your able to see again you see many of the pack members in their own little groups talking. The pups were playing around under the watchful eyes of the grown ups. Some of the grown ups gave a quick glance at you and then returned to talking, probably about you. One of the pups comes up to you and your mother and says, "Hi aunt Winterwind, is this Nanokami, my new cousin?" She sets you down as she lays down and says, "Yes, Nanokami, this is your cousin Hayate. He's been looking forward to meeting you." "Hi Hayate," You say. "Hi Nanokami, how are you feeling? I heard what happened 2 days ago," he replies. You seem too have forgotten what really happened and only your mom and dad remember what happened, but you and the rest of the pack remember that you had gone exploring with your parents when a snake had attacked you after you ran ahead of them a little ways and tried to kill you. Luckily your parents got there in time to save you but you had so much air squeezed out of you and your muscles get tightened that you had passed out from the encounter. "Yeah, that taught me that I should stay closer to my parents. I feel fine, but I think I'll listen to my mom and take it easy today," you say as your mother smiles. Hayate replies, "Well all the other pups were worried about you, myself included, but I had a feeling you would pull through. Do you want me to bring the others over to meet you?" There were 6 other pups aside from you and Hayate, all seemed to be your age. "I don't want to stop you guys from playing all day," you tell him. "I already talked to them about it and they think that they could take a break for a day. It's not the end of the world and aunt Winterwind said she had a story about uncle Strongmoon she was gonna tell us," Hayate says. He goes to gather the other pups and lets them introduce themselves. You then all listen to your mother's story about your dad and the story takes till nightfall.
1111221222221221111.title: later that day.

11112212222212211111.content: Later that night after hearing about your father you are carried up to the resting place and set gently down. You didn't notice that man of the pack members were smiling at you as your mother was carrying you. You were thinking about what happened 2 days ago. After your mother has her share of the kill she comes back to let you nurse. As you nurse your mother notices that you seem a little down. "What's the matter son? What seems to be troubling you?" she asks you. You finish nursing and say "I'm just thinking about what happened 2 day's ago. I feel like such a weakling not being able to defend myself from that snake." "Your still very young Nanokami, it would have been incredible if you had been able to defeat that snake. Also it only took 2 days for you to be able to wake up from the attack. Most pups your age would have been unconscious for nearly a week, believe me I've seen it. You are not weak at all son, and the entire pack was happy to see you awake today. I don't think you saw but the entire pack was smiling at you when I was carrying you up here, knowing you would be okay. Most of them told me they were impressed at how fast you recovered. When you get older, I'm sure you'll be as strong as your father. Now I think it's time we get some sleep dear," your mom says. You start to yawn getting very drowsy and your father has just walked up after talking with your aunt and uncle. He smiles as he sees you cuddle up with your mother. You all say your good nights and soon your eyes become heavy, finally falling asleep by your mother's side, taking in her body heat.
11112212222212211111.title: later that night.

choices: Another wolf pup comes up to you.
A wolf on territory patrol returns.
1111221222221221112.content: You spent all the rest of the day with your mother and the day soon passed. Your mother and father had told you their names, which were Strongmoon (your father) and Winterwind (your mother) and said you would soon learn the names of the other pack members. Everyone was impressed with how fast you recovered from the your transformation. You know the pack forgives you for running away but you still feel a sense of guilt putting one of their leaders in harms way. Your mother tells you that it is what the pack does for each other and they considered a part of them as soon as they laid eyes on you and she knows you'd do the same for them if you had the strength and skill to do so. After she gives you a bath you cuddle up beside her and take in her body heat as you sleep soundly through the night. Your parents smile at you before they too fall asleep. The next day you wake up you get up and move a bit which alerts your mother in the process and she sees that your wanting to move around. "Good morning Nanokami. I see your ready to move about. Maybe you should do a little walking so your muscles don't get stiff. Take one step forward. Good, now another one. That's it your getting it son," she says as you start walking around an all fours. You are starting to get used to your wolf body, but you trip over yourself a few times before getting the hang of it which makes you and your mother giggle. The pack has already started to wake up, including your father, who was already gathering volunteers for the morning hunt. You ask your mother, "Can I try going down to the entrance myself mom?" "Of course you can dear, just let me know if you need me to carry you down," she kindly replies. "Thanks mom," you say, and you proceed down the step-like rocks. You make it almost half way before tripping over yourself while accidentally running and land with an "oof". Your father was watching you and smiled at your effort, even though he knew you would eventually trip. "Take it easy son. You don't want get ahead of yourself. You'll get the hang of it Nanokami, don't worry," your dad says to you as you get to your feet regain your footing. You didn't know the hunting party was watching you and smiling as well at your valiant effort to walk on all fours, knowing all pups at your age are only starting to walk, so it is inevitable you will lose your footing for a little while. The hunting party takes of as you make it down to the entrance and are controlling your footing a little more. You didn't notice your mother had been right behind you in case you would go tumbling down, which you didn't. "Great job on your first try down the platform honey. Your getting the hang of it a lot faster then most of the other pups your age. Don't feel bad about tripping, it happens to all pups your age, your just starting to walk. We thought you wouldn't be able to walk at all since you just became a wolf pup, but I guess you had a little wolf in you all along. You'll be a great help to the pack once your older Nanokami, but for now I think playing with the other pups is all you will do right now. Your still very young, and training won't be for a while," she says to you to help boost your confidence. As you and the rest of the pack head out of the den.....
1111221222221221112.title: the next day.

choices: play time with new siblings, then bed.
late dinner for you and your new siblings.
11112212222212212.content: The pain was gone once you woke up, but you felt sort of strange. When your vision came into focus again the alpha female and many of the other pack members were surrounding you where you had passed out, and now they looked a whole lot bigger. It was weird but they didn't seem threatening to you anymore, even though they were bigger looking now. Instead they had worried expressions on their faces, which surprised you entirely. You started to roll back onto your belly when the alpha female says, "Don't try to move little one." You are in shock at the fact that she spoke, so you turn your head in her direction as you lay on your side and say, "You can talk?" "Yes, all animals can talk little one. The reason you understand me is that your now one of us," she says. You immediately look at your body and yelp in surprise that she was indeed correct, you were a wolf, and at the most, a week old pup. That's why you felt strange and the pack members looked bigger to you. Your age had regressed during your transformation to a week old wolf pup. "How did this happen? How did I become a wolf?" you ask. "We don't know, your the first human that has passed through here in the last five years, maybe it has something to do with the mountain. Maybe heaven has a plan for you. Either way we need to get you back to the den, It's late at night and the forest can pretty dangerous for a pup your age dear." The alpha female then picks you up by the back of your neck and carries you back to the den. Your body has gone numb and you can't move a muscle, making it useless to try and fight back, but hey, you weren't complaining. The pack seems to want to help you, not hurt you, and so you continue to let her carry you. Once you reached the den the alpha female placed you down lightly and went to talk to her mate. You stayed where you were, terrified that if you moved from where you were they would punish you or worse, kill you. As soon as the alpha pair finishes talking they walk up to you and the alpha female says, "Do remember where you were before the mountain little one? We're curious." You try to think of where you were and draw to a blank. You can't remember anything before the alpha female finding you, your home, your friends and family, you can't even remember your own name. You shook your head in disappointment of yourself. She replies, "We thought so. You see one of the elders say they had seen the same thing happen to the last human who passed through here. The young wolves you see here were either really young or not even born at that time. They don't know how it happened, but the human had begun life over again at two weeks old, a week older then you. He was raised as one of us and became a beta in his adulthood to the end of his life, so we recon the same thing has happened to you and will happen to other humans in the future. Now we know you may want to leave again, but we can't allow it. Your too young to fend for yourself. My mate Strongmoon and I have talked it over and we have agreed that we will adopt you and you will become our son and brother to our other three pups. That is if you would like to be part of our family." You see her three pups pop out from behind her, they seem to be your age and stare at you with welcoming eyes. You are taken away by this offer and want to accept it but won't this make other pups jealous of you. You look around and see only one other pup who was female sitting in front of the beta female, so your guess is that is her daughter. You then weigh out your options and say, "Thank you for your offer. I will accept it, I really have no where else to go, but what is my name going to be? I know you don't want to keep calling me little one, and I really don't remember my old one." "Well how does Nanokami sound?" asked the alpha male. "Sounds great to me. Has a ring to it." Everyone laughs, including yourself. "I'm sorry for running off and putting you in danger," you say lowering your head. The alpha female walks up and nuzzles you while saying, "It's alright Nanokami, none of us were hurt and I'm sure if it were another human, they would have reacted the same way you had if they had seen a pack of wolves. And I know that you wouldn't purposely harm any of us. It was an honest mistake. I saw the tears in your eyes before you hugged me for comfort. I sort of felt like you were one of my own pups at that moment. That is why I made you that offer, and I'm glad you accepted it. By the way, I'm Winterwind, but you can call me mother and Strongmoon father since you are our son now." You smile at her feeling relieved to have that burden lifted off your chest, nod your head in reply and nuzzle her back as a thanks.
11112212222212212.title: Your still lyinging in front of her at the plac...

111122122222122121.content: You and your siblings (Yuma, your brother, and Arya and Nyla, your sisters) go off and play for a while and are under the watchful eyes of your parents. You were wrestling with your siblings when your hear your mom say, "Time for bed my little ones." "Awww," you all say. You all head back up to your family's resting place and lay down. Your mom then says, "Nanokami, come have some of my milk before you go to bed dear. You haven't had anything to eat or drink all day and your too young to eat meat. Plus, you must be starving after playing with your brother and sisters." You were hesitant for a second, but your mom made a good point, and so, You latch on on to one of her nipples and begin to suckle. You soon feel the milk enter your mouth and flow into your stomach, already you feel strength come back to you. You feel weird nursing from her, but know you'll get used to it by tomorrow, for this is what you'll be having for the next 3 weeks or more. You finally latch of feeling full and say, "Thank you (burp), oops, excuse me." Your mother chuckles and says, "Your welcome dear, now get some sleep. Your gonna need your rest if your gonna play with your siblings tomorrow." "Yes mom," you reply. You soon lay next to your siblings and your mother gives you a gentle lick before saying, "Good night son." "Good night mom," you say as you shut your eyes and let your subconscious mind take over.
111122122222122121.title: play time with new siblings, then bed.

choices: You have a rough sleep and a nightmare.
111122122222122122.content: Even though it was past dinner time for the pack, you, Talcian (your brother), Aria and Nyla sisters were too young to eat meat anyways. So your mother laid on her side and let the four of you nurse. Each of you latch on to one of her nipples and start to suckle. You were the last to keep nursing since you hadn't had anything to eat all day, your siblings understood this and even said that you looked starving and hope you have more then they do. Your mother smiled as you finished nursing and soon was giving everybody a bath. When your turn came you say, "Mom, when I was human you said that you felt I was like I was one of your own pups when I hugged you for comfort. Why?" "Well, being a mother already, it was maternal instinct that told me to protect you. I wouldn't have done if I hadn't felt something for you. You were helpless in that situation, just like a pup would be, and it would have been a crime not to save you. And now look, You can start over life with your new family. We will love you and protect you with all our hearts Nanokami," she replies. "I thought you would have made me the lowest rank for what I did, it wasn't right for me to leave. You brought me into your den and I repay you by running away. I sort of feel I don't deserve to be your son," you say. "You have every right to deserve to be our son. If you ask me, you seemed to be thinking like an orphan pup whom the pack just found, and in a manner of speaking you were. You were overcome by fear and let it get the best of you. It happens to everyone once in a while. You also realized that you had misjudged us and had the courage to feel scared for us even though it wasn't your fault, it was something that happened by chance and anything could have happened. The pack wouldn't have pursued you if they didn't care about you. I'm afraid we will have to punish you for running off. You won't be able to go beyond the safety outside the den for a week. We are surrounded by trees in every direction, so if you go beyond the first set of trees the punishment extends and becomes more strict, like not even leaving the den at all." You agree to her terms and are relieved she wouldn't do something physical to you. You also don't want to go anywhere far from the den after what had happened today. It was soon was bedtime and you and your siblings cuddle up to your mother, taking in her body heat and your father lies next to her giving her some body heat in return.
111122122222122122.title: late dinner for you and your new siblings.

1111221222221221221.content: While you slept your body was trying to find a comfortable position to lay in. You had started to dream about the attack and it was starting to get scary then as soon as you see the snake lunging at your mother you wake up with a scream in surprise. This grabs your mother's attention and she sees you breathing heavily and sweating. She asks, "What happened Nanokami? Your trembling." "I had a nightmare. (gasp) It was about (gasp) the attack. You had (gasp) just saved me, (gasp) and then the snake (gasp) attacked you," you say through your heavy breathing. "Calm down, shhhh. I'm right here and I am unharmed. Remember, the snake cowardly slithered away after we arrived. Don't let the fear win dear, keep your heart and mind open to the truth. The dream will pass in time. It's okay to be scared, just find the courage to overcome it and do what is right anyways. Now try to get some sleep," She says trying to calm you down and reassuring you that everything would be alright. You lay your head back down, trying to slow your breathing and your mother licks and nuzzles you to help you calm down. Soon your breathing normal again and you let your subconscious mind take over. Your mother then lays her head back down after she knows your asleep and wraps her legs around you to make you feel secure.
1111221222221221221.title: You have a rough sleep and a nightmare.

11112212222212212211.content: As the sun rose the next morning the entire pack started to get up and move around, some already preparing to go on the morning hunt. You however were still asleep due to the fact that you had not gotten as much sleep as the rest of the pack. Your siblings had already gotten up and started playing, but now they wanted to play a game where they wanted to include you so your brother Talcain comes to ask your mother to wake you up. She agrees to do so since you have been asleep longer then they have. "Wake up little one," she says, and with that you start to get up slowly. "It's morning already?" you say with a yawn, "Yes dear, and your brother and sisters want to play with you," your mother replies, and nudges you to go play with them. "Have fun," she says and so you head of to play.
11112212222212212211.title: The next morning

11112212222212212212.content: When morning came your family the pack had woken up, but you had not and your mother had told your siblings that you needed your rest after what you had been through. They understood and went off to play as you slept. When you started coming to your mom says, "Come on Nanokami, wake up little one." You finally are awake and stretch while saying, "How long was I out?" Your mom replies, "Till noon dear, but you needed it. After what happened yesterday and your nightmare, you would have been very tired if we woke you up when the rest of the pack was." You see the logic in her statement and ask, "Where's my brother and sisters? Are they outside?" "Yes son and I'm sure they are waiting to play with you," your mother says. As you're about to go and play you hear a long howl.
11112212222212212212.title: around high noon.

111122122222122122122.content: You stop in your tracks and look back at your mother who says nervously, "Oh my goodness, Nanokami, stay here. I need to get your brother and sisters." She quickly runs to and out the entrance and you stay where you are. She soon brings in your siblings along with the beta pair's pup who runs to their parents. Your mother than comes to get you and takes you to anther part of the den that is deeper from the entrance. She stays with the 4 of you, waiting for the battle to end. You can hear a lot of growling and hope that no one gets killed. Soon the pack had sent the intruders running, though some had sustained heavy injury. Your father had joined the fight as soon as he could and now was heading in with the kill. Your mother went to greet him as you and your siblings followed close behind. As your parents nuzzled each other your father says, "Are the pups alright?" "Yes dear, ours and Sayaka and Hakuo's," your mom replies. "That's good to hear. some of the pack is severely wounded but none of the wounds are fatal. Everyone will recover fast so no need to press concern dear," he says. Your mother is thankful and soon says, "We should probably start eating. I'm sure the fight worked up a lot of appetites." Everyone soon digs in and you and your siblings nurse after your mom has her fill.
111122122222122122122.title: another pack is attacking.

1111221222221221221221.content: After lunch you and your siblings go off to play but decide it's safer to play in the den rather than outside. You play wrestle tag and are able to keep it going for a while until you see Northwind, the beta pair's pup. For some reason you felt she should join you, she looked bored. You walk over and say hello to Hakuo and Sayaka. They acknowledge you with a nod and you ask, "Can Northwind come play with us? Oof." Your brother tackled you and said, "Tag your it." The Beta pair smiled and said "Of course she can." You didn't realize that Northwind had been blushing when you came up to them, but you all scampered off and played.
1111221222221221221221.title: After lunch

The fox lets you leave in peace.
