11112212222221111.content: A smirk appears on the fox's face as it continues sniffing. You have decided to let him have his way, and he isn't about to let you go so easilly. Now, the real question is what to do with a human?
11112212222221111.title: He won't let you go!

choices: A place he can enjoy his meal by himself
111122122222211111.content:
The fox quickly glances over your body, examining you. You start to feel nervous. The fox approaches you, but then you hear a wolf howl in the distance, the fox perks up it's ears at the sound.

The all of a sudden you get a strange feeling that the fox wants you to move. You get up, and the fox begins to herd you deeper into the woods. It seemed the fox was taking you somewhere...
111122122222211111.title: Taken away

choices: You will be killed, then eaten.
1111221222222111111.content:
The fox herds you to an area with large trees. You notice a rather large hole under one of them and the fox nudges you inside. You climb underneath it and are amazed by how spacious it is inside. Once inside, you take notice of a female fox with her tail curled around two baby foxes.

The vixen's head perks up as you her mate enter the den. She gets up and approaches the male fox. The two seemingly begin to talk to each other. The vixen quickly licks her chomps and walks back over to her babies. The two young foxes wake up and stretch themselves out. The vixen seems to mumbles something to them.

The two young foxes take a playful position that resembled that of a dog and tackle you, pinning you to the ground and licking all over your. They aren't hurting you, just playing. You begin laughing from the effect of the tongues licking your face that you fail notice that the two older foxes have completely undressed you. They examine your body carefully as you are distracted. They examine it much like a butcher examines meat.
1111221222222111111.title: Meet the Family of Foxes

choices: The young foxes are allowed to eat first
11112212222221111111.content:
All of a sudden the licking stops... you realize that you are totally nude. The pups get off you. Then without warning a sharp pain bites into your neck. In fact it is a bite! The male fox has sunken its sharp teeth deep into the flesh of your neck. You hear a cracking noise as your neck brakes, then a final flash of pain as your throat is ripped out. Your eyes shutter and close...

You're dead now. The foxes examine your body one more time. The vixen jumps onto your torso. It then runs its sharp claws from your throat all the way down to your pelvic region. Slicing you open. You're almost ready to eat... though who eats firsts... the young foxes or the parents?
11112212222221111111.title: Cold Meal

choices: It was a dream, you wake up back in the forest.
It was real, you are turned into fox shit. (Scat Scene)
111122122222211111112.content:
The two parents step aside as they allow their children to eat you first. With their tails wagging like a happy dog, the young foxes dig their snouts into your open belly and begins feasting upon the inner organs, messily tearing free your intestines and slurping them up like spaghetti.

Meanwhile, the two adult foxes begins knawing at your out flesh and ripping the pieces free, happily munching on each piece and swallowing them down. Piece after piece, soon both of your legs are nothing but bone and the two move to your arms. The young foxes have already emptied your lower body of all entrails and have now begun eating your vitals; not that it matters, seeing how you are already dead.

By the time your body has been completely reduced to bone, your entrails have all been devoured. The young foxes are now stuffed and lie down for a nap while the adults crack open your skull and split the brain. After that they pluck out your eyes, eating them like grapes, and then remove any last piece of flesh.

Is this how it ends? As a meal for foxes?
111122122222211111112.title: Family Meal

11112212222221111112.content:
The foxes nudge you over onto your belly. You're surprised to find yourself naked. Though you are even more surprised after one of the foxes bites into your lower back. Then you feel two more bites into your shoulders, ripping your muscles and crippling your arms. You feel the fox on your back bite deeper into your body, then it grabs something. It crushes your spine with it's strong jaws and in effect paralyzes your legs.

With your limbs disabled you have no way to defend yourself or try to escape. The foxes roll you over onto your back again. It seems like your life won't last much longer... soon your flesh will be stripped from your body and devoured by the family of foxes...
11112212222221111112.title: Paralyzed

choices: The fox swallows you whole. (Soft vore)
The fox eats you piece by piece. (Hard vore)
1111221222222111112.content: You continue to head deeper and deeper into the woods. The fox carefully sniffs around, trying to make sure he is away from the wolves' territory. Once he is certain of that, he shoves you to the ground and removes all of your clothes. You will make a fine meal, but now he must decide if we wants to swallow you whole or eat you peice by piece.
1111221222222111112.title: Swallow Whole or Eat Piece by Piece?

choices: You remain still and allow the fox to have his meal peacefully...
You try and run, having no intention to be eaten...
11112212222221111121.content: After some consideration the fox decides he's gonna take you down in one, afterall blood can overpower the taste of the other parts of the body and he always did want to know what it felt like to have living prey inside him. He licks his lips slowly, his stomach growling in anticipation. He decides he'll take you feet first, to make sure you don't suffocate in his throat and ruin the experience. Slowly, he moves his head down to your feet, ready to take both into his mouth...
11112212222221111121.title: Down in one.

choices: Have some liver and other internals.
11112212222221111122.content:
Why should he have to waste a good meal by eating it all at once? He can savore your body much more if he takes it piece by piece.

Now he's got a different choice, eat your flesh, or go straight for the internal buffet?
11112212222221111122.title: Chewy fox treat.

choices: Something Else wants to eat you...
It was just the wind, and the fox continues his feast.
111122122222211111221.content:
He decides to go for your flesh first, after all he doesn't want to kill you too quickly. You feel the fox's razor sharp teeth digging deep into your leg. Then comes ripping and tearing as your flesh torn and devoured. You can hear the sloppy sounds of the fox ripping through your flesh. Blood splatters the ground and you groan in pain. Strip after strip of flesh is removed from your leg and devoured at an incredible pace. You look down to see your right leg being reduced to nothing but bone. The fox then goes to your left side and starts his work on that leg. The pain comes again as the fox rips a massive piece of flesh off your leg and quickly gulps it down. Blood and tiny bits of flesh begin to litter the ground around your legs. As the fox continues his feast. Ripping and tearing piece after piece of juicy and tender flesh, you think you can almost see a gleeful smile on the fox after each bite he takes. He's obviously enjoying himself very much. But who could blame him, after all it turns out you've very tasty!

With your legs nothing but bone and bits of flesh the fox moves up your body. But before he can start on your arms you hear a rustling in the bushes near by. The fox pauses for a moment, listening... Is there something else there?
111122122222211111221.title: Go for the flesh.

1111221222222111112212.content:
After a few seconds of listening, hearing nothing out of the ordinary and assuming it being only the wind, the fox returns his attention to you and you can see the hunger in his eyes mixed with that gleeful glimpse again. Seeing as you no longer has the ability to get get away from him; he takes his time licking some of the blood from whatever is left of your legs before hungry teeth pierce the skin of your lower right arm; and he rips a large piece of flesh from it which he chews slowly; clearly savouring the taste of your sweet flesh. Soon he swallows the last of it and tears off another piece of meat from your arm, taking his time devouring every piece of flesh from your arm and hand and only leaving the bone or minimal pieces of flesh; just like with your legs. The fox sticks his snout into the bloodied wound on your shoulder and laps up some of the rich fluid, before he moves to your left side and starts on that arm as well. Your cries of pain grow fainter and fainter as you lose blood and they seem to do no good anyway; the only one around is the fox and he could not care less about your agony as your flesh makes a fine meal.

Sooner than one might think, nothing remains of your left arm and the fox seems to pause for a second, as if choosing where to feast next, before he lifts a clawed paw and opens your chest and belly with a clear cut. You can see his mouth water as he sees your innards and, and that gleeful glimpse again, before his snout dives into your belly and he closes his sharp teeth around some of your small intestines; which he quickly slurps up as if not risking you dying before he has had time to finish his meal. At this rate, you are to weak to utter much protest, and this seems to urge him to hurry up, as he makes short process with both your small and large intestines, only dropping the pace to savour your liver. Your belly is next, eaten together with your last meal, before your kidneys are eaten by the more and more satisfied fox. When he pauses to look down on your ribcage you are only dimly aware of your surroundings, and as if wanting to waste no more time, his strong jaws crack the ribs to get to your liver and heart. When he has finished the last of his innardly dishes, your body is no longer able to feel anything.

The fox looks down on your body, which still holds plenty of meat as well as your brain which he sees as a delicacy, but is starting to feel rather full. Should he finish you off now or drag your corpse back to his den to have you for supper as well?
1111221222222111112212.title: A Fox's Dinner

choices: To the den for dinner and more.
Something else wants to feast on your remains.
11112212222221111122122.content: After spending a few good minutes thinking about the choices, his stomach gurgles as the digestion begins. He might as well save you for dinner, and begins dragging your corpse away. His mouth nearly waters as he thinks about how tasty your brain will be on top of the flesh left on your body. Your eyes would make a nice appetizer, sort of like croutons on a salad. He'd also be able to think about some use for our bones and anything else that gets left over; perhaps he could even use your remains for some kitsune magic he'd been studying. For now, though, your body is left lifeless as he drags it away.
11112212222221111122122.title: You'd Make Good Leftovers

111122122222211111222.content:
The fox decides it might as well go for you innards first, that way they won't go cold if you bleed out and die. The fox places his paw right below your sternum. You feel a sharp claw dig into your flesh. The razor sharp claw then glides down your belly slicing through your flesh as if it was butter. It stop just below your naval, leaving giant gash in your body. The fox then sticks its snout into the gash and bites into your skin. It pulls at your skin, ripping the gash open wider, and wider. It then goes to the other side and does the same thing. Your belly has been completely ripped open, exposing all of it's contents. The intestines, the live, stomach, kidneys, everything now exposed and ready to be devoured. The fox stares at your guts, it's eyes widen in anticipation, eager to sink it's teeth into your guts. It debates for a second where to start and then sticks it snout into your opened body. It bites into your small intestines, severing it and begins to pull the long organ out. It then slurp it up like tasty spaghetti, your blood the marinara sauce. It yanks out your intestines bit by bit, slurp up each new section as it is pulled out. You feel yourself slowly emptying, your belly becoming hollow. The fox slurps up the last bit of your small intestines and then goes onto the next item on the buffet. It choose to eat your liver next. You hear the wet sounds of blood squirting out of your liver as the fox bites into it. It tears a large chunk free. The fox saviors the juicy treat for a few seconds before going in for another bite. Bit by bit your juicy liver is tore out and devoured.

You look down to see the the fox now is almost completely covered in your blood. You can see your blood oozing from your body and onto the ground. It won't be long now until you bleed out. The fox sensing your life is starting to fade, quickens it pace. It tears into your tender kidneys and devours them one at a time. Blood is now flying into the air as the fox becomes more savage in it's feast. Your body shakes with eat bite. Bits of flesh fly into the air as the fox rips out your large intestines. The fox viciously rips the long organ to shreds and seconds and devours it. Your stomach is next on the list. It burst spilling your last meal as the fox bites into it. Your body begins to burn as you feel your stomach acids soaking into your flesh. Though the fox doesn't seem to be phased at all by the acid. It takes another bite into your stomach and rips the organ free. I then messily chews it up and swallows it. Your belly in now almost completely emptied. Blood soaks the ground, and you feel yourself starting to fade.

The is going to go in for the kill now. Though it stops to debate on how to kill you...
111122122222211111222.title: Have some liver and other internals.

choices: Humans make good scratching posts and punching bags.
111122122222211112.content: Perhaps humans do make good meals, but the male fox is far from hungry. You don't have to worry about becoming a meal, you are his, and he won't feed you to any other foxes or animals.
111122122222211112.title: Not Hungry

choices: He talks, and tells you what he wants from you.
He shows you what he wants from you.
1111221222222111122.content:
Looking you over again and sniffing you a couple of times, the tod seems to have made up his mind as he walks around you and nudges you in the back, urging you to walk forward. While a human meal is very nice when he's hungry, a human slave lasts much longer and can come in handy, so he slowly begins herding you back to his den, growling in warning every time you tries the wrong direction and setting you straight on course away from wolf territory and eventually into his own. Under a giant tree root you spot a hole which he herds you towards, ignoring your hesitation and instead nudging you closer until you sigh and gets down on all fours to crawl inside as that is obviously what he wants. As soon as you get on your knees however, he immediately nudges your back harder and sends you falling into the darkness, landing with a hard thud.

Grunting as you sit up and try adjusting your eyes to the darker den, you both hear and feel how the tod enters the den and sits down behind you, efficiently blocking the exit. Looking up at him, you see that smirk again and grow worried as his plans are still unclear to you and you fear the worst as he leans down with his mouth opening, displaying his many sharp teeth as his snout comes closer and closer. Closing your eyes as you wait for the inevitable, you are surprised when he merely closes his jaws around your neck and lifts you up, carrying you further inside before dropping you down on the ground. Seems like he doesn't want to risk you escaping too soon and you fall hard on your stomach.

He soon turns you over on your back, causing you to stare up into his grinning face and wondering what will become of you... and just what is going to happen?
1111221222222111122.title: Slave for the Fox

111122122222212.content:
The fox is a female, you can tell just by looking at her. What's more, she's beautiful! Although she is much larger than an average fox, she is small compared to the wolves, only the size of a human about your age. She has reddish-orange fur with white around the paws, muzzle, belly, and tip of the tail. HEr fur is very well polished, and her eyes are an enchanting saphire blue.

Her eyes seem to send a hypnotizing vibe out. The more you try to avoid them, the harder it becomes. She may be a nonanthropomorphic fox, but that doesn't stop you from being taken in by her beauty. You can't speak her language, but one look at her eyes and you feel like you could understand anything she would otherwise say.

She is no ordinary fox, and you've been completely hypnotized by her. You are within her power, if she so chose, and would do anything for her, literally.
111122122222212.title: Hypnotizing Beauty

choices: The fox sits down next to you.
1111221222222121.content:
The fox just happened to be walking through the forest and stumbled upon you. What in the world she's doing inside of wolf territory you don't know, but she seems harmless.

The fox looks at you, and you become entranced by her gaze. Noticing this, she blinks her eyes rapidly and breaks the spell you're under. You shake your head in confusion, wondering what just happened.

The fox approaches you and looks upon your form in a most curious manner. This action causes you to wonder if she's ever seen a human before.
1111221222222121.title: Company?

11112212222221211.content: The fox sit and starts sniffing and...
11112212222221211.title: friendly

111122122222212111.content: the fox wants you to follow her because she tug on you niceley you
111122122222212111.title: safe or not

1111221222222122.content: She's doing more than just wandering around, she's looking for something.
1111221222222122.title: More Than Strolling Through the Area

11112212222221221.content:
The vixen takes notice of you and begins licking her lips hungrily. She stares deep into your eyes until the pupils seem to disappear.

"Of course," you say in a robot-like tone, "I am nothing but food."

The fox licks her lips again and approaches you.
11112212222221221.title: Willing Meal?

111122122222212211.content: The fox commands you to remove your clothes and you do so willingly. You then lie down in front of the fox, your belly exposed to the fox's sharp claws. The fox begins to wonder if it should kill you first...
111122122222212211.title: Foxy chow!

1111221222222122111.content: Why should the fox kill you? You're already under her spell, so you won't try to run away. Though it isn't clear if she prefers screams or not, she could just as easily force you to not make a sound. The fox's belly lets loose a low grumbling sound as she decides if she wants to swallow you whole, though your aren't quite sure if she can manage it, or eat you the more natural way.
1111221222222122111.title: Decisions, decisions...

11112212222221221111.content: The fox grabs and (after several gulps) she manages to swallow you whole. She smiles (or at least gets as close to smiling as a fox can get) when she sees the bulge in her gut. Curling up she falls fast asleep, content with her still living meal.
11112212222221221111.title: In the fox's belly

111122122222212211111.content: You snap out of the vixen's trance after it falls asleep. Normally, you would freak out. However, right your tired, and the fox's stomach is so warm. You fall asleep. You wake up-
111122122222212211111.title: Too Tired to Panic

choices: when suddenly the Female pulls herslef forward and swallows your feet again
You notice your hands have pads on them as well as your feet
1111221222222122111111.content:
You wake up again and find that your still inside the Vixen's stomach so your still alive does this mean you cant be digested if so then perhaps you can still live you feel around and feel two holes and decide to come out the right hole which leads to the Vixen's throat.

you climb out but he throat is very tight and so when you force it open it almost stops her breathing you carefully worm your way up her throat till you see her closed mouth then with a slight pop your arms come up and you open the Vixens mouth you continue to pull yourself out extracting yourself carefully and slowly till all that is inside are your feet and t-tail? you gasp as you see you have a fox's tail and your feet are fox's feet you reach forward to touch them
1111221222222122111111.title: Later that night

11112212222221221111112.content: you start freaking out after seeing the tail and fox pads on your hands and feet then from the stress of it all you pass out. you wake up...
11112212222221221111112.title: You notice your hands have pads on them as well...

choices: You accept your fate and answer her.
You panic and ignore her question.
1111221222222122111112.content:
You wake up the next morning and stretch yourself out. You gasp when you realize that you are no longer in the fox's stomach. No, you're in a small den. As you continue to stretch yourself out, you notice that the back of your hands are covered in an orange fuzz. In fact, your hands no longer look like hands; they're paws. Your legs and feet are different too.

You scurry to your feet and look around, managing to locate a small puddle of water. You stare into it and are shocked to find out that you've become a fox.

"Wh-What's going on?!" you cry out in a fox-line whine. "Gah! What's happened to my voice?"

"I see you're finally awake," a female voice states. You turn to see the vixen that ate ou approaching. "How do you feel, my son?"

"S-Son?!" you gasp.
1111221222222122111112.title: A FoxyTransformation

11112212222221221111121.content:
"that's right, son. I ate you up, but you were so willing I had to bring you back. I made you my son. You feel alright?"

You consider how to answer her. You actually do feel pretty good. You feel more energetic than you felt in a long time even! "Y... yeah! I do!"

"Excellent!" She says, nuzzling your head. "I am glad it worked. Now come one, let's get you something to eat. Only fair!" She smiles and pads off, motioning for you to follow. You do so, getting used to your new body bit by bit. It feels kinda good. But, you start to have a weird craving all of a sudden. You feel like having...
11112212222221221111121.title: Feeling fine for a canine

choices: The two of you spot the pair of deer and take 'em down
You smell wolves in the area
111122122222212211111212.content:
You have a craving for a person! You don't understand why you have this craving at all...foxes don't eat people, they eat squirrels and rabbits...and rats, and anything else that's smaller than them. But you have a craving for a human! You shake off the weird feeling you have and exit the small den. You are no longer at the cliff..you're deep in the forest it looks like. You take a sniff and you smell all kinds of things. As a human, you were able to smell a few things...as a fox, you're able to smell everything. Everything has a scent now, and you know where a smell comes from without being told. It's like you were always a fox.

"My, you're slow" said the vixen that ate you. She's sitting in front of the small den in front of you. "I imagine you have about a million questions to ask"

"Um...yeah" you say.

"You found yourself in this forest with no memory of what happened to you before, right?" asked the vixen.

"Yeah" you say. "what did happen to me and how did I get here?"

"I don't know, either" said the vixen. "humans just show up from time to time in this forest. The animals in this forest hunt 'em down and eat 'em...and change 'em into animals....like what I did to you. How did you change from a human to a fox? I think there's magic involved somehow"

"Magic...?" you say faintly.

"Yeah" said the vixen. "anyway, let's go find some breakfast. I smell a deer near by...two of 'em, actually..let's go get 'em!"

As she saids this, the vixen goes into the forest and disappears from sight. You decide to follow her as she's your "mom". How old is the vixen anyway? She didn't look old enough to be your mother. You shake your head. She can't be my mom! I was human...therefore, I must have human parents...or had parents. You're so confused.

"But I want to eat a human" you say in your fox voice, following after your mother.
111122122222212211111212.title: The Hunt

1111221222222122111112122.content:
As you follow the vixen to where the deer supposedly are, you notice a familiar scent. At least, you think it's familiar, seeing as your sense of smell has never been this good before.

The vixen skids to a stop and raises her forelimb to stop you. You end up right behind her as she sniffs the air carefully.

"Oh no!" she exclaims.

"What is it?" you question.

"Forget the deer, we have to get you out of here!" the female fox replies. "Run, quickly!"

You follow the vixen as she runs as fast as she can in another direction. The two of you run for a mile or two, the scent never fading; the two of you are definitely being followed. You suddenly notice that the small is no longer coming from behind you, but in front of you.

The female fox breaks into a sudden stop, causing you to crash into her. You fall down, but the vixen remains firmly in place. You slowly get to your feet and brush yourself off, looking in front of you. There are two wolves in front you, both of them male.

"Wolves!" you gasp. "That's what it was!"

The vixens hears you and bops you on the head with a forepaw.

"Keep your mouth shut!" she orders.

"Well, if it isn't Kaila the fox!" one wolf laughs in a language you can now understand. "Who's that with you?"

"This is my son!" the vixen answers.

"Your son, Kaila?" the other wolf responds. "I don't remember you being pregnant recently."

The wolf that just spoke approaches you and begins sniffing you.

"We're looking for a human boy that we recently adopted," the first wolf states. "He ran away because he was scared, he couldn't understand our language after all. Let me just say this, Kaila... If your 'son' happens to be that boy, you WILL PAY!"

You try to remain silent as your mother ordered, nearly laughing as the wolf continues to sniff you.
1111221222222122111112122.title: A Dangerous Encounter

choices: You don't love her, sealing her fate.
You do love love her and beg them not to hurt her.
11112212222221221111121221.content:
The wolf continues to sniff at you for a good while.

"Well, is it him?" the first wolf asks.

"I don't know," the second wolf answers. "I's hard to recognize such a scent on a different body after such a cold night.'

The wolf begins taking deeper sniffs, causing you to laugh uncontrollably.

"Oh yeah, it's him!" the second wolf announces. "Poor kid."

The second wolf licks at you affectionately while the first wolf confronts Kaila.

"Well, it looks like you've been found guilty!" the first wolf chuckles. "We control this forest, and you know what happens to those that mess with members of our family! Looks like fox is on the menu for tonight!"

"He's my son now!" Kaila barks. "I love him!"

"Really?" the wolf responds. "Does he love you as well?"
11112212222221221111121221.title: Discovered

choices: Kaila tries to run but the wolves catch her and kill her
Kaila gets captured and takin back to the pack
111122122222212211111212211.content: You took my life away from me!you say. Kill that bitch! Nooooooooooooooooooooo please dont do this my son! Kaila begs.Im not your son!you scream.
111122122222212211111212211.title: You don't love her, sealing her fate.

1111221222222122111112122111.content: "NOO" Kaila screams, running away as fast as she can,but, unluckily (for her anyways),she wasn't fast enough. The 2 wolves catch her, one on each side, and start pulling. You want to look awy, but for some reason, you just can't. With a sick tearing noise, and a bloodcurdling scream for Kaila, she gets ripped in half, blood squirting on you, and intestines going evreywhere. The wolves drop her body, and start to walk over to you. You cringed away in fear, But, you hear the wolf say, "Poor bastard, come on, we should take him back to the Cave, the Alpha might know what to do." With that, the wolf picks you up by the scruff of your neck, and starts carrying you deeper into the thick Forest....
1111221222222122111112122111.title: A Terrible Way to go

111122122222212211111212212.content:
"Yes, I love her" you say automatically. For just a second, you thought you might betray your new "mother", but you realize that you can't now. You haven't known Kalia for long, but she seems far more nicer than those wolves are. The first wolf looks a tad disappointed, and the second wolf's expression in between anger and pity. "Please don't hurt my mom"



The first wolf starts to growl at Kalia softly. The second wolf swats at the first wolf to stop the growling.

"We wolves are on top of the food chain" said the second wolf. "it's not too late to join us. Join us, and we won't hurt Kalia"

"He's not a wolf, Salas" said Kalia.

"You shut up" said the first wolf.

"True, he's not a wolf" said Salas. "but he's a part of our family"

"Who says?" asked Kalia.

"Watch your mouth, Kalia" said Salas.

"Don't hurt her" you say.

"Then you'll join us?" asked the first wolf.

What to do?!
111122122222212211111212212.title: Decision time

choices: He says. "No! Consider this your punishment!"
He says, "You get a week, but the boy must hurt you first!"
1111221222222122111112122121.content:
"Yes," you finally answer. "I'll be part of your family. Just please, don't hurt her!"

"That's good," says Salas, picking you up and placing you on his back.

"We'll be taking the boy back with us," the first wolf tells Kaila, kicking her hard and knocking her away.

"Please...no!" Kaila begs as she weakly stands up. "He's MY son!"

"But he's part of our family!" the first wolf barks. "Don't worry about him! Even if he is a fox now, we would NEVER hurt him. We'll protect him until he's old enough to protect himself."

"But...I want to raise him..." says Kaila. "Ever since all of my children died in that fire two years ago, I've been heartbroken. I admit, when I first saw this boy, I wanted to eat him...and I did. But then I realized how much I wanted a child of my own, so I had him reborn as a fox. I love him!"

"Kaila, we understand what you've gone through, but he belongs with us," Salas replies. "And I admit, when we're done, he won't remember anything about you."

"If you're going to do that, then can you please give me a week, or even just one day with him!" Kaila begs. "I'm sorry for what I did; it was wrong of me! I'll make it up to you somehow, just please give me some time with him."

The two wolves discuss it over and the first wolf looks at her.
1111221222222122111112122121.title: A Fox Among Wolves

11112212222221221111121221212.content:
The two wolves discuss this matter over several long minutes. You don't know how you know, but you get a bad feeling about these wolves. Could it be that you have some sort of sixth sense now that you're an animal? You've heard some dogs can "sense" when a person is about to have a seizure...so a sixth sense doesn't sound that far-fetched. Your sixth sense, or whatever it is, also tells you that you can trust Kalia. This is all so confusing.


"Alright" said the first wolf. "you have a week with him. However, he has to hurt you within the week"

"Hurt her?!" you ask. "but.."

"It doesn't have to be life-threatening" said the first wolf. "just...punish her for us"

Kalia lowers her head, accepting the fact. You don't want to hurt anybody..but if you say no, the wolves would kill her...and probably eat her...and not in that order either. You sigh and nod.

"Good" said Salas. "and Kalia...don't try to run off with him, either. We can track you down easily no matter where you go. You have one week with him. After that, he'll come with us to stay"

Kalia nods sullenly.

"We'll be watching you two" said the first wolf, as he and Salas ran off.

"Damn those wolves..." muttered Kalia.

"I'm.." you start to say.

"Hurt me now" said Kalia. "get it over with"

"But.."

"Just do it!" barked Kalia. She comes closer to you and whispers: "I know a hiding spot where those wolves won't be able to find us. But we won't live to make it there if we go straight there. Now, Hurt me!" She shouted the last three words.
11112212222221221111121221212.title: Kalia's Plan

choices: Run away tomorrow night and guarantee her survival.
Stay and follow Kaila's plan, no matter the risk.
111122122222212211111212212121.content:
At Kaila's command, you bite her hard on her right foreleg. She yelps in pain as you let go, revealing quite a bloody wound.

"I'm sorry!" you apologize as the wolves leave, laughing.

"It's okay," Kaili replies, wincing in pain. She never knew you were as strong as you were. "I'll be fine, it's nothing really."

Kaila licks at her leg, and you do the same, trying to clean away the blood and help stop it.

"I'm not going to give you up!" she swears. "It's impossible to leave this forest, but I know a place where we'll both be safe, and I can raise you in peace."

"But mommy!" you cry, hardly believing you called her that. "I don't want them to hurt you! If we get caught, they'll kill you!"

"I don't care!" Kaila exclaims. "If we get caught they'll erase your memory somehow anyway! It'll be worth it if I can succeed!"

Kaila whispers her plan to you, unaware that Salas has secretly been keeping watch over the two of you. His body has been covered with natural mints, so he can't be detected by smell. He can't hear her, but he knows she's up to something. Although you don't know about Salas' presence either, you have a strange feeling that you're being watched.

You spend the day helping Kaila hunt some deer, which you eventually eat together. She plays with and treats you like were always her son. She also presents you to a group of other foxes in the forest. You even make friends with another fox cub named Renji.

That night, Kaila holds you tightly up against her, keeping you safe and warm. She occasionally licks you in her sleep. You remain awake all night, unable to sleep. Kaila told you plans to hide you on day 3. However, you are certain that she'll be caught and killed if she tries. You spend the entire night thinking about what to do, nearly crying as you sniffle and nuzzle against you mother.
111122122222212211111212212121.title: Uneasy Feeling

1111221222222122111112122121212.content: Despite your fears of Kalia getting killed, her plan is actually foolproof. She plans to take you to a place in the forest that very few know about..and it's actually located near the very heart of the forest. Her exact words are "It's so deep in the forest, not even the owls live there", which reminds you of something. You know you read those exact same words somewhere else...you just don't remember where it comes from. In fact, your memories of being a human being are quickly slipping away. It's as if you were never human to begin with. You can remember odds and ends; you can remember your birthday, but you can't remember your parents' names. You know that you've saw (or read) something about "so deep into the forest, not even owls live there". Her plan involves the two of you walking in the day (since the wolves are more active at night) to this secret place. Kalia tells you that once a great wizard once lived in the forest, and he lived in the secret place she'll take you. The wizard died (or moved away) a long time ago. The place has several magical spells still working, and one of these spells prevents anyone else from finding you if you're in this special place. She hasn't personally been there before, but she knows someone who does. She refuses to name that certain someone in case the wolves are listening. This certain someone lives 2 days away from Kalia's den. You have your doubts, but you're willing to take the risk. Kalia is cunning, like most foxes in folklore. You just hope her plan works.
1111221222222122111112122121212.title: So deep in the forest, not even the owls go there

choices: You agree to go with the wolf pup.
You attempt to run and put Kaila's life in danger.
11112212222221221111121221212122.content:
It has gotten real late in the night, and you and Kaila have taken refuge in an abandoned den underneath some moss-covered rocks. You remain safely positioned beside Kaila, or at least, time you checked. You find yourself experience a bumpy ride somewhere.

"Am I dreaming?" you wonder as you wake up.

You are currently on the back of a wolf pup not too much larger than yourself. ou begin freaking out and topple off the wolf's back.

"Where am I?" you cry out. "Where mommy?!"

The wolf pup quickly covers you mouth a paw, hushing you.

"Be quiet, you idiot!" the pup growls in a child-like, but fierce male voice. "I was scouring ahead for my brothers and sisters; you just happened to take refuge in our secret clubhouse."

You remain silent as he removes his paw, allowing you to take some deep breaths.

"Once my brothers and sisters arrive, your mommy will be found and killed," the young wolf tells you. "The entire pack is looking for you, they know that Kaila is trying to hide you. If you stay with me, I might be able to convince my kin to forget about meeting at our clubhouse tonight and save her. However, if you refuse to co-operate, I won't be able to give them a good enough reason not to go. They're not like me, they'll expose both you and her. You won't get away either, since I can smell them about 3 minutes away. The den you were staying in is 5 minutes away, so you won't be able to warn her in time either, no matter how long I stall them. They're too fast!"

You can tell that wolf pup is telling the truth, as you can now smell the scent of wolves nearby. The wolf pup promises to lie about how he found you if you agree not to try a run away.
11112212222221221111121221212122.title: Co-operate with a Wolf Pup?

choices: The pups agree to head back.
The pups want to go to he clubhouse.
111122122222212211111212212121221.content:
"All right," you finally say with a disappointed sigh. "I promise not to run away. However, if you lie or can't convince them, then..."

"I WILL convince them!" the wolf pup interrupts, smiling at you innocently. "Trust me, okay? By the way, I'm Campari. Now, I want you to fake being asleep before the ohers show up."

You nod your head and take one last look back before pretending to be asleep as three more male pups show up, as well as two girls.

"Hold it, guys!" the Campari shouts.

The five pups all skid to a stop as Campari called out to the them, all of them gasping as they instantly took notice of you.

"Is that...?" one of the boy pups stammers.

"Yes," Campari answered. "I found him just lying around near the clubhouse. Kaila wasn't around anywhere, and I didn't catch any fresh scents anywhere nearby. No, I think she fled and attempted to hide him there to either come back later, or to let him be free on his own."

"Maybe it's the latter," one of the girl pups chuckles. "After what she did, it would be the smart thing to do."

"We should forget about her," Campari states. "Our first priority is get this guy back to the pack."

The other girl pup approaches your "sleeping" form and nudges you. You do your best to not move as she does so.

"He's out cold," she says. "I hope he's alright, especially after all he's been through."

"Don't worry," one of the other boy pups replies. "Once the elders are done with him, he won't remember a thing."

In your mind you whimper, not wanting to forget Kaila.

"Are we going to go to the clubhouse tonight or not?" the last male pup growls.

As the other pups discuss it, Campari shouts out to them.

"We can't waste any time, we have to get him back now!" he yells.
111122122222212211111212212121221.title: Agreement

1111221222222122111112122121212212.content:
"Come on Campari, the pack can wait," the second male said. "We've been waiting weeks to get back to the clubhouse, so we're going. Besides, the kids out cold," he pointed out, nudging you to make his point. Taking the opportunity, you slowly pretend to wake up and stretch yourself out. You then look up at the wolves with horror. 

"Where am I," you cry. "Where's my mommy!"

"See what you did Fang," Campari growls. "You woke him."

"Where's mommy," you cry again with believable fear. 

"Shut up you runt," Fang growls in your face. "Consider yourself lucky you're still alive right now!" You quake in fear and curl onto a tight ball.

"Fang, you're scaring him," the second female barks. "It's okay little guy, there's no need to be scared," she murmurs lovingly while nuzzling you.

"Quiet Angela," Fang growls. "Stop pampering that thing! I don't care what Salas says, that thing is not a wolf, and it will never be!"

"Come on Fang, the little guy's scared, can't you see that," Campari asked. 

"Seriously, are we going to the clubhouse," the last male asked again. 

"We should go home, he's suffered enough," Angela said. 

"Fine, let's go," Fang growled. He slowly padded up to you, intent on carrying you. You quickly backed away from him and towards Angela. She quickly got the message and lifted you onto her back.

You all ran through the forest for over an hour before the stench of wolves assaulted your nose and the cave came into view. They led you into the cave.
1111221222222122111112122121212212.title: The pups want to go to he clubhouse.

11112212222221221111121221212122121.content:
The wolves led you into the cave and you saw all the wolves bow their heads as an old wolf walk into the main cavern, followed by two wolves carrying a large hollow rock with a cover. "Where is the fox," the elder asked, his voice deep. Angela lifted you off her back and sat you in front of the elder.

"Wolves of the pack, we shall now commence the ritual! We shall allow this creature to forget its past life and return to us as a wolf! Release the snake!"

The two wolves behind the elder opened the hollow rock and a large green snake slithered out. The snake slowly approached you and revealed its two large fangs. The wolves around you began hitting their paws on the ground rhythmically. The snake got closer and the stomping increased in volume and tempo. The snake was six inches away when it reared its head and clamped its fangs into your neck. Your last thought was, 'This is for you mommy.' Then your vision got fuzzy and your eyes glassed over. 

"Your name is Nanokami."

"My name is Nanokami," you reply in a trance. 

"What are you?"

"A fox."

"No, from now on you are a wolf. You have always been a wolf and will never be anything but a wolf."

"I am a wolf. I have always been a wolf and will never be anything but a wolf."

"Good. Who is your mother?"

"My mother is Kalia, the fox."

"No, from now on, your mother is Genarius, the alpha female of this pack. She is, always was, and always will be your mother."

"My mother is Genarius, the alpha female of this pack. She is, always was, and always will be my mother."

"Good. Have you ever been a human or a fox?"

"Yes."

"No! You have always been a wolf. You have never been a human or a fox!"

"I have always been a wolf. I have never been a human or a fox."

"Wolves," the elder shouted to the pack. "He is one of us!" The wolves all rose their heads and let out a long howl, which you joined in.
11112212222221221111121221212122121.title: Learning to Forget

111122122222212211111212212121221211.content:
You awoke the next morning feeling sore and tired. You slowly looked around and saw you were in a strange den that smelt of wolves. A closer examination showed that you were laying on a bed of assorted furs. What disturbed you the most was you saw a fur that looked strangely like yours, the same red fur with white and black. 

You heard a soft noise and looked up to see your mother walking in. You didn't know where you were or why you were there, but you knew your mommy would tell you. "Mommy, where am I," you cry.

"Good morning Nanokami," Genarius said. "And what do you mean, you're at home."

"Home," you ask. You can't remember what or where your home is. The only thing you remember is your name, your mother, and that you were a wolf, always have been and always will be.

Yes Nanokami, you're at home. Don't you remember?" 

"No, I only remember my name, you, and that I'm a wolf." Genarius smiled, the toxin the snake injected had left him entirely open to suggestion. He now had no memories except what others would tell him. 

"Oh honey, you're probably still fuzzy from the fall. You got a nasty hit on the head when you fell from that rock yesterday. Now come on, it's time to eat." With that you walk off to greet the pack.

6 Weeks Later:
You had met everyone in the pack and most of them had accepted you as one of their own, though some were skeptical at first. Any leftover memories of being anything but a wolf had faded into oblivion. You were wrestling with a wolf named Nero, Fang's younger brother, and being sorely beaten. You were on your back when he put his paw on you and laughed. "Ah, are you that weak, or do you just love losing to me?"

"Shut up Nero," you growl. "Just because I keep losing doesn't mean that I'm weak! Besides, you're like three times my size." You were right, he was three times bigger than you and only a few months older. In fact, you were hardly as big as the largest newborn pup.

"Ha, ha, ha, don't you get it, you are weak! Even newborn pups can beat you in a wrestling match!"

"Shut up! You're a mean wolf!"

"Oh, go cry to your mommy you big baby! You don't deserve to call yourself a wolf! You don't even look like a wolf! You...." Angela nipped on his tail to shut him up. No one was allowed to tell Nanokami that he was a fox.

"Shut up! I hate you! I hate you!" You run as fast as you can away from him and run into your cavern to see your parents asleep. You run onto your bed and cry over what had happened. You look down and see the fur that looked like yours and you began to cry louder and harder, remembering how Nero said you didn't look like a wolf. 

You hear a loud grunt and see your parents wake up and stretch themselves out. Your mommy nudges your daddy, Salas, and he looked at you and asked, "Why are you crying, Nanokami?"

"Nero made fun of me," you cry. "He made fun of my size and how he always beats me at wrestling, and then he said I didn't deserve to call myself a wolf! He said I didn't look like a wolf! He said a newborn could beat me!"

"Oh, don't listen to them son. They're just picking on you because they're jealous of your fur."

"But why is my fur so different? I don't like it. I want gray fur like everyone else." 

"Son, you're a special wolf. Your fur makes you more special than the other wolves, like how Angela has black fur on the tip of her tail."

"Then why is there fur like mine on your my bed?"

"That is from a fox, sweetie," your mommy says. "They're mean animals that like to make themselves look like special wolves like you."

"Foxes are bad?"

"Yes, the worst."

6 Months Later:
You're wrestling with your friend Kai when you hear a rustling in the bushes to your right where you saw...
111122122222212211111212212121221211.title: Life With The Pack

1111221222222122111112122121212212111.content:
You look behind the bushes and see a small, red fox cub. He appeared to be a foot taller than yourself, and about six months older. You think he looked familiar, but quickly dismissed the idea. The fox looks up at you and grinned wildly before playfully tackling you. You struggle, but you are eventually overpowered. You cringe in fear, expecting to be killed, but are surprised when it started licking you from head to toe. "Oh, you're alive," he shouts. "Your mother is going to be so happy to see you alive!"

"Why," you ask. "I saw mommy this morning. Did something happen to the pack?"

"What? Don't you remember me? It's me, Renji! Remember, you met me with your mother, Kalia! Don't you remember?"

"No, I don't remember. My mommy is Genarius, and my daddy is Salas, the pack leaders. And you better leave before I go and get them!"

"What are you saying? Why are you with those wolves?"

"Because I am a wolf, always have been, always will be."

"You're a fox, not a wolf!"

"I'm not a fox. Fox are mean animals that hate wolves! And why would the wolves accept me into their pack if I was a fox and love me? I love my wolf pack, and they love me!"

"Listen you little brat," Renji yelled as he put his claws to your throat. "I did not just spend six months listening your mother cry over you for nothing! Now you're coming with me!"

"Please don't hurt me! I haven't done anything wrong! I haven't even hunted yet!"

"Listen, I'm not going to hurt you, um..."

"Nanokami."

"Okay. I'm not going to hurt you Nanokami, but will you please come with me. There's something you need to see."
1111221222222122111112122121212212111.title: Renji

11112212222221221111121221212122121111.content:
He starts to walk and you quickly dart away from him once you had memorized his scent and ran towards the pack. You ran for a full five minutes before you ran through the cave opening. You search the cave before you run into Angela's fore legs. "Hey Nanokami, what's the rush? Are you looking for your parents?"

"Yes Angela, where are they? I need to talk to them."

"Sorry buddy, you just missed them. They just went out to hunt. What do you need to talk to them about?"

"I saw a fox outside!"

Angela gasped. "What happened Nanokami!"

"I was wrestling with Kai and I heard rustling in the bushes! I looked and it tackled me and started licking me and telling me my mommy would be so happy that I'm alive. He kept saying I'm a fox."

Angela went wide eyed and you heard three long howls and one short one coming from about five miles away. You knew one howl meant food. Two meant help. Three meant to evacuate the cave. But what did that mean? 

Before you could guess, Campari ran into the cave and picked you up in his jaws. He and Angela ran deep into the cave where you saw a small room that they sealed. 

"What's going on Angela," you ask.
 
Angela looked at Campari for a minute before saying, "It means foxes are coming."

"Then why am I here?"

"Well, since you look kind of like a fox, we need to make sure a wolf doesn't hurt you accidentally."

"You don't need to worry about anything, just lay down and go to sleep," Campari adds. "When your mommy comes home she'll come down here with you, okay." You meekly nod. "All right little buddy, goodnight."

You look around one last time before you curl up into a tight ball and drift to sleep. You have a strange dream where you see Campari telling you to pretend to be asleep to protect your mother. You see Fang, Angela, and several others come up and start talking about you. You start to wake up, but you hear Fang say, "I don't care what Salas says, that thing is not a wolf, and it will never be!"

You wake up crying at the nightmare you'd just experienced. Your cries attract Angela and she walks over to you and starts to nuzzle and lick you affectionately. "What's the matter Nanokami? Did you have a bad dream?"

You nod. "Fang said that I wasn't a wolf. It was just a bad dream, right? I'm a wolf. I always have been, and I always will be!"

"Calm down Nanokami, it was just a bad dream, okay?" You nod. "You're a wolf, it was just a dream. It's okay little guy, there's no need to be scared," she murmurs lovingly while nuzzling you. You suddenly think that had happened before and your head began to hurt. You fall down and howl as you massage your head. 

The pain had subsided when you heard claws on stone and you saw the rock blocking the entrance move and reveal...
11112212222221221111121221212122121111.title: Warn Your Parents

111122122222212211111212212121221211112.content:
As they came in the little hidout you and angela got in a fighting stance and shouted at you very urgently "get behind me NOW" you did as you were told. When 5 foxes were in and suronding angela she pounced on the far left one catching it off guard and breaking it's neck in one bite and throwing the body at the others. With blood dripping from her mouth she said in a feairce tone "who's next you will all die ,come on," you saw that the 4 renaming foxes attention was on angela. Angela saw this two and said to you "if you get a chance run from them and find other wolfs."

Suddenly 3 foxes pounced at Angela and she swiped at one giving it a nasty cut on it's chest, but one bit her left frount leg and another went for her neck. She voinlently shock and the one going for her neck missed it target and crashed on the floor. It got up and and took a brief look at you hideong in the corner. Then attacked angela again. The fox on her leg now had teeth marks in it's brain and blood bripping from it's head as it lay still. And the one that was doing nothing seemed to have scraches angela's side.

As the 3 foxes all jumped at Angela she could not stop them and they all mercylessly ripped into her and left her near dead. You could see she was still breathing and trying to say "ru-run g-go" you sprung from your ball and ran behind the foxes. You thought you herd one say "that's the one we are looking for quickly get him" this made you think back to when you were told about your fur. You thought to your self as you ran for your life "they must want my fur the must want to kill me." and you kept running.

You saw fang killing a fox and discarding of it's body, he saw you running and shouted "MOVE I got these don't stop" and you kept on going. You looked behind you and saw fang fighting two foxes, but one was still chaceing you. You thought "got to keep running must not stop" fear and tiedness was setting in and you struggled to keep your pace and saw the fox gaining. It then shouted "stop the wolf have been lieing you are a fox" you shout back "NO (puff) I am a wolf (pant) I always have been." you saw then exit and said outloud "there it is mum I'm comming"

As you got out you saw about a dozon foxes surouning your mother. She saw you and said "Nanokami run and hide there are wolves waiting not to far please my son RUN" you looked at the bushes that your mother said run to but could you realy leave your mother alone?

nothing but have a flash back of your mother

You blasted all of them away! (Kistune powers! thanks mom!)
111122122222212211111212212121221211121.content:
You follow Rejini into the deep green forest, and there you saw a female fox sitting in a bed of leaves, crying. She looked so pale, so lifeless, like she just lost the one that she truly loves.

"Why......why is she crying?" you ask Rejini.

He looks at you with sorrowful eyes, "Those wolves......they took you away! They erased your memory of your mom and made it seem that we were the bad ones cause we had fur like you!"

You look at Rejini with shock, "What?! T-t-t-thats not true! My mom would never do that! She loves me!" Rejini shook his head

"They erased it pretty good......but....I might be able to bring your memory back......hold on...." He said closing his eyes.

You stare at him as a light orange color surrounds him, and a beam from his eyes shoots into yours.

*FLASHBACK*

You were scared as the snake approached you very slowly, with a look that froze you like a deer in headlights. The pack kept on beating on the table as the snake thrustedd foward and bit your neck. You howled as the snakes venom entered through your veins, making you woozy but concious.

"Your name is Nanokami." the alpha male wolf said

"My name is Nanokami."

"What are you?"

"A fox"

I am a wolf. I have always been a wolf and will never be anything but a wolf."

"Good. Who is your mother?"

"My mother is Kalia, the fox."

"No, from now on, your mother is Genarius, the alpha female of this pack. She is, always was, and always will be your mother."

"My mother is Genarius, the alpha female of this pack. She is, always was, and always will be my mother."

"Good. Have you ever been a human or a fox?"

"Yes."

"No! You have always been a wolf. You have never been a human or a fox!"

"I have always been a wolf. I have never been a human or a fox."

"Wolves," the elder shouted to the pack. "He is one of us!" The wolves all rose their heads and let out a long howl, which you joined in.

*END FLASHBACK*

Your eyes welled up in tears as you remembered your mother, she was not Genarius that wolf traitor, she was Kalia, Kalia the fox.

You looked over to your mother, who just noticed you from crying.

"S-son? *Sniff* Is......is that you?" She said slowly getting out of the bed of leaves, approaching you.

You ran up to her and nuzzled her chest, "Mommy! It's me! And I remember! YOUR my mom! Not that wolf!"

She nuzzled you back as she cried in happiness, "Oh, son! I love you! I'll never let you go again!"

Just then a growl interrupted your reunion.

"GIVE....ME.....BACK.....MY.....SON!!!!!!!" A female wolfs voice said

You gasped, "Genarius! I'm not your son, you traitor! I'll never go back! Ever!"

Rejini stepped in front of you and Kalia as the whole pack came into the forest.

The alpha stepped closest to you and your family, "Here's the deal, fox. Give us back out son, and you can keep your legs. Your choice." he said growling

"No!" Kalia said, "Never again!" curling around you to protect you

All the wolves were about to attack when
111122122222212211111212212121221211121.title: Mom!

Suddenly a group of foxes appeared.

You took that signal and you and your mother rushed away.
