1111221222222122111112122121212212111211.title: Saved by the true pack.

1111221222222122111112122121212212112.content:
You looked behind the bush and saw a strange but oddly familiar creature. The creature sported no fur on its body except for a small brown patch on its head that flowed down to the creature's hip. Instead of fur, a strange material covered its legs and chest. The only exposed areas were completely bare. You look at it and it appears to be sleeping. "Kai, what is that thing," you ask curiously. 

"I've seen one of these before. I think papa called it a human."

You look at the human with new curiosity. You know you've heard that before, but you couldn't but your paw on it. "What should we do with it?"

"We should bring it to the pack. Mama and papa will know what to do."

You begin to think of how to take the human to the pack, you see the human begin to stir in its sleep and you saw its deep blue eyes flutter open.
****************************************************
Girl's POV

A bright light blinds you as you slowly open your eyes. You find yourself in a ordinary-looking forest, nothing seems out of place. You wonder how you got where you are, unable to remember anything that happened to you. You are a High-School student, age 14. You feel horrible, covered in scrapes and bruises, your clothes torn up. You are down on the ground, belly up in the dirt. You hear a strange sound, a growl of some sort, and look up. In front of you, you spot what looks like a fox. It has orange-red fur on the top, white on the bottom and paws, and black accents. However, something is different about it. It's large; you could tell it was a kit, but it appeared to be the size of a full grown fox. You try to move, but your body is too sore to do so. You look on in fear as the fox slowly approaches you. It comes to your side, and nudges its nose against your crotch. Even through your thick blue jeans, you feel the wet, cold nose. The fox is trying to determine your gender. 

When it doesn't feel anything, it takes a few steps back and then growls something. There was another growl and a large, gray timber wolf came into view. Its back reached your mid chest. The two growled at each other for several seconds before the wolf ran off into the forest, leaving you and the fox in the clearing.

The fox walked up and laid down next to you. It was then that you and the fox noticed a large gash on your forehead that was spewing blood. The fox got up and began to lick the wound. You begin to think it's going to eat you, but when it ceased licking you put your hand up to the cut and felt that it had stopped bleeding. 

You sigh in relief that the fox was friendly and manage to sit yourself up. The fox plopped itself down beside you and looked up at you. You smile softly and begin to scratch the fox behind his ears. "I don't suppose you could tell me where I am, could you," you say to no one in particular. The fox opens its mouth and you hear....
1111221222222122111112122121212212112.title: A Human Encounter

11112212222221221111121221212122121121.content: (Nanokims POV)you tell her that she is in the packs territory. after that she faints. (Girls POV) you ask the question not expecting any answer but when the fox opened his mouth and a little boy's voice came out it was to much for you to handle and you faint
11112212222221221111121221212122121121.title: A Little Boy's Voice? GASP

11112212222221221111121221212122121122.content:
The fox opened its mouth and you heard a soft growl followed by a small whine. "Hmm, I thought not. I wish someone could tell me where the hell I am right now." She simply sighed and continued to stroke the fox. She continued for another five minutes before she heard a loud rustling and several large wolves, each almost twice your size, came through the brush and approached you.
****************************************************
Nanomami's POV

After you had told Kai to go and get your parents, you had padded up to the human and sat down next to it. You laid there for a moment before you looked the human in the face and saw a large gash was spewing blood at an alarming rate. Deciding you had to help the human, you leaped onto its chest and began to lick the wound as your mother had done with you on several occasions. 

After the wound had stopped bleeding, you had laid back down and looked up at the human as it sat up and turned to you. It put her hand down and began to scratch you behind your ear. It was a new sensation, but was an extremely enjoyable one and you found yourself melting under her gentle touch. The human began making several noises, obviously trying to communicate with you. You could swear that for a moment you had understood what she was trying to say, but you quickly dismissed the idea. "What are you saying," you asked. 

The human simply sighed and resumed stroking and scratching you. You just laid there in pure ecstasy for several minutes before you heard a loud rustle and your parents, the beta pair; who you and your siblings called Auntie Sayaka and Uncle Hakuo, Angela and Campari, and your brothers, Kai and Hayate, as well as your sister Aria.

Your father looked at you and the human and gave off a menacing growl at the human. The human instantly stopped stroking you and backed away quickly. "Nanokami," he roared. "Get away from that human this instant!" You whimpered slightly at your father's ferocity and instantly retreated behind your mother's forelegs.

"Salas, calm down," your mother barked, "You're scaring Nanokami!" Your mother turned to you and gave you a few reassuring licks before soothingly saying, "It's alright Nanokami, daddy's just a bit on edge today. Why don't you head on back home with Auntie and Uncle, we'll be there in a little while, okay?"

Shyly you nod and your Auntie Sayaka walks behind you and lifted you up in her teeth by the scruff of your neck. You look back at the frightened human and gave a small whine as she finally disappeared from your view and you headed home.
****************************************************
Girl's POV

You look as several wolves came into the clearing and look at you and the fox for a moment. Then the largest wolf crouches close to the ground and released an ear shattering growl directed at you. You take your hand off of the fox and quickly back away. The large wolf turns its head towards the fox and growls at it for a few moments before the fox whimpered slightly and ran behind the third largest wolf. 

The wolf it hid behind turned and growled at the largest wolf and licked the fox and gave a few soft whines. Then the fox appeared to nod at what the wolf was saying and the other wolves walked towards the fox and one lifted it up in its teeth and walked they all padded away, leaving you alone with the largest and third largest wolf.

The two wolves turned to each other and began to growl at each other for almost ten minutes. Finally, the smaller of the two walked up to the largest and began to lick it affectionately. You had concluded that the two were mates. The male turned and walked behind you. You felt its tongue drag across the back of your neck and its jaws clamp on your neck and lifted you up. You felt your skin stretch, but somehow the wolf's tongue had left your neck numb and you stayed still as the wolves began to carry you to a large den.
11112212222221221111121221212122121122.title: A Soft Growl

choices: They Break Her Right Fore Leg
1111221222222122111112122122.content:
You look at the wolves and back at Kaila. You can see a mixture of fear and sadness on her face. You ponder the choice for a moment. The wolves say that they'll take care of you, but just how true was that. They seemed to bear animosity for Kalia, and probably all foxes.

And you knew the foxes seemed to be weaker and lower in status, you know that they would always be kind to you and you felt a powerful connection to Kalia; a bond that only a mother and child should share. In the end, the decision was clear.

"No," you say as dignified as you can with your small, high voice.

"What was that," Salas sneers. "Did you just say no?"

"I won't go with you," you said with a voice that was braver than you felt. "I'll stay with Kalia."

"Well, that's very nice for you and we'll respect your decision," the first wolf says. He turns to Salas and nods. Salas jumps from where he stood and gripped the scruff of Kalia's neck in his mouth. He bit down hard, causing blood to seep from a wound. He lifted her off of the ground and slammed her into a thick tree to his right. You started to run towards her but were stopped when the other wolf placed a paw on your back and pushed down.

You watched pitifully as Kalia was being thrashed, bit, and cut by Salas.

How extensive is her wounds?
1111221222222122111112122122.title: Staying With Mom

choices: When We Get To My Family
11112212222221221111121221221.content:
You watch for five minutes as Kalia is constantly bit, thrown, and thrashed by Salas. Finally Salas lifted her far above the ground and slammed her to a small boulder. You saw her right fore leg bend at an unnatural angle and a small splinter of a bone pierce through her skin from the inside. Kalia let out a small howl and blood began to fly from her open mouth. Salas gave out a cruel laugh and began to walk towards you. He stopped and gave you a serious look. "You have one week kid," he said. "If the life of a fox isn't what it's cracked up to be, you can come join us. Just give out two howls and we'll come and get you. But remember, only one week, and this is a one time deal."

Salas gave a nod and he and the other wolf ran off towards their den. After they had left, you ran up to your mother and began to nudge her awake. For a few minutes she remained dormant, but soon her eyes fluttered open and she quickly tried to stand up. She instantly fell back to her side and released another spurt of blood.

"Son, are you okay," Kalia asked concerned. "Did they hurt you? What happened to the wolves?"

"Mommy, I'm okay," you say quickly. You were oblivious that you called her mommy, but it did not go unnoticed by her as she flashed a small smile. "But they hurt you pretty bad. Will you be okay?"

"Yes, once I can set the bone I'll be fine." She stood up, minding to stay off of her right leg, and started to walk to the east. "Come on son." You bounded up to her and continued.

After a few hours of walking, you felt hunger beginning to claw at your stomach. You walk up closer to your mom and ask, "Mommy, when can we eat?"

She looks at you and says...
11112212222221221111121221221.title: A Wolf's Offer

choices: It Goes About As Well As Ot Can
The Foxes Outcast You And Kalia
111122122222212211111212212212.content:
"We'll get to eat when we get to my family, son," your mother says. You raise an eye at her; family?

"Family," you ask quizzically.

"Yes, we're going to my family at their home den. It's not too far; in fact, we can't be more than a few miles from them by now. You're going to love my parents, and I'm certain they're going to like you." She walks up to you and gives you a few loving licks. You giggle a little and pull away.

After the two of you had walked for another hour and a half, your sensitive ears picked up the sound of rushing water, and then the sound of a fox's yelp. "Come on son, we're almost there. We're just a quick walk away."

"Okay Mama," you tone. "What do I do when I see them? What am I supposed to say?"

"Just be yourself, okay. Introduce yourself politely and answer any questions they ask. After that, just try and blend in."

"Okay Mama." Then, a strange thought pops into your head. "Mama, what's my name?"

Your mother looks at you strangely, as if not expecting such a question. "Oh that's right, I haven't given you a name yet. How about Renji?"

You play the name in your head. Renji. "Yeah, I want my name to be Renji."

Your mother nodded and said, "Well then Renji, I guess it's time to go meet my family."

You and her walked for a few minutes before out of the corner of your eye you saw a blur of orange and black. Then two foxes leaped out from the trees and took on a defensive position. "Identify yourself," the first fox growled in a deep, baritone voice.

"Kaye, it's me, Kalia. Now let me through!"

"Who's the pup Kalia," the other fox asked. "You didn't go and get yourself knocked up again, did you? I heard that your mate fell over, dead. Mom warned you no good would come from mating with that scruffy mutt!"

"This is my son, Renji. Renji, this is my older brother Kaye," she said, gesturing to the first fox. "And this is my twin brother, Seralie." You gave the smallest of nods, acknowledging that you had understood without bringing too much attention to yourself.

"Well, hello Renji," Kaye says as he walks towards you. "You know, you remind me so much of your mother at your age. I bet your grandpa and grandma can't wait to meet you. Come on Kalia." The foxes abandon their defensive stances and began to lead you and Kalia through the fox encampment.

How does the meeting with Kalia's parents go.

How does
111122122222212211111212212212.title: When We Get To My Family

1111221222222122111112122122121.content:
Kaye and Seralie led you and your mother through the throng of trees to a large cavern, at least large to your small size. Inside you saw at least thirty adult foxes wrestling and talking to one another, and paired with the small fox kits running around, came to thirty-five foxes in total. All of the foxes instantly stopped what they were doing and gave odd looks at your mother. All around you foxes whispered, "Is that...", "Kalia the Outcast", and, "She has another son?" You simply suppressed a growl and continued to follow your mother.

You followed your mother to a separate cavern where an older female fox resided. The fox looked at Kalia and gave a small growl before she put on a straight face. "Kalia, what a surprise; although not truly unexpected. What happened; did that damn mutt finally decide to leave you for some bitch?"

"Mother," Kalia says sharply. The older fox gives her a hateful glare before she noticed you.

"Kalia, who is the little one," her mother asks. "Well, are you going to introduce yourself, little one?"

You felt nervous around her, but the loving tone she used with you made your previous anxiety melt away. "Hi, I'm Renji," you proclaim happily.

"I'm sorry," your mother interrupted, "but I had nowhere to go. We need shelter and food, and I didn't know who else to turn to."

"Whatever happened to that mate of yours who swore to help you?"

"He's dead," Kalia said, choking back a sob. "He and my other kits are dead. Died in a fire."

Kalia's mother's expression changed from a hateful look to that of sorrow. "I'm sorry; I shouldn't have brought it up. Now, what happened to your leg? It looks like you tried to give yourself a third joint."

Your mother spent the next twenty minutes recapping your story, with you adding commentary where you thought it was necessary. After she had finished, your grandmother nodded and said, "I don't know if I'm making the right decision here, but, I'll let you stay with us for as long as you wish. The only request I ask is that you pull your weight in the pack and help take care of the you ones."

Your mother ran up to her mother as best he could and embraced her in a loving nuzzle. "Oh, thank you mother. I promise I will not fail you."

"Be sure that you don't Kalia. Having you leave was bard enough the first time." Then she turns to you. "And as for you, little one; I'm sure the other kits would love to meet their new playmate."

You look at your mother. She gives you a smile that eggs you to go and play, but you have so many questions as to what your grandmother meant by talking about Kalia's mate. In the end, you...
1111221222222122111112122122121.title: As Well As It Can Go

11112212222221221111121221222.content: you are shocked as they killed your mom in front of you. as tears well up in your eyes the second wolf tries to comfort you but you are to sadden by the loss of your mother. then the second wolf picks you up and takes you back to the wolf's den
11112212222221221111121221222.title: They Kill Her

choices: You manage to lose the wolves...and get the deer
11112212222221221111121222.content:
The wolf keeps sniffing you. The other wolf is keeping his--no...it's a female--her eyes on Kalia, your adopted mother. Kalia is standing stock still, not even moving an eyelash. The wolf keeps sniffing you, circling you as it does so. What's gonna happen if the wolves recongize your scent? Will you be wolf chow, along with Kalia?

"When did you have your 'son', Kalia?" asked the female wolf. "you weren't pregnant the last time I saw you"

"It was a long winter, Salas" said Kalia, a little coldly.

"You had a pup in the winter?" asked Salas. "risky, Kalia. Very risky" There was a pause. "Well, Danel? Is it the boy from last night?"

That's when you finally recongize Danel and Salas. It was the Alpha Male and his mate! You stay silent as Danel stops sniffing you.

"No, it isn't him" said Danel. "The scent has grown cold overnight"

"We'll look elsewhere, then" said Salas. "and, Kalia...don't you believe that this leaves you off the hook yet. We smelled your scent over where the boy was last night"

"I saw no human" said Kalia. "if I did, wouldn't my stomach be bigger?"

"Perhaps" said Danel. "we'll leave you and your 'son' alone for now" With that, Salas and Danel left you and Kalia behind. You breathe a sigh of relief, but Kalia slaps you with her forelimb again and hisses for you to be quiet and follow her. You follow her along a faint path until you come to a small clearing.

"Damn those wolves" said Kalia. "they suspect something"

"What...?" you ask.

"Keep quiet" said Kalia. "we're being followed"

"By those two?" you whisper.

"No" said Kalia. "by other wolves of the same pack"

"What'll we do?" you whisper.

"We'll try to lose them" said Kalia. "come on, those deer are near"
11112212222221221111121222.title: Danel and Salas

choices: Trigger the trap and follow Kaila'splan.
Don't trigger the trap and do something to expose your identity.
111122122222212211111212221.content:
Both you and Kaila can smell it, the wolves are still following you.

"Continue to stay silent, and don't look back!" she whispers. "I won't be able to talk to you soon, so listen close and listen good! We're going to try and catch the deer but we won't be able to succeed under these conditions. My hypnotism doesn't work on them, and with the wolves watching us, we can't risk them finding out who you are."

The two deer come into sight, and the vixen pushes you into a bush to hide. She joins you in the bush.

"Here's what we're going to do! You and I are going to chase the deer like amateurs, and then you're going to injure yourself by stepping the bear trap placed about ten feet to the left. It was placed there five years ago by a stray hunter that mysteriously wound up here. No animal has been stupid enough to trip it, but you're my young son. Trust me, when you get hurt, your cry won't sound like it used to. It might be enough to fool them."

Kaila has you stay put for a couple minutes and watch the deer. She can't speak any more plans to you, as the wolves are within earshot.

"Le's go!" she states, pushing you out.

You and Kaila begin chasing the deer, who run at the sight of you. As you chase them, the bear trap gets closer and closer.
111122122222212211111212221.title: Kaila's Plan

choices: The two of you take down the two deer
You lost the scent of the two deer
1111221222222122111112122211.content:
You're a little less than thrilled to trip a bear trap...but you have to fool the wolves somehow. Kalia is ahead of you and not paying any attention to you as you get closer and closer to the bear trap. You actually see the trap before you trigger it. It's slightly rusty-looking and smells strongly of man (gee...did I smell THAT bad when I was human, you muse to yourself). Like Kalia said, you sprang the trap on yourself and you give out a sharp yelp that doesn't sound like a sound a human would make. The trap is clamped to your right hind paw...and is quite painful. Kalia turns around and rushes over to you. As she does so, you hear one of the wolves talking to the other...thier voices much to low for you to make out clearly. Kalia makes it over to you and pretends to yell at you for being such a foolish pup. You go into the act. You hear a low chuckle from one of the wolves, and then you hear the two wolves run off.

"I think we did it" said Kalia. "that fooled 'em"

"Would you take this trap off of me?" you ask.

"Huh? Oh..sure" said Kalia, who waved her paws at the trap and the trap instantly releases you. You just stare at Kalia, who gives you a toothy grin.

"My mother happened to be a kitsune" said Kalia. "I inherited some of her magic"

"A kitsune?" you ask.

"You know, a nine-tail fox" said Kalia. "A fox with magical powers. A kitsune can even take the form of a human"

"Really?" you ask. Kalia nods. Then you clearly hear Kalia's stomach growl.

"Now, let's get that breakfast I promised you" said Kalia. "you'll love it when you get that deer into your belly"
1111221222222122111112122211.title: That did the trick

11112212222221221112.content:
The vixen decides that she doesn't really feel like working her jaws too much, and it would be a lot easier just to eat you piece by piece. Not to mention, it's a lot easier for a stomach to digest bits and pieces rather than huge chunks.

The fox licks your tummy and chest a bit, resulting a small giggle from you. The fox doesn't seem to mind the laughing, otherwise she would've silenced you already. Once done, she tells you to remain very still and not to move or make a single sound. She immediately extends a claw and places it just below your neck. She applies enough pressure to break the skin and gently moves downwards, slicing open your belly and revealing your innards. She lifts the flaps over the edges. She was so precise that you felt little to no pain at all.

The vixen licks her chomps again and lets you know that you're going to be eaten now, and it might start getting a little messy. Now she must decide whether to start with your insides or the tasty flesh?
11112212222221221112.title: A More Natural Meal

111122122222212211121.content:
Since your innards have already been exposed she might as well start there. The fox sticks her snout into your belly, grabbing hold of the intestine. She then proceeds to pull the long organ out. As the organ is ripped out the fox gulps it down.

Blood oozes out as the long intestines are removed. Once it is gone the fox moves to your liver, ripping a large chuck out with her sharp teeth. You can hear a juicy munching and the fox continues to bite into your soft flesh.
111122122222212211121.title: Since we've started...

1111221222222122111211.content:
The fox bites into you liver one last time, tearing the rest of it free. But then you hear a faint noise... the fox stops and pricks its ears up.

It seems something else wants your tender flesh as well...
1111221222222122111211.title: Company?

11112212222221221112112.content: Its not a wolf, what could it be?
11112212222221221112112.title: Nope, Not a wolf!

choices: The fox moves on to the flesh.
The fox kills you and eats the vitals.
1111221222222122111212.content: The fox digs into your body once again and grabs the rest of the liver, munching on it and swallowing. As the fox begins eating your organs, you realize that it doesn't hurt. Instead, you just feel like you are being emptied out, which you are. The vixen reaches in and beings taking pieces of your stomach, munching on each piece happily, followed by the swallowing out the chewed up meat. The fox continues eating away at your inner organs until all that remains is your heart and lungs.
1111221222222122111212.title: The Meal Continues

choices: The vixen goes for your throat, killing you.
Keeps you alive a little longer as she goes for your heart and lungs.
11112212222221221112121.content:
The fox decided she would keep you around awhile longer as in your hypnotic stupor, you where posing no resistance so there was no point in killing you. She raised her muzzle out of your hallow chest for a moment and licked some stray streams of blood off your skin trailing her tongue down south and past your groin without so much of a care for your own pleasure until she reached your thigh which she began to gnaw on. The sloppy noise of meat being chewed and swallowed could be heard from below until a final loud tear caught your ears as she ripped your leg away from your body. She dropped the removed limb onto the forest floor and began to remove it of any meet with big bites until all that was left was some stringy tendons and bone.

She fixed you in another glance, keeping your nerves, which where beginning to come back, calm before moving onto your next leg, repeating the process. Before too long, you felt her strong teeth and muzzle licking and enveloping your left upper arm before crunching down on it, snapping the bone and removing the limb from your body leaving you now with only your right arm which remained limp and useless to your side, your hypnotised mind giving off no desire to save yourself. It wasn't long before this limb too was removed.
11112212222221221112121.title: Bye Bye Limbs

choices: You wake up in the forest. It was a dream.
111122122222212211121211.content:
The vixen then lets you regain your free will. Though it's not as if it could help you. You realize your limbs are gone, your torso is now mostly a hollow vessel. Pain engulfs your world as your mind finally acknowledges your situation.

You try to scream out in pain, but as you open your mouth you feel something grip your throat. You gag, unable to breath. You panic, trying to think of what to do. But a second later your throat is ripped out. What little blood you have left pours out of the gaping wound. You gag one more time, then shut your eyes forever.

The vixen swallows your throat. It then moves back to your torso, and to your vital organs. It tears out the lungs, and gulfs it down bit by bit. The vixen then grabs your heart, bitting into it to make the blood squirt out. Before long the tasty organ is devoured.

The vixen then attacks whatever remaining flesh still hangs from your torso. It greedily rips off the flesh and eats it all. Once your bones have been cleaned the vixen moves to your head. It breaks off your skull, and then pulls out your brain from the bottom of the skull. The spongy delicacy is removed. The vixen waits a second to savior the moment, then bites into the organ.
111122122222212211121211.title: Finished meal

1111221222222122111212111.content:
You wake up screaming. You're alive, and in the forest, still. A dream, you thought. All a dream. Or was it? About three feet away, some clothes, bones, and blood, plus a heaping pile of excrement lay scattered on the forest ground.

You get a closer look at the clothes and realize they are your clothes, and it was not a dream....you DID get eaten, and the excrement, was what was left of you.

You put back on your clothes, wondering what to do next. As you are putting on your shoes, a sinister voice says,

"I see my experiment worked perfectly..."

The source of the sinister voice pads into the clearing...It is....
1111221222222122111212111.title: It was a dream! Or was it?

choices: She takes you to her den.
111122122222212212.content: She continues approaching you while you remain motionless.
111122122222212212.title: The Fox Approaches

choices: She invites someone to join in.
1111221222222122121.content: The fox lay down on her stomach and looks at you, her eyes telling you to get on. You obediently do so and she stands back up. She begins running as far as she can around the maintside to try and get out of the wolf territory. She finally arrives at a hole in the ground that leads under the side of the mountain. She takes you inside and gently sets you down and rips all of your clothes from your body, preparing for the feast.
1111221222222122121.title: To Her Den

11112212222221221212.content: Who does she call for?
11112212222221221212.title: The Call

111122122222212212121.content:
A proud male fox enters the den. The two foxes exchange a loving glance, and then your hear their stomachs rumble.

They gaze at your defenseless flesh eager to begin...
111122122222212212121.title: Lover's meal

choices: The young foxes begin to messily eat you.
A wolf shows up to save you.
111122122222212212122.content:
The fox calls out something in her animalistic language, and soon four young foxes come out of nowhere and surround you. They all look towards there mother, who nods her head, and then back at you. They get into a playful pose and stick their rears in the air, wagging their tails happily.

You hear all of the little stomachs growl, but you don't move. The vixen seems to have ordered you to remain completely moitionless on your belly while the young foxes gorge themselves on your flesh.
111122122222212212122.title: Kit Food

choices: The meal continues in a detailed description.
You break free from the spell.
1111221222222122121221.content:
The first of the young foxes comes over and sniffs your leg, eventually reaching the area of your lower leg. The fox opens its mouth and clamps down hard, sending a large amount of pain up your spinal cord to your brain. The young fox tries desperately to tear the chunk of flesh away, and continues to slowly rip it until it comes loose. The young foxes have just recently had their teeth grow in enough to eat solid food.

As this happens, you want to cry out in pain but don't. The adult vixen's spell seems to have you immobilized in that aspect as well. In fact, you actually enjoy the pain in this state. The young fox finishes munching on the meat and swallows. As it prepares to take the next bite, you feel three more cold noses run across various parts of your skin.

The cold feelings are soon replaced with with pain as as the remaining foxes bite down hard on your right arm, your butt, and your left shoulder. They too struggle to remove the flesh and devour it. The mother gets pas over to your face to make sure you are still under her spell. After confirming it, she begins to run her tongue all over your body. You notice a strange tingling sensation as she does this. One of the foxes, the one eating at your rump, moves over to a part of your other leg that she licked and bites into it. The adult fox has made your flesh much softer and easier for her children to break through.
1111221222222122121221.title: Meal for the Kits

choices: You wake up back outside at the point before you even met the vixen.
11112212222221221212211.content:
The vixen has finished softening up your body for her children. Once again she pads over to your body, and this time notices that you are slowly being set free from her spell. She lay down infront of you and stares into your eyes until you're back in a fully hypnotized state. You swear you hear a voice telling you to relax and be a good little morsel. You slowly shut your eyes, the spell seemingly putting you to sleep, and the vixen licks you right across the eyelids. Suddenly you can no longer open them, but your still alive and well for the moment. For some reason, the only thought running through your mind is to let the young foxes eat your flesh and digest it.

Meanwhile, during the time, one of the foxes had reduced your leg to nothing but bone, resulting in a complete loss of feeling. Its gut has extended quite a bit, but it's far from full. The other fox is still feasting on your other leg. The young fox then begins to eat your rump like the previous fox had done. At the same time, another fox has finished up your right arm and has begun to tear all traces of flesh from your hand. The one at your shoulder had completely devours it and is now feasting upon your other arm.

Once your arms and legs have been reduced to bone, the vixen nudges your body until she pushes you onto your back. She carefully extends a claw and slices upon your belly. Instantly, the four foxes dig their heads in and begin eating away at your insides. One of them slurps up your intestines like a strand of spaghetti. They come to your faintly beating heart and the adult vixen grabs it with her teeth, pulling it free from your body. You're truly dead now, and the vixen swallows your heart. As three of the young foxes finish up the rest of your body, the adult notices that one of her children is being left out of the remaining feast. She grabs your head and bangs it against the ground until the skull is cracked open. When the brains flow out, the young fox wags its tail happily and eats away. Soon your body is nothing but a skeleton.
11112212222221221212211.title: Eaten By Foxes

choices: You wake up back where you first met the vixen. It was all a nightmare!
111122122222212212122111.content:
The bellies of the foxes gurgle as they digest all of that meat. Their stomachs churn violently as they now rest on their bloated bellies. While the children sleep, the mom takes your bones outside of the den and digs a large hole. She tosses them inside, but only buries them halfway.

Nearly an entire day passes and the young foxes have have nearly finished digesting you completely. Their bellies have become flatter, but they put on more than enough weight to help them last for at least a week. They begin to sniff around outside of the cave when the vixn points her head in the direction of the hole where your bones lay.

They all surround the large hole and squat down over it. Large brown logs deficate from the opening until they plop into the hole. It takes each fox a mimimum of ten minutes to completely remove your undigested remains from their bodies entirely. As the children leave, the vixen pads her way over and repeats the process, but releasing a much smaller load. She then drops a mouthful of seeds into the hole and buries the waste. She walks back inside the den and is pleased that your sacrifice helped keep her babies alive for at least another week.
111122122222212212122111.title: An ending? Oh shit...

1111221222222122121221111.content:
You wake up sweating bullets, panting heavily. It's completely dark outside, and the only thought running through your mind is what you had just dreamt about.

"It...felt so...real!" you gasp.

You take several deep breaths until you calm down. Perhaps that dream was meant to tell you something. Maybe you should go back to the wolves!
1111221222222122121221111.title: Waking Up From the Nightmare

choices: Have to cut open the fox
11112212222221221212211111.content:
While you are thinking this the fox appears out of the brush. (Well it couldn't really hide behind one) You run between all four of its legs straight back toward the wolves' den. You turn around to see the fox running after you ("after" won't be an adequate word to describe it in a second). You run as fast as you can. You look back again, it can almost grab your collar with its mouth. You trip over a root! Right as you hit the ground you pull your limbs up into your body and brace for impact.

All you hear is a loud cry from the fox. You nervously look behind you to see a, rather large, wolf and the fox fighting. You guess as you tripped over the root the wolf jumped onto the fox (attacking basically would be another word for it). You sit up and watch the fight go on. It becomes pretty interesting. You feel a light-headed feeling in the back of your neck. You then feel like you're being lifted off the ground.

It's the alpha female picking you up. She turns around and takes a step, turns her head all the way around to look at her mate, then trots off toward the cave. You can hear the alpha male and fox fighting get faint as you get closer to their den. When you arrive, the female places you in front of the pedestal in the middle of the largest room. She looked like she was in a hurry. She quickly turned around, and was apparently too close, because when she did her tail fur knocked you off your feet to your left. She turned back around and growled at you, you quickly got back up and stood in front of the pedestal.

As she is about to leave the hole in which you came in she suddenly stops and moves to the edge of it, allowing the alpha male to come in, with the fox's corpse dragging from its mouth. The alpha male limps over close to you to put the fox on the pedestal. When he sees you he immediately drops his hold of the fox and turns around and growls at the alpha female. She growls back communicatively. The male then turns back around and growls at you, you run to your right a little and the male lifts the fox onto the pedestal. The male then turns to you growls, and motions back toward the pedestal. You walk to the middle of the pedestal again.

The male seems satisfied and turns around and walks to the cave opening. He howls a bit and after about 30 seconds the whole pack was in the cave, surrounding you, the pedestal, and the fox corpse.

The wolf growls at you, then nudging you and you fall onto its nose. The alpha male lifts you up and puts you on the pedestal, you...
11112212222221221212211111.title: Go back to the wolves.

choices: The wolves notice you aren't eating
You keep eating out of fear, and you're starving!
111122122222212212122111111.content:
The alpha male reaches over you and cuts the fox open, allowing the innards to spill out in front of you. The wolf looks at you almost happilly. You can see the scars on his face from the fight.

You poke the innards to stall from having to eat this. The huge wolves surrounding you growl out of impatience. You become very scared, so you take a huge bite out of it. It is absolutely the worst thing you've ever tasted.

The other wolves immediatley join in. You feel the muzzle of the alpha pair on both sides
111122122222212212122111111.title: *poke*

1111221222222122121221111111.content:
After the first bit you rip it off the intestine and swallow as fast as possible. You become sad as you do not want to eat anymore. Then the alpha male to your right rips a piece out, spraying you with blood. You turn around and squeeze out from in between the alpha pair's muzzles, walk a few steps, tears building every second, until you fall on your face sobbing your eyes out. Even though you were just accepted into their pack by letting you have the first bite, you feel separate from them.

The way it affected you emotionally is because you've been around them for so long, and they've taken care of you, that you feel a part of the family. Your mind is forcing you to think you aren't a part of them, making it seem like you aren't a part of your family. You feel unwanted. As you are crying the alpha female stops her eating and looks at you. She nudges you sympathetically. You turn your head away from her toward the alpha male. The alpha female whines a little and taps you with her paw. You roll over and sigh.
1111221222222122121221111111.title: Not the one...

choices: They make you sleep in the far corner
You get to sleep in between the alpha pair
1111221222222122121221111112.content:
You continue eating, just in case they think it's rude if you don't eat when they allow you to eat first, or take a bite first... The alpha pair's muzzles are on both sides of you, the male on the right and the female on the left. They aren't giving you any room, they're muzzles are touching you no matter how much you pull your shoulders in. You have some close calls while holding the meat down with your hands with the alpha male on your right, he almost bit your arm off a few times now. (by accident) You even rub up against his teeth every now and then.

Every time you do he growls at you. You try to scoot away from him closer toward the female but they're too close together, not giving you any room to move. After about an hour most of the fox is gone. All of you are stuffed, you have some blood on your face from the alpha male tearing some meat off. All the wolves seem to disperse to the recess part of the den. You get up and look over the edge of the pedestal, it's a long way down. The alpha female walks from the center of the main room to the pedestal and puts her muzzle up against it.

You climb on and she puts you on the ground. She walks away sleepily. You become kind of tired yourself seeing all the others. You walk to the center, not knowing where to go. You hear an echoing growl, you look where you think it came from. It came from the alpha pair balcony. The alpha male invited you to their sleeping quarters for the night. You find your way to the stairs and slowly climb up. When you reach the top it's nicely decorated... for a wolves' den. You look around a corner going deeper into the den. It's gotten pretty cold already. You see the alpha pair lying in bed.
1111221222222122121221111112.title: A night with luxury

choices: You wake up still on the furs
You wake up in the middle of the main entrance to the den
11112212222221221212211111121.content:
You just stand there and wait for a signal on where to go. You see the alpha female motion toward their bed. Then turn back toward the alpha male. You take that as a signal you're sleeping with them. You walk closer to their bed. You stop when they both growl at you. The alpha pair both motioned you toward a corner in the back at the same time. You exhale sharply then walk over to the bed... of furs.

You lie down on it and look around. It's pretty dark. All you can see is the alpha pair starting to lie down to go to sleep. This reminds you what you would have done at home. As a matter of fact, as you look, you can't remember anything about your home. Not how your room looked, not how the yard looked, not the street, not even your parents do you remember. This makes you start to cry. Not a huge rain of tears but a sniffle here and a tear or two there. You just lie down and try to fall asleep.

You remember imagining something like this when you were trying to go to sleep in your bed at home, you just don't remember what anything looked like. You remembered being accepted instantly into the pack, rising through the ranks to the leader. This wasn't happening here. You made some mistakes early on. You hope it starts going uphill from here.
11112212222221221212211111121.title: The cold damp corner

11112212222221221212211112.content: You lie there still recovering from the nightmare. You hear the snapping of twigs and see a fox. Should you remember the lesson of your dream and run for it? Then again it was just a dream and dreams don't mean anything.
11112212222221221212211112.title: Da ja vu?

111122122222212212122111121.content:
"Wh-What if that dream was right?" you ask yourself. "I could really be eaten!"

WIth this thought in mind, you instantly run away. You're not willing to take a chance at something like this. The dream felt too real to be just that. You keep running until you bump into a tree, falling backwards from the force. You hear the sound of twigs snapping and look up. Standing above you now is a...
111122122222212212122111121.title: Not Again! Run Away

1111221222222122121221111212.content:
You look up in a daze. At a giant fox not even looking at you. You look forward to see the "tree" that you ran into was actually its leg. You remember your dream and carefully get up to run, you put your hand on a twig, causing it to snap. The fox looks down and sees you. It immediately (as in you don't know what's coming) pushes its paw forward knocking you to the ground, on your back. The fox is at least 2 and 1/2 times as tall as you, but it seems like a young cub. (or kit, whatever you call them) You get up, turn around and take one step and are immediately grabbed by the collar of your shirt by the fox.

It's an incredibly smooth ride. Until you feel like you're being thrown into the air. You land on the fox's chest. Looking up you see a wolf jumping onto the fox. You're trapped between these two giant furry... soft... everything starts to get fuzzy (no pun intended) and you wake up on the dirt. Your hair is messed up and feels weird, which causes you to stand up, turn around and try to fix it. As you do you can hear growling in the distance. A little bit of rumbling comes near as you manage to get some parts of your hair to heel (like a dog, obey or something). The only thing you feel next is a furry mass of pain.

You get back up with a slight headache. You look at them roll away and you start to run in the direction you think is the way to the den. When you start running you feel really light headed and uncoordinated. You find an opening and run inside it screaming "I'm back!" numerous giant eyes turn toward you. You look around, things look different. A pair of the eyes comes out of the shadows, it's a fox! The fox growls a long one. You run outside of the cave as fast as you can.

(switching to the point of view of the fox that growled) You growl at the other foxes communicatively saying "I guess he doesn't like nachos."

(back to your point of view) Anyhoo,You stop and look back. They're nowhere to be found. You sit near a tree and think. You hear vibrating. Trees start falling over all around you. You look up to see the wolf and the fox still rolling around fighting. You wait till the last minute and jump out of the way. Hitting your head on a nearby tree. You wake up to see...
1111221222222122121221111212.title: The more you run over a cat, the flatter it gets

choices: The wolf kills the child for wasting time.
1111221222222122121222.content:
Just as the young fox bite down into your skin, you accidently let out a sharp cry of pain. You're still under the spell, but the pain is too much. Suddenly a large wolf bursts into the den and swats the young foxes away. In a rage, the vixen charges at the wolf and surprisingly knocks it back. Though the wolf is superior in size and strength, the vixen won't let anyone get away with hurting her children and/or disturbing their meal.

The wolf notices that it has landed next to one of the young foxes and lifts it up in its teeth. In a language you can't understand, the wolf makes a proposition to the fox. If they eat you, the wolves get to eat her or her children after. And, if even one more of the foxes bite you during this time, the wolf will kill the child its holding.

The vixen hesitates on what to do. If she lets you go, she'll never find enough food for all of her young ones. However, if she doesn't, somebody will die anyway. The wolf begins to grow impantient as she decides.
1111221222222122121222.title: No Food for the Kids

1111221222222122122.content: All of the sudden, something jumped out of nowhere. When you got a closer look, it was...

11112212222221221222.content: Another human had come to save you from the fox he had a bow and arrow so you thought it was an indian. You couldn't tell, but then you got a clearer picture. It was your thogut to be dead brother, John. He was alive. "Are you alright Will?" your brother says. "I'm alright, but how are you still alive?" you ask. He says, "I ended up in the same situation you were in. A wolf found me took me to its pack and then I ran when they weren't feeding me. That fox tried to eat mae and luckily I escaped. Ever since then I've been living up here, too afraid to try to get of the mountain, fearing the wolves would catch me if I tried. And now it' has happened to you. I didn't realize it was you at first because I can't remember anything about our past except for my name and your name now." "I can't remember anything besides my name and your name before the wolf finding me etheir," you reply, "So what do we do now John." "We should get to my cave that I used for shelter, there's a storm coming," John says. You soon make it to the cave, he starts a fire and cooks some meat for you and him. You soon start conversating about his survival and what you know about the wolves.
11112212222221221222.title: Another Human!

choices: What? It's not over. Add somthing!!!!
111122122222212212221.content:
As the sun rises over the forest, you and your brother john yawned as you both got up. "Morning, bro." you said lazily, "Mornin'." your brother got to his feet and looked around. "I don't see any wolves or foxes, so we're safe for now." you breathe a sigh of relief, glad those wolves have stopped following you. You were not about to be killed by a bunch of oversized nature lovers. You and your brother walk along the forest trail, the trees rusling in the wind. Your brother turns to you, "Will, I wanted to give you something before you went on that field trip, but i didn't get the chance." You look at your brother, tall and caramel skined. You always made fun of him and called him indian cause he had the skin of one, but you loved him and looked up to him like any little brother would. "What is it?" you say with interest. John walks to one of the trees in the forest with a hole big enough to fit a sword in there, and thats what was in there. John pulled out a huge silver sword that had the style of dante's sword from Devil may cry. Your eyes widen in surprise, "Where did you get this?" you gasped. John smiles, "I knew you'd like it, after i saw you on your laptop downloading pictures of different swords that you liked, I used my birthday money to buy you one. Tears were swelling up in your eyes, your big brother got you a present that you always wanted. you always begged you parents to get you a cool sword, but they always said no cause "It's to dangerours, you might hurt your self." But you tell them that you've been studying how to fight with a sword, but no, no sword for you. "Why can't you just like video games like your brother?" your mom always said to you. "I'm not about to put my only two sons in danger just over a silly sword." your father nagged you. After a while, you gave up on the sword, knowing you's never get it, until now....
"T-thanks, john." you sniffed, you gave you brother a hug, he did the same. "Your welcome, Will." As soon as you two separated you were about to go back to the cave....

When it happened!

Five wolves jumped out of the bushes, circling you and john, growling. John tossed you the sword and got his bow ready. He shot one wolf in the heart with one arrow, the wolf yelp and collapsed, dead, "Good shot!" you said while deflcting a wolfs claw who tried to scratch you with it. "Thanks." John panted. You ducked and rolled out of the way as a wolf lunged at you. John smacked a wolf in the muzzle with his bow, it yelped, backed away, and grabbed its muzzle, whimpering. You sliced one wolfs chest, leaving a huge gash. It growled and came after you. You held you sword uo in defense, but it pinned you down. You heard a voice in you head, 'Were not going to hurt you! Stop fighting and come with us!' You looked up to see the wolf wasnt attacking you. A pain swelled up in your chest, it was that wolf you saw in the forest who kiddnapped you! You got kiddnapped once, but not again! you yelled at the top of you lungs "NEVER!!!!!!" and pushed the wolf off with an unknow strength. Then you heard a scream, you looked over to you brother to see that he is getting eaten by the wolf he attacked!
The other wolves looked at him in shock. One wolf said "Salas! you werent supposed to eat the humans brother!" the wolf just grinned and said, "Heh, it was worth it, that human is the one we're after anyway." he chuckled, refering to you. "JOHN!!!!" you screamed, furious, and lunged at the wolf. The wolf yelped in surprise and looked back at you before you hacked and slashed the wolfs face, "YOU MONSTER!! *SMACK* YOU ATE MY BROTHER!!! *SLASH* I'LL KILL YOU!!! *TWO SMACKS* SPIT *SLASH* HIM *SLASH* OUT!!!!!! *STOMP*" was the last thing you did on the wolfs stomach before he coughed up your brother. With one final slash you cut the wolfs head off.

......Silence.......

Was all you heard. The wolves were trembling at the other wolfs head, which was staring back at them, eyes widen in shock. "T-t-that human just killed Salas!!!" one wolf shouted in shock. The other wolves just stared at you, panting, soaked in the wolfs blood, hands trembling, a crazy look in you eyes. Slowly, you walked over to your saliva soaked brother, who was shivering from the cool air on his slimey body. You took him in you arms, "W-will...." he said weakily. You laid him on the ground, tears in your eyes, "I-i-i-im sorry john.....I let you get eaten." your brother smiled weakily, "No.....It was i who failed you......I slipped.....I-i-i-i.......love you little brother. But......remember this.....only.....use....the.....sword......for you......and t-the.......ones......you......love......." Is the last thing he said before his body went limp. The wolves all looked at you with sorrow eyes. One wolf trotted over to you, "I-is he dead?" You glare at the wolf, causing her to back away, whimpering. "You, YOU MONSTERS!!!! YOU KILLED MY BROTHER!!! OF COURSE HE'S DEAD!! WHY WOULDN'T HE BE?! IT'S YOUR FAULT HE'S DEAD!!!!" you point your sword at the wolves, "If I ever see you trying to kill me, humans, or any innocent creature.........I'LL KILL YOU!!!!" and with that, they all ran off, leaving you to mourn over you brothers dead body.









...........Life is a crule......crule thing to go through......but somehow........we manage........to survive.........and so will you..................William Jones..........

The vixen looks around as if she's looking for something important, then notices you.

"Uh...hi!" you say in a hesitant voice, still entranced by her beauty.

The vixen stares into your eyes and appears to be deep in thought. She seems to find you a very interesting specimen indeed, something not usually found in the forest. Yes, it's been decided...

111122122222212222.content:
The vixen continues to stare into your eyes. As you stare back, you become more and more entranced by her beauty. The fox seems to send you a telepathic message.

"You are not a human! You are a fox!" she states. "And you belong solely to me, now and forever! You are my property!"

As if in a trance you repeat, changing "you" to "I".

"I am not a human! I am a fox!" you repeat. "And I belong solely to you, now and forever! I am your property!"

The vixen nods its head and releases you from your trance. However, the vixen's spell seems to have altered your mind. You truly believe you are a fox. In addtion, you can now understand the enchanting fox.

"Come with me, my chosen mate!" she orders.
111122122222212222.title: Chosen

1111221222222122222.content:
As you follow the vixen to wherever she plans on taking you, you both hear something approaching you at a quick pace. A wolf suddenly appears on the scene. It examines the situation carefully and lets out a deep growl.

"Back off!" the vixen exclaims. "He's mine now! He's going to be a fox the rest of his life, whether you like it or not, and there's nothing he can do about it! I own him! He's my mate!"

The wolf growls even louder, as if it's about to kill. The vixen immediately shoves you behind her.

"You want him? Try and take him!" the vixen dares.

The wolf gives another growl as it makes eye contact with you. The wolf can tell just by looking in your eyes, you truly don't remember being human. The wolf heaves a defeated sigh and turns its back.

"You better do what ever you plan to with him while you still can," the wolf warns. "Once the leader finds out about this, you, and likely every other fox in this area, are going to get a real close-up view of how dangerous we wolves are."

With that the wolf runs off. The wolf obviously has no intention of letting harm come to you, but the fox is another story. The vixen turns to you and nudges, causing you to begin walking again.

112212121222222111.content:
You watch in horror as what's left of your sister makes a noticeable bulge as it travels down the wolf's throat. She smiles and licks her lips hungrily before looking directing attention toward you .
"Well, well, my compliments to the chef, your sister was such a... delectable appetizer".
She pounces on you, knocking you to the ground. She stands up, her paws front paws on your chest, holding you down. She looks you right in the eyes and licks her lips slowly, taunting you and reveling in your terror.
"Soon as my stomach settles, I'll move on to the main course. Until them, you'll have a minute or two more outside of my stomach, 'Supper', Any last words?"
You stare back at her unbelieving, the gurgles of her as it digests your little sister amplified in your mind. Finally, you break down. Tears stream down your face as you ask her why she's doing this. She just laughs.
"I'm a wolf, a carnivore; I eat meat. You're meat, which means I eat you. Circle of delicious life; simple, really".
She bends down and licks your teary face.
"Mmm, salty, I do love the taste of tears, really- Uuuurrrrrpppphh
A belch interrupts her monologue and blast your face with the smell of partially digested meat. You try not to think to hard about it.
"Heh, seems your sister's about done. Time to start on the main course."
She opens her mouth wide, giving you a view of her teeth and pulsing throat. Then just as your mind has finished processing this, the world goes dark as she swallows your head far more quickly then seems possible. One moment, there was teeth, the next, everything was black. You can feel her tongue on your chest, licking you and taking in your flavor. Appreciative 'mm's vibrate around you. Then, she swallows, and repeats the process on your stomach. The next swallow squeezes your head into a tiny, smelly compartment that must be your stomach. Undigested bit of meat and clothing cling to your skin and you start to struggle. Your arms are pinned to your side by the wolf's throat, so you squirm and kick. It doesn't seem to be making much of a difference, though, since the wolf just continues to take her time and savor your taste. Each swallow bringing more and more of you into her stomach, which expands to fit. After what seems like an eternity you heel her tongue lapping at your toes. This mouthful seems to take the longest, maybe she's putting off the end, maybe it's your imagination, but eventually your feet make their way down her throat to join the rest of you. You take the opportunity to kick at the stomach wall, and are rewarded with the sound of muffled laughter, which reverberates around you as the stomach fills with acids. The end comes far too slowly.

Outside, the wolf stretches and lets out a contented sigh. She loves it when they struggle. She lets out a soft belch, and curls up on the cave floor. Eventually, once the struggles cease and there's nothing left of her meal to really enjoy, she falls asleep and lets her stomach finish its job.

11221222.content: The wolf has sunk her teeth into your shoulder, just below your neck. You can feel the warm blood running down your chest and soaking your already torn shirt. The wolf pulls back away, and you can tell she's reached bone. Skin tears as she steps back, blood- your blood staining her muzzle. As she swallows the chunk of flesh in her mouth, you can see the same intelligent look in her eyes that was present when she first saw you. Your arm hangs limply at your side. The wolf licks her muzzle, and you notice her sharp teeth, the white now mottled with pink from your blood. You also notice thick strands of saliva, running down into the bottom of her mouth. There's no mistake- for as intelligent as she seems, this is an animal, a predator. You see that now. This could be your only chance to make it out.
11221222.title: She bites into you, tearing the skin.

112212222.content: You scramble to your feet, using your good arm to get up. The wolf makes no move yet to stop you. You run for the entrance of the den, and then out, into the forest. At first you think the wolf isn't chasing you, but then you hear her. Her powerful feet hit the ground in time with your own heartbeat, and looking toward the sound you can see the grey fur of the wolf. She is just behind and to the side of you, and you can't help but think she is toying with you. You are still stuffed from earlier, and you lost no small amount of blood. She is keeping pace with you easily, and you have no doubt she could catch you if she just went for it.
112212222.title: Run away.

1122122221.content: You know in your heart that you cannot escape. You keep running anyway, hoping to at least feel like you didn't give up. You don't have to keep going for too long, however. You are in bad condition, and you falter. You stumble and lose speed, and the wolf takes her chance. She leaps out at you diagonally, pushing you to the ground and straddling your prone form. You look up into her eyes, and you can no longer tell what it is you see in them. You can smell the wolf's fur again as she lowers her head to you.
1122122221.title: The wolf catches you.

11221222211.content: The wolf noses your shirt out of the way. The damaged fabric gives easily, and soon your chest and belly are bare, the shredded remnants of your shirt pinned beneath your back. You put up a final struggle, trying to wiggle your way free, but it is no use. The wolf leans down and bites into the soft skin of your belly. She is almost dainty now, a sharp contrast from the wild hunger you saw when she bit your shoulder. She pulls her head back and away, but stays standing in the same place. You see your flesh stretch out in her mouth and tear away from your body. The agony is incredible, but you cannot look away. The wolf swallows the chuck of you that is in her mouth, then she leans down and takes another. She has reached your organs now, and when she punctures your stomach, you can see meat that is not your own spilling out. It is the same meat that she fed you earlier, and you realize that even when she seemed to be helping you, she was really only serving herself. You cannot bring yourself to hate her for it, however. This forest is her place to hunt, and by being here, you are made her prey. As she takes another bite, you noticed the world has grown dark. The only thing left is you and the wolf. Even the pain of being eaten had begun to dull, making the scene seem far away, as if happening to someone else, as if you are only a fascinated onlooker. She takes another bite, tearing out your small intestine. She cannot eat it all at once though, and part of it falls from her mouth, landing on your bloodied chest. Your body is in ruins. You cannot move, and you can barely breath. She takes another bite. With this one comes much of the skin from your chest, allowing to see your own ribs. You can no longer hear or feel anything clearly. Sight is the only sense that works, and even that is fading. The wolf places her nose in the cavity in your belly, searching around for something she likes before biting again. This time, she punctures a lung. Your breathing grows shallow, and your vision swims. You can no longer see yourself, only an indistinct shape that must be the wolf. As the shape looks closer for the final time, you take several quick, desperate breaths, and then everything grows dark.
11221222211.title: She eats you. (Ending)

112212222111.content: A wolf stands above her prey. She raises her head to scent the wind, and leaves, trotting away from the unrecognizable carcass. It will soon be reclaimed by the earth, and the wolf had no more need of it. She returns to her den and quickly falls asleep. Winter will be coming soon, and the hunting will get harder. For now though, this wolf is safe and full, ready to face whatever challenge next comes her way.
112212222111.title: Epilogue

Trying to regain your breath as the makeshift collar is much too tight, you fail to notice that the wolf female has walked around you until you suddenly feel her paw holding your left leg down and her jaws closes around your ankle, biting down painfully but quick, and you hear a snap as the bone breaks. Well, it seems like you won't be running anywhere, escape is out of the question now, and you whimper lowly in pain. The female ignores it and instead starts to undress you with her teeth and claws, not being overly careful as you get some cuts along the way, but finally you're completely undressed save for the collar, and she seems happy as she looks you over, pacing in a circle around you. When you try to sit up she growls in warning, and obediently you lie down again on your stomach and watches her carefully, trying to guess what she's thinking.

For a while she ignores you and seems to watch the exit of the cave, but as noone appears she turns back and looks over you for a few moment, before flipping you over onto your back with a paw and grinning down at you. You gulp loudly, wondering if she's changed her mind about not eating you, but you have no reason to fear. She is merely tired and plans to rest until her mate returns with food... and you're looking like the perfect pillow for that. Yawning widely, showing you all of her white and sharp teeth, she pokes your stomach for a couple of times, before she lies down and nearly smothers you. Given that the wolf is large, larger than you, it feels like all of the air is pressed out of you but when you try to wriggle into a more comfortable position and catch your breath again, she looks down and gives you another warning growl. The message is clear, you're to lie still and be comfortable for her, and after a while she lowers her head and buries you completely underneath her body.

You do not know how long she lies and sleeps on you, but every breath feels pained and your ribcage is pressed down under her weight, hence it feels like an eternity and you can't relax at all. Suddenly, though, she raises her head and perks up her ears as she seems to listen to something outside the den, giving you a chance to see the light again and breathe without inhaling her fur. It seems to be someone outside the cave, and the female gets up from you to see if it's an unwelcome visitor. Lying still on the ground and desperately trying to get some air without your bruised ribcage giving you too much pain, you can't see the outside of the exit, but as she sits back and grins you know that it's someone she knows, and hopes that she'll forget about you for a while.

While you're at least right in the female not feeling like using you as a pillow any more, it is in no way time to relax yet. Three wolf pups enter the den, growling and chasing each other playfully, but they stop as soon as they see you. Looking back to their mother, one of them growl something that sounds like a question, and as she grins and seems to nod you know you're in trouble. The pups want to play with their new pet, and they're known to play it rough. One of them pounces on you happily, digging his claws into your belly, and soon his two siblings join in their playing.

One of your arms are grabbed and chewed on playfully, whilst another seems want to drag you away and pulls at the wounded leg, but as the other two have good hold of you it only results in your broken ankle being stretched out painfully and you cry out in pain. For a second, all three pups pause and look on you, seeming to be intrigued by the sound of your scream, before the one at your legs pulls again, until she is rewarded with another scream. Delighted, all three seem to compete in who can make you scream the loudest, watched by their mother who seems to be amused by seeing her pups play. The one on your stomach digs his claws deeper into you until blood starts to trickle from the marks, and the jagged tongue that eagerly laps them up feels raw against your skin. The pup that used to be satisfied chewing on your arm now spots your fingers and find them much funnier to play with, biting down hard enough to break two of them, and you scream out again.

The pup that was clawing your stomach suddenly growls something to his siblings, and as both of them look down on you with vicious grins you gulp again, wondering what he said. It soon becomes obvious, as all pups get off you and instead nudge you in the sides, apparently wanting you to get up. Hesitantly, you get up on all fours but grimace at the pain when you put any pressure on your wounded hand, but they don't seem to care. One of the pups instead growls again and nudges your rump, urging you to walk forward. You take a few awkward steps but soon feel the cold nose nudge you once more, and you try your best to run on all four. “What on earth is going on?” You ask able to speak again.
The great wolf seemed to smile, but it’s more of a relieved smile. “You have passed the test. Humans are mostly predictable, they mate with no intention of staying with the mate, or even caring for there young. Since a few years ago, my pack has watched you, and you may be human, but you are unique. Instead of being ignored and forgotten, you have been beaten and battered. This has made you resist my power to reveal the one human fault that most humans cannot control. Lust.”
Now you are just really confused. You’ve never seen a wolf before in your life and yet here the leader himself is telling you that they’ve been watching over you for years! You open your mouth to speak, but the wolf silences you.
“You have a great many questions, yes? But all answers come with time.” The great wolf looked to the sky, “The full moon is rising. You should change soon, all will be made clear if you are deemed worthy to receive the blessed visions that the night mother gives us all.”
