He nudges a pile toward you, but then returns to eat the rest of the deer. You inch your way close to the pile, yet still aren't desperate enough to eat raw meat. You poke it a couple of times before picking it up, but after a second you throw it down. "Genarius? Why are you being so nice to me? I mean, before whatever happened to where I can't remember, I could've been hurtful to this place, and to you. I mean I'll probably die in the hands, or paws of the pack, but so far, you've been treating me as a guest or a member of your family." Genarius licks the blood from his paws and walks towards you. Well, when I look at you, I see-
12312211.title: Genarius

choices: Grunting or barking, you can only understand Genarius
1231221122.content:
Well, when I look at you, I see a daughter. I've never been a father, but you're young, and there for, aren't strong enough to protect yourself from other predators. The young ones in the pack are like this and I just feel like I should do my best to protect you. You smile at the thought, and look back at the 'food.' Soon a rumble sounds. Blushing, you look away, but finally feel the pains of hunger eat at you. As you look at the pile of scraps you hesitantly begin to eat them. Somehow they aren't as bad as you thought and feel as if you'll be okay. To encourage you as well as praise you of your action, Genarius licks the side of your head. You smile as a sense of pride washes over you and continue to eat. Soon, you finish your meal and feel sleepy again. Noticing your tiredness, Genarius nudges you to lay down and curls up against you. Sleep well, little one... I hope that we'll all be happy with whatever the alpha chooses... After several minutes, you start to let the sleep overtake you and dream. In the morning, you begin to stir as you felt Genarius move near you. He shakes himself and walks close. Alright, little one. It's time to go. Will you walk or ride my back? Despite his well wishes before sleeping, a sense of dread falls upon you as Genarius asks you. It was as if you were making a final decision as you were being brought to your final destination. You think about it and feel as if your legs would buckle at any moment, even though you just awoke.
"Uh... I think I'll ride. I don't know if I'll be able to make it." Genarius senses your emotions and nudges you in sympathy. Please don't worry too much. I seriously think that everything will be okay! I know I can't really say much, but something inside me really feels like you'll get a happy ending. You climb on and try to concentrate, but, as if distracted by something, you realize that you are already with the pack and an hour or two had quickly past. There were about fifteen or so wolves in total. One that seemed important, by the movements of the other wolves, began to step forward.
1231221122.title: daughter

choices: You make a break for it
12312211221.content:
The wolf began gesturing with his muzzle and spoke. Genarius? What have you brought to us? Genarius did not speak yet, as if knowing the Alpha, to which you believe he was, was asking a rhetorical question and would examine you himself. Really looking at him, you take in some of his features. He's about a foot or so taller than Genarius... His build is sturdy and looked to be he won battles in order to be where he was. He fur color was the next thing you thought about. It was mainly black, though there were some patches of white and tan or beige around his legs and his underside. Then you look back at his build, becoming more aware at how strong he was compared to you. You begin to feel your heart race as the alpha circled you and sniffled, inhaling your scent. His tail twitches once or twice, but he doesn't say anything. You almost feel yourself shake as the sound of the sniffing and the feel of his breath reach your body. You want to run... Even if they chase you, the kill would happen almost instantaneously. Would that be better than waiting for them to do it on their own terms? The voice of Genarius, however begin to echo in your mind...

Please don't worry too much. I seriously think that everything will be okay! I know I can't really say much, but something inside me really feels like you'll get a happy ending.
12312211221.title: The alpha talks

123122112212.content:
You decided to take a breath and just bare with what the alpha does. He continues to sniff around you, but soon stops to really get a whiff of your face. Your heartbeat quickens even more as you fear he'll just give the command to kill you anyway. Soon you hear him talk to you. So... What's your name? You realized you closed your eyes tightly as he spoke and quickly telling him you don't really remember anything and so you don't really remember your name. "I think it started with a N?" The wolf huffs as if what you said didn't please him. "Please! I'll do what you need me to do... I don't know why I'm here and what this place is... I just- I just feel like maybe I need to keep living? I don't know why, but I promise I'll try really hard with whatever you tell me." The alpha turns to his pack and looks at Genarius. It almost seemed like a spark of what they were thinking, went back and forth between them.
Fine... I have decided-
123122112212.title: You trust in his words

1231221122121.content: Fine... I've decided that you can stay. Unless a couple or any wolf decides to take you in, you will start as a low leveled wolf. You're just meat now, but maybe with time, you'll be a real wolf. You feel a little strange like what he's saying is literally what will happen to you. "Wait! Do you mean I'll actually become a wolf?!" The thought was a little scary, but kind of interesting at the same time.
1231221122121.title: You can stay

12312211221211.content: Actually, yes... Though it's also no as well. You see, when humans come here, their body eventually changes into another animal it just depends on how they adapt to this land. People don't stay human for long... Even if they try to survive a 'human' way, they eventually change depending on the animal they closely act like. Since you're with us, you'll sure to be a wolf! There might be a chance that you do change into a prey, but that's highly unlikely since you'll be with us You look back at Genarius and you share a smile. He nods his head as if telling you to keep focusing on the alpha... As well as an 'I told you so.' The alpha then walks to an elevated ground, like a platform and began talking to the pack. Alright! So I say that this human will now be apart of the pack! I am asking anyone of you that feels ready, to please take care of her as if she is your pup or sibling! You must make sure they know the ways of the wolf so our pack can grow strong. Your body shakes. You only know Genarius, and he even said that you reminded him as a daughter, but he's never been an actual dad. Any one of them could turn on you! Soon enough-
12312211221211.title: Yes (this land changes humans)

choices: the rest of the day (no changes)
123122112212111.content:
Whispers occurred amongst the group. Genarius, on the other hand, sat for a bit and looked around. In his mind, he thought, that since he wasn't a father yet, maybe he wasn't the right choice to care for you. Soon enough, he hears some of the wolves around him. Is this a joke? Even if she does become one of us, what would she even help with?
The alpha's being too nice.
The pack is growing more each year... It'll just give us problems
Genarius knew some wolves thought of humans that way and even wanted to kill any they came across, so it quickly made him think that a wolf might take the human just to treat them horribly. She was like a daughter to him and though he wasn't experienced, he knew he would still treat her well. If he did accept it though, this would be something new for both of them. Him being a parent and her being a new species entirely. Eventually he began to step forward. You smile at his action, feeling happy. Alpha? I choose to accept her as my daughter. I may not know how to be a parent, but I know this pack and will train her well. The Alpha nods and gives a slight smile. You turn to see him get closer and smile. You smile back and feel happy and accepted. Some wolves groaned, while others smiled along.Very well. You are now officially her guardian and father. I see that, with your help, she will be a fine addition to the pack. That will be all.
123122112212111.title: Genarius answers the call

choices: Genarius carries you like a wolf pup
he manages to lift you onto his back
1231221122121112.content:
You look to Genarius and smile. "Thank you- uh... Dad, I guess?" Genarius laughs a bit and pats you on the head with his paw. You don't have to call me that if you aren't comfortable. Genarius is fine, but I do want to look out for you now. We're a team now, so we need to stick together. You nod in agreement but still feel the need to thank him more. You hug him and stay by his side. Soon wolves are called to hunt and they later return with two well sized kills. You quickly remember your new way of eating and look away in disgust. Genarius gives you a look knows that you'll get used to it eventually. You step forward, as if you are about to eat, but Genarius growls and looks at you. You feel a wave of tension. You can tell that it wouldn't be wise to continue moving forward and so you freeze. Genarius nods shortly, as to not only acknowledge your choice, but to assure you that you made the right one. You look back towards the kills to see the Alpha ripping some pieces. Another wolf soon joins and after a bit, more wolves join. The first two wolves soon leave to eat their current flesh pieces and lick themselves clean. Genarius makes a gesture towards you and begins to walk. Following, you hear Genarius explain.the higher skilled wolves eat first. Since you are now my pup, you are at my level because you are now my pup. It's not the highest, but at least you won't have to worry about starving. Looking back, you see the other wolves whimpering. It's lucky for you, but you feel a little guilty. After taking some, at least as much as Genarius would let you, you greedily 'wolf' it down. It tastes better than the last time.
As you finish you and Genarius talk. I know you said that you don't remember your name, so I was think about coming up with a new name? Do you have anything in mind?
"Well... I don't really know... What are the other names like?" Gesturing with his muzzle, he picks out some names. There are a variety of names. There's Winter Wind, Scratch, Wind Shifter, and many other different names. You know, now that I look at you, and your background, Nanokami looks like a good name, but only if you want it. It sounded strange at first, but you begin to quickly warm up to it. "Sure! Okay! Sounds good Genar- uh, dad!" the sound of the word dad felt better for both of you the more you said it and, though trying to hide it, you noticed Genarius's tail wag. After more time, it was getting late and you yawned, remembering how tired you were. Genarius nudges you to move but you soon fall asleep.
1231221122121112.title: the rest of the day (no changes)

12312211221211121.content: Knowing that you were too tired to go on, Genarius tried to carry you several different ways, but to no avail. Eventually he decides whether or not you were ready, to carry you like a pup. He gently licks the back of your neck and tries his hardest to lift you. Fortunately, your skin changes slightly, as if it stretched. As if on instinct your body hangs in an awkward position. Even though you wouldn't have known, your body became numb as Genarius lifted you. Pleased at the convenience, your new father carries you into a den. He hadn't used one since he was a pup, but knew that with your transformation, it'd be safe to assume you'd need it later. When he places you on the ground you move a bit, trying to become comfortable, curling up into a fetal position. Genarius laughs to himself and licks your cheek. Though still asleep, you smile, dreaming of you life to come. Soon, Genarius curls around you and falls asleep as well.
12312211221211121.title: Genarius carries you like a wolf pup

1231221122121112112.content: Is it a wolf tail?
1231221122121112112.title: Tail (with full fur)

12312211221211121121.content:
Feeling something rub against you stirs you from a dream quickly forgotten. Something feels a little off, but your still too groggy to really notice. You stand and stretch failing to yet notice your new member and look to your new dad with a smile. "Good morning, dad." Genarius gives you a lick and a smile. Good morning. Are you hungry? You nod and suddenly feel the swishing and the sensation of something behind you. As you look, you finally realize that you had changed a little overnight. "I-! I have a tail?!" Your dad nods with a smile. And from the looks of it, it seems to be a wolf tail. So you really will be apart of the pack! You are kind of excited, but also a little scared. Becoming a whole other species was a pretty good reason to be so.
Genarius could tell something was wrong and nudged your cheek. Don't worry, pup... I'll be right her with you. I know this is pretty intense and crazy, but you won't be in danger from anything. You nodded and smiled. With that, Genarius left to hunt with the other wolves. You sat and began really looking at your own tail. It waved with your mood and was a little tempting to chase at times. Almost like new feelings and urges blooming inside you. Trying to shake it off, you try to look away, though the feeling of your tail from your body was hard to ignore. Waiting, you notice that more wolves have little coves inside the den and have come to play. A group of older wolves as well as younger ones play in the main tunnel. You feel like you should get more acquainted with the pack and look at the different groups. After some thoughts, you decide to join (which age group you choose is what you change into)
12312211221211121121.title: yes

choices: "Smirk all you want! I'll go hang out with the younger pups!"

There were three, one of which snarls at you but the two seem to be friendly enough. "So.. your a new pup? Barely, I'll add. All you can is a tail!" The other two smirk slightly at this so you respond with, "...

After he said, "you want to join our group? First you have to be an actual wolf-" he was interjected by a white wolf, the other of the three. "Leave him alonwith Cobalt! I say she can hang out, she has no one else after all. What was for name?"
1231221122121112112111.title: "Could I hang out with you?"

12312211221211121121111.title: "Swift, what's yours?"

1231221122121112112112.content:
You lift your tail at the others and somewhat feel your ears twitch back. If you were a full wolf, they would have been folded and you gave a second of silence to internally celebrate before replying. "Fine! Smirk all you want! I'll go hang out with the younger pups! I bet they're more cooler than you guys!" A growl sounded. You figure it's the pup that made fun of you for only having a tail for now.
Whatever... We were just about to do something cooler than just tumbling around trying to walk, but if that's what you'd rather do, go ahead! There were a few giggles from the other pups. You pause the walk back to your cove of the den and think about their words. You did want to give a good first impression, but how were you supposed to stay calm when the other wolves were making fun of you? You think about trying again to hang out with them. What if when you hung out with a certain age group, you would grow or regress depending on who you were with the most? Besides, it's not like the younger pups would be more entertaining that what these guys might be planning.
Your tail droops, giving away your mood. You turn to see the pup, the one that made fun of you earlier, laugh again and scurry out of the den.Though a white wolf pup wasn't laughing, they smiled and followed the leader. The last one was mainly gray, though had some reddish brown patches near their legs and muzzle with a few cream highlights. They looked at you as if focusing or thinking about something, but joined the other pups out of the den.
Sighing, you decide to give in and follow them. "Wait for me!" Though you try to run like an average wolf, you eventually run on your two legs. Unfortunately you haven't changed enough to naturally run on four at the moment. You soon lose them within the nearby bushes and start whimpering, to your surprise. You felt your ears twitch once again and even instinctively sniff the air. Not knowing why you primarily thought to do that over anything else, but you got a little more happier when you managed to catch a whiff of something. Your heart fluttered as you figured you were changing more. Sniffing again, you realized the scent wasn't totally as strong, but you decided to follow anyway. Even if it wasn't them, it smelt familiar in a way, and you figured it would either lead you to them, or back to the den.
Making another attempt to walk on all fours, you bare the tension of your joints and managed to make an awkward pace.
It was a, moment or two before you found yourself at-

You sigh as you are carried on the back of the huge female wolf back to where her clan's cave is. As the wolf walks it explains itself, and its clan's ways, as briefly as it can to your shocked, confused mind as best as it can. By the time you can see the cave, and the many, other female and male wolves, you are at peace,.....You know you really were thrown away by your Step-father, and left there....here to die!
When you realize she has stopped walking, you are deep within the cave complex....surrounded by some five, six mature, female wolves....as Genarius turns to face you, still sitting on her broad back....
"Well?....we are here, so can you please get off my back, so I may introduce you to your new family?"

what next????????
124.title: You follow for your own safety

choices: Join the pack! Become a wolf on the inside if not out
It's very dangerous, leave, they'll let you
1241.content: "Oh, um... Sorry, and thank you!" the wolf nods her head and waits as the pack sniffs you, it tickles at times and even received a few licks, but hesitated, thinking they might potentially eat you, even though Genarius did say that they would be your family. Soon enough one of the wolves, who you thought was the alpha because of the tension around it seemed commanding, came and growled at the others. You know the rules! The alpha always investigates first! So you were right, and you began feeling more frightened as you saw the other wolves cower as well as one question entering your mind. How can you understand them? After the alpha, who sounded like a male, gave you a few whiffs, he looked at you, his expression seemed stern. So, I see my tracker found you after an abandonment from one of your own... You wanted to interject, tell them that there must have been some mistake, but not only could you not really know because you don't remember, but because he could easily eat or just kill you. You look and smell healthy, and I can see from your expressions after my words that you understand us. Genarius? When did she understand you? She bowed at her acknowledgment and told him all that she knew. I see, it seems because of your understanding right away, you have the potential to be a natural after your transformation Though you knew that you should have probably waited to speak, you couldn't help but speak. "I'm sorry, but what the heck are you talking about?" the alpha nodded surprisingly kind to not do anything horrible to her, and replied. Well, though we all have no idea why, a human one way or another enters this forest and becomes an animal. They could become something different entirely, but the point is the humans don't stay humans for long. You could even change genders or become younger or older, or you can just stay as a human, but if you do change you might become one of us, or pray. I ask all of my pack, even my tracker to bring things they find that seem interesting, but if you want to stay, you must adapt to our customs. After this conversation, you must live like us without mistake. Because you haven't grown here, you will be taught, but hurt this pack, and you will leave and be treated as an enemy or pray. Also, if you stay, and you transform into pray, we will hunt you. It is only in our nature to do so, but as I said, your choice, I will let you think about it... You thought about it and looked at the pack. It was unbelieveable that the wolves, at least the alpha was being nice, even more unbelievable that you were allowed to join, but what would you choose?

The more time had passed the more you realized there was no guarantee of safety out of the pack, so it'd be much more rational if you stayed. Do you want to think it over some more? We will not hurt you here and you can stay, but only for today. "No!" you almost yell, but you quickly tell them you made up your mind. "I mean... I want to stay." the wolf nodded and commanded the others not to harm or eat you and that to tell him if you messed up. A hunting party is assembled and will bring their kill in a few moments. When the kill arrives, your training will start. You nod and feel queasy, yet hungry wondering what is to come.

you hear screaming as you see 2 wolves drag in....a human, you gulp realizing that is what you might have to eat "he decided to fight" one of the wolves said "we tried to reason with him to join the pack but he said he rather be eaten, so we agreed" they drop the teenage boy next to you he looks at you and says

She has to be lying, there's no way your father would do something like that! Stiil, for your own safety you play along.

"Is that so?" you asked.

"Yes, it is," the wolf replies.

"Is that him over you there?" you ask her, pointing off in the distance.

The wolf gasps and looks in the direction, giginvg you the chance to flee. It doesn't take lon for her to noice that you tricked her, but she doesn't go after you. She simply heaves a sigh.

You stop and turn around to see how you've gone. You don't see the wolf anywhere and sigh with relief. Suddenly a twig snaps behind you and you dart back around. The wolf is standing right there, leaving you in a state of complete fear.

"Listen!" Genarius barks, "You are to be taken to our leader immediately, got that?! Your fate lies with him now! However, I don't have to bring you to him alive. I suggest you keep that in mind next time you do something stupid! Now, will you come peacefully or not?"

1252.content:
"FORGET THAT.....I AM OUT OF HERE!" you scream as you turn to run the other way,....even after the wolf had explained the way things were.
You took two steps then a hard blow came to the back of your head......and you are falling, falling, falling through a dark, black abyss........

As you come to, you feel you are very naked, tied up on the dirty ground,....and can feel many eager eyes on your naked body.
Without opening your eyes you feel the hatred of many wolves glaring at you, and this sends a shudder of dread through you. You whimper a little which shows the alert wolves you are awake, even tho, your eyes remain closed.

"Open your eyes, Misty!" a voice with command behind it says within your mind. "We really do not mean you any harm, dear child!" the softly spoken voice in your brain tired to assure you. You gulped quietly, and kept your eyes tightly shut.

"Okay, then....lay there.....you have food and water right by you if you want....and your binds will be removed.....but you are our's....and never will be free to go back to your Father...and your prior life!"

Sure enough you feel your hands being loosen, and the ropes, or whatever had kept you bound being removed. With closed eyes you moved your arms and rubbed your hands over your wrists and ankles.... making the blood flow back into your legs and arms....

what next??????????????????

12521.content:
As you open your eyes, you close them due to you not adjusting to the light yet. Once you finally get you eyes open you see that your in a cave, the floor covered with soft moss, and a big hole in the center on the ceiling so light can come in.
You also notice that your have a scar on the back of your head from when that wolf hit you. You grunted angrily, "Stupid wolf." You look at your hands and see red marks on your wrists, and on your ankles. Then you remembered, "Food." you looked to your left and saw food on the ground right next to you.
Hungrily,(or is it just hungry?) you at the food, at first you thought it was raw, but when you bit into it, you whimpered in delight. you at the rest of the food and noticed the wolves have come back, and one was staring longingly at you. It approached you, but you backed away, due to your experience how many minutes ago with that last wolf. He.....no SHE whimpered and cooed, smiling "Don't be afraid little one, I'm not going to hurt you." she took another step forward, and you took one step back, then you said, "Yeah, like i'm supposed to believe that. First im lied to by a stuck up snob wolf who smacks me in the back of the head, and now, another wolf is saying thats she's not going to hurt me? Yeah, way to check your facts." You turned your back to the wolf.
She came around to face you, "She only did that cause she knew you would run, we had to bring you here, we're your friends, you don't know what your dad did to you-" you cut her off "My dad?! MY dad did something to me?! Lady, have you lost you noggin?! My dad treated me like a princess, he got me everything I wanted, he protected me when a guy tried to rape me! Your insane!!" You layed to the ground, crying "N-now i-i-i'll never see h-h-him *sniff* again!!!" you covered your eyes. The wolf tried to comfort you by licking and nuzzling you, but you didn't budge.
Just then another wolf showed up, "Thats enough, Selena, you can tell her later." she looked at him and nodded, and put some moss over you incase you got cold.
12521.title: Friends?

info.brief_description: A story where your actions determine if you become a member of the pack or a tasty snack.
info.description:
One day you wake up in an ordinary forest, banged up and your clothes torn. You have no memory of what happened to cause you too arrive in the situation you're in. There is one thing odd about the forest, everything except for the animals are normal size. The animals are much larger than they should be. You soon encounter a wolf and are taken to the pack. There, you must determine if you're to be a member of the pack, or a tasty wolf snack.

I'll pretty much allow almost anything in the story, but I have to lay down a few rules.

Rules:
-No anal or cock vore! Anything else is allowed.
-Use proper grammar! Everyone should be able to type properly.
-Do not add any other humans to the story! You can mention them, but don't make them new characters.
-You do not have to have the character live or die.
-You may, if you choose, have the wolves talk at one point, have the main character become a wolf, etc..
-You may add other, non-wolf, animals to the story.
-Chapters may be long or short.
-Chapters may be edited/deleted due to bad typing, conflicting storyline, or breaking of rules.
